rcpNm: Fried Chicken with Hot and Sour Soy Sauce
rcpPartsDtls:
•Must-have ingredients: chicken ribs (110g), lettuce (25g), green chives (5g), radicchio (5g), red pepper (5g), cheongyang red pepper (5g), green onion (5g), radish leaves (3g), garlic (1g), ginger (1g), cooking oil (3g)
•Sauce: vinegar (5g), low-salt soy sauce (5g), lemon juice (2g), sugar (1g), water (5g)
•Seasoning: cornstarch (5g)
rcpNaTip: •I used Cheongyang red pepper and lemon to make a spicy, sour, and low-sodium sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Lettuce, green chicory, and radicchio are torn into bite-size pieces, and the peppers are chopped into small pieces.
2. Finely chop green onions, ginger and garlic, put cooking oil on a pan and stir-fry.
3. Add the sauce ingredients and boil over low heat for about 5 minutes.
4. Cool the sauce and mix the chopped peppers.
5. Put cornstarch on the chicken leg, cover the pan with cooking oil and bake until golden.
6. Lay the trimmed vegetables in a bowl, place the grilled chicken meat on top, and finish with the sauce and radish.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Made flour) 200g whole wheat flour, 200g strong flour, 40g whole wheat flour, 15g salt, 5g dry yeast, 150ml water, 10g baking powder
(Ingredients) Sweet pumpkin 20g, sesame seeds 10g
rcpNaTip: Instead of sugar, ripe sweet pumpkin was used to make a light sweet taste, and the savory taste of sesame seeds replaced the sweet taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Steam the sweet pumpkin and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
2. Mix whole wheat flour, strong flour, prostate powder, water, and salt and perform the first fermentation at 5°C for half a day.
3. Slice the dough and shape it, and let it ferment medium for 15 minutes.
4. Put sliced sweet pumpkin and sesame seeds in the middle of the dough, fold them lightly, and roll them up on a cotton cloth.
5. Cook before baking.
6. Put it in an oven preheated to 230°C, steam it, and bake at 210°C for 25 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: Butter 40g, hard flour 90g, strong flour 90g, mixed powder 70g, baking powder 10g, milk 66g, eggs 50g(1), dried cranberries 20g, walnuts 20g
rcpNaTip: By removing the sugar and adding the dried cranberries, I made it feel a natural sweetness.

manualSteps.content:
1. Use a card to chop and mix the sifted strong powder, tough powder, mixed grain powder, baking powder and butter.
★ You need to mix it like cutting to minimize gluten formation, so you can get a crispy texture.
2. Add eggs and milk and mix as if cutting with a card.
3. When the powder is slightly visible, add the dried cranberries and walnuts and knead together.
4. Wrap the dough in plastic and let it rest in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
5. Push the dough with a roller and cut it evenly with a card after about 5 times of 3 folds so that it is stacked in several layers.
6. Place in an oven pan and apply a thin layer of egg water to coat the surface, then bake in an oven preheated to 180℃ for about 20 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Made ingredients) Strong flour 300g, yeast 6g, salt 4g, butter 10g, water 170ml 
(Ingredients) 3~4 sweet potatoes, 20g milk
rcpNaTip: I mixed sweet potatoes and milk and used mousse using the natural sweetness of the ingredients.

manualSteps.content:
1. Boil the sweet potato, remove the skin, add the milk, and crush it into a soft mousse state.
★ If you boil sweet potatoes in water, there is a lot of moisture, so you have to control the amount of milk.
2. Add all the batter ingredients except butter and mix until the clean-up stage, then add butter and mix until the final stage.
3. The dough is first fermented to be about twice the initial volume, divided into 50g portions, rounded, and then intermediate fermented (10-15 min).
4. After the intermediate fermentation, the dough is flattened and made into a round shape by adding sweet potato mousse and panning it.
5. Press the panned dough lightly on the top like a hotteok.
6. Bake at 190℃ for 15 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Dish ingredients) 300g strong ingredients, 250ml water, 8g yeast, 50g rye powder, 24g black bean powder, 4g olive oil, 50g walnuts, 24g cranberries,
(Ingredients) 300g soaked black beans, 200g milk, 50g eggs (1), 3g salt
rcpNaTip: I boiled black beans to make black bean cream using the natural sweetness that comes from itself.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil black beans soaked in water for 30-40 minutes, then separate the beans and water to cool. Put milk, eggs, and salt in cold black beans and grind and boil in a mixer to make black bean cream. At this time, adjust the concentration with black bean water.
2. Mix all ingredients except walnuts and cranberries to form a lump, add walnuts and cranberries to knead well so that they don't come out.

3. The primary fermentation is performed to inflate by about twice the initial volume, and when the fermentation is completed, the dough is divided into six pieces and is rounded to medium fermentation.
4. Remove the medium-fermented dough, fold both ends into a baguette shape, and pan three at a time in a pan.

5. "Bake at 180℃ for the upper flame and 160℃ for about 20-30 minutes before transferring to a cooling pan to cool it down.
★Divid the pan according to the size and bake in two portions."
6. Cut the cooled bread in half and add the black bean cream.

rcpPartsDtls: Cucumber (100g), celery stem (15g), yogurt (60g), fruit (20g), lime juice (5g), agave syrup (5g)
rcpNaTip: It uses potassium-rich cucumbers and celery to help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. After removing the skin of cucumbers, cut them into large pieces, and peel the celery with a filler and cut them into large pieces.
2. Add seasoning to the trimmed cucumbers and celery and grind finely in a mixer.
3. Pour ground cucumbers and celery into cotton cloth and squeeze only the juice.
4. Place the cucumber celery juice in an airtight container and freeze for at least 3 hours in the freezer.
5. Put frozen cucumber sorbet on yoghurt and serve with fruit.

rcpPartsDtls: cherry tomatoes (100g), milk (370ml), lemon juice (20g), balsamic vinegar (10g), lemon juice (1g), olive oil (10g)
rcpNaTip:
Tomatoes high in potassium help release sodium.
If you use your own ricotta cheese, you can make it savory without being salty.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put milk (370ml) in a pot and raise it on high heat. When the edge boils, add lemon juice (20g) and stir until it becomes mushy.
2. Put boiled milk in a wet cotton cloth and drain it to make ricotta cheese.
3. Put balsamic vinegar (10g) and lemon juice (1g) in a pot and boil for 2 minutes, then mix with olive oil (10g) and turn off the heat to make a balsamic dressing.
4. Cut the cherry tomatoes in half, and make the hardened ricotta cheese into bite-sized pieces.
5. Place cherry tomatoes and ricotta cheese in a bowl and sprinkle with balsamic dressing.

rcpPartsDtls: Perilla leaves (2 sheets), onion (20g), cherry tomatoes (5 pieces=50g), soft tofu (100g), tofu (100g), minced garlic (10g), cheese (40g), soy sauce (8g), olive oil (30g), sesame oil (15g)
rcpNaTip: The combination of mashed tofu, savory cheese, and fresh tomatoes is amazing.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut cherry tomatoes into three halves, finely chop perilla leaves and onions.
2. Mash soft tofu and tofu until creamy.
3. Add perilla leaf dressing ingredients to minced perilla leaves and onions and mix evenly.
4. Stir-fry minced garlic in a pan heated over a medium heat to make garlic flakes.
5. Place soft tofu cream, cherry tomatoes, and cheese in a bowl.
6. Sprinkle with perilla leaf dressing and finish with garlic flakes.

rcpPartsDtls: Soft tofu (70g), cherry tomatoes (6~7=50g), string cheese (40g), children's leaf vegetables (a little), balsamic vinegar (5g), apple (150g), apple juice (50g), plain yogurt (30g)
rcpNaTip: We added the freshness of apple dressing and the sourness of balsamic vinegar to complement the bland taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put apple and apple juice in a mixer and mix them with plain yogurt to make apple dressing.
2. Cut the soft tofu into 9cm pieces and dig out the center.
3. Mince cherry tomatoes and string cheese into thick pieces and mix them with apple dressing.
4. Fill the soft tofu with mixed cherry tomatoes and string cheese and add apple dressing.
5. After applying balsamic vinegar to a bowl, place the stuffed soft tofu on top and serve with children's leaf vegetables.

rcpNm: Perilla seed pork belly and Korean melon ssamjang
rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Pork belly (200g), melon (one medium size), nutritional pepper (50g), perilla powder (3Ts), garlic (5 sides), whole pepper (1ts), low-salt soybean paste (3Ts), minced onion (2ts), minced garlic (1ts), sesame seeds (1Ts), sesame oil (2Ts), minced green pepper (1ts), minced red pepper (1ts), red pepper powder (2ts), minced green onion (1ts), perilla powder (4Ts), apple juice (2Ts), nuts (5Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•I used potassium-rich melons, nutritious lettuce, and nuts to help discharge sodium.
•Apple juice was used instead of sugar to give the original sweetness of the ingredients and reduce the use of sugar.
•I used perilla seed powder to enhance the savory taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil water (3 cups) and seasoning in a pot for 5 minutes, then add pork belly and boil over medium heat for 15 minutes.
2. Remove the skin and seeds of melon (½) and finely chop them.
3. Add nuts and low-salt ssamjang ingredients to minced melon and mix evenly.
4. Cut the nutritious chives into bite-sized pieces, and the melon (½) removes the seeds.
5. Lay the nutritious chives in a bowl and place the pork belly neatly on top.
6. Finish by putting low-salt ssamjang in the seeded melon.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Onion (½), garlic (6-7 pages), green onion (1 page), minced pork (400g), tofu noodles (2 pack = 200g), shrimp (¾ cup), chicken broth (5 cups), cheongyang red pepper (2), gochujang (0.5 Ts), pepper powder (0.8 Ts), vinegar (1.5 Ts), olive oil (10 Ts), red pepper powder (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip: •Instead of seasoning, garlic, green onions, dried shrimp, and chicken broth saved the savory taste, and the spicy taste of Cheongyang red pepper caught the greasyness.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred onions into 3mm thick slices, garlic flat, green onions and cheongyang peppers diagonally.
2. Add red pepper paste and pepper powder (0.3 Ts) to minced pork, mix evenly, and marinate for 10 minutes.
3. Put olive oil (3 Ts) in a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry the minced pork and red pepper powder until the outside of the pork turns white.
4. Add flattened garlic, green onion, onion, dried shrimp, pepper powder (0.3 Ts) to olive oil (7 Ts) and stir-fry until garlic is golden.
5. Add tofu noodles and chicken broth (½ cup) and stir-fry until the broth boils down, add pepper powder (0.2 Ts) and Cheongyang red pepper and stir-fry for 1 minute.
6. Place in a bowl and finish with stir-fried pork and onion marinated in vinegar.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Onion (3p), mini sweet pumpkin (2), boiled egg (3), milk (½ cup), bread (4pcs), slice cheddar cheese (2pcs), dried plum (½ cup), bokchoo (2pcs), almond slice (⅓ cup), white wine (⅓ cup), honey (2ts), salt (0.3 Ts), pepper powder (slightly)
rcpNaTip:
•Milk with a high potassium content helps to release sodium.
•Baked sweet pumpkins and onions to taste sweet and reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice onions thinly, remove the skin and seeds of sweet pumpkin, cut dried plums thickly, and wash the green lettuce cleanly.
2. Place sweet pumpkin on paper foil, cover with cooking oil (1 Ts) and bake for 15 minutes in an oven preheated to 180℃. Sift the yolk of the boiled egg and finely chop the whites.
3. Put cooking oil (2 Ts) on a pan heated over a medium heat, add white wine little by little, and stir-fry the onion until it turns brown to make onion jam.
4. After cooling down the baked sweet pumpkin, filter it finely through a sieve, and mix it evenly with egg yolk, white, milk, honey, salt, and pepper to make a sweet pumpkin salad.
5. Stir-fry almond slices in a dry pan heated over low heat until golden.

6. Put sweet pumpkin salad, green lettuce, and sliced cheddar cheese on the bread (1 sheet), put a generous amount of onion jam on the other bread (1 sheet), cover it, and cut it into a triangle to finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Made flour) 50g whole wheat flour, 200g strong flour, 3g instant dry yeast, 45ml apple seed, 120ml water, 2g salt, 50g egg(1), 15g olive oil, small spinach, 4-5 dried cherry tomatoes
(Inner ingredients) 50g spinach, 3g minced garlic, 60g stir-fried sesame seeds, 8g olive oil, small amount of salt, small amount of pepper, 100g cream cheese
rcpNaTip:
The flavor of dried cherry tomatoes combined with spinach to make it delicious without sweetness.
Replace the apple species with apple juice and add 5g more of the measuring agent.

manualSteps.content: 1. (Ingredients) Grind spinach, minced garlic, roasted sesame seeds, olive oil, salt and pepper with a blender to make spinach pesto and mix with cream cheese.
2. Add water, eggs, salt, olive oil, apple species, dry yeast and sifted powder, knead to a lump, and then cut spinach into small pieces to mix.
3. When the dough becomes smooth, divide it into eight parts, make it round, and ferment for 15 minutes.

5. "Add dried cherry tomatoes in the center and ferment them for 30 minutes for a second time.
★I cut the cherry tomatoes in half and baked them in an oven at 100°C for an hour
6. Bake in an oven preheated to 180℃ for 15 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g of dried radish, 30g of vinegar, 25g of sugar, 8g of lemon, 5g of carrot, 5g of cucumber, 5g of pickling spice, 100g of water

5. Add 4 to 3 and age for more than a day.
6. Put it in a nice way.

rcpPartsDtls:

rcpPartsDtls: 4g dried seaweed, 40g Chinese mackerel, 17g perilla powder, 1g dried seaweed, 2.5g sesame oil, 2.5g garlic, 300ml water

rcpPartsDtls:
•Must-have ingredients: clam (60g), enoki mushroom (20g), red pepper (5g), mugwort (2g)
•Soup: kelp (5g), cheongyang red pepper (3g), radish (10g), green onion (5g), water (300g)

manualSteps.content: 1. Put kelp, cheongyang red pepper, green onion, and sliced radish into bite-sized pieces in water and boil them.
2. When the broth boils, pick up Cheongyang red pepper and kelp.
3. Boil the sea bream.
4. Cut the bottom of the enoki mushroom, cut the red pepper diagonally, and cut the crown daisy into bite-sized pieces.
5. Put enoki mushrooms in the soup and boil them.
6. Finish with red pepper and crown daisy.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: whole cabbage (25g), chives (1g), garlic (1g), ginger (0.5g)
•Seasoning: Salt (0.1g), saury (1g), red pepper powder (1g), salted fish (1g), sesame seeds (1g), sesame oil (0.5g)
rcpNaTip: •We used sweet saury to reduce the amount of salt we used.

manualSteps.content: 1. Choose the cabbage from the soft leaves and divide them into long pieces.
2. Sprinkle the cabbage with salt and pickle it.
3. Chop chives into 4cm long pieces, chop garlic and ginger.
4. Mash the saury in the red pepper powder and mix the rest of the seasoning.
5. Add red pepper powder seasoning to the drained cabbage and season it.
6. Finish with chives, sesame seeds, and sesame oil.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: potato (100g), onion (40g), milk (30g), commercial crouton (7g), parsley powder (1g)
•Seasoning: Butter (5g), salt (0.3g), pepper (0.3g)
rcpNaTip:
•It was boiled lightly with only vegetables and milk instead of broth to reduce sodium content.
•You can make low-salt soup more delicious with spices such as herbs and whole pepper.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice the potatoes and shred the onions.
2. Boil the potatoes in boiling water (5 cups) for 7 minutes.
3. Put butter on a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry the onion for 3 to 5 minutes to take out.
4. Put boiled potatoes, onions, and milk in a blender and grind them finely.
5. Put the ground ingredients in a saucepan over low heat for 3 minutes to adjust the concentration.
6. Season with salt and pepper, then add the commercial croutons and parsley powder.

rcpPartsDtls: Pork (70g), tofu (50g), crunchy red pepper (30g), eggplant (60g), cooking oil (100ml), salt (0.3g), pepper powder (0.2g), soy sauce (20g), oligosaccharide (30g), vinegar (10g), starch (10g), fried powder (50g)
rcpNaTip: Eggplants are low in calories, high in moisture, and rich in potassium, which helps in the release of sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop the pork, tofu, and crunchy peppers into small pieces, and add the eggplant in the middle of the fourth-degree decomposition.
2. Season the minced pork and mix it with minced tofu and red pepper.
3. Fill the cut eggplant with seasoned pork and coat it with frying powder.
4. Eggplants coated with frying powder are fried twice for 7-8 minutes in cooking oil (100ml) preheated to 180℃.
5. Boil eggplant sauce ingredients and water (100ml) in a pot for 4 minutes.
6. Top a bowl with fried eggplant and sprinkle with eggplant sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Tomatoes (2), melons (1), cucumbers (1), onions (½), garlic (3 pages), zucchini (1), basil leaves (4 sheets), black olive powder (a little), lemon juice (1 Ts), olive oil (5 Ts), salt (0.4 Ts), peperoncino (0.3 Ts), low-salt soy sauce (0.5 Ts), vinegar (2 Ts), honey (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip: •Tomatoes, melons, and zucchini high in potassium help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the top of the tomato, cut it with a crosshair, blanch it in boiling water for 30 seconds, remove the skin and cut it into bite-sized pieces.

2. Wash the melon cleanly, remove the second-class decomposition seeds, and cut it into bite-sized pieces, cut cucumbers and onions into bite-sized pieces, and cut garlic into quarters after removing the top.
3. Zucchini is a spaSlice with this sauce, blanch it in boiling water for 30 seconds, cool it, and mix it with lemon juice (1 Ts), olive oil (2 Ts), and salt (0.1 Ts).
4. Put tomatoes, cucumbers, melons, onions, garlic, basil leaves (3 sheets), peperoncino, and cold water (½ cup) in a mixer and grind them finely to make tomato sauce.
5. Add low-salt soy sauce, vinegar, honey, olive oil (3 Ts), and salt (0.3 Ts) and grind them once more finely.
6. Place zucchini noodles and tomato sauce in a bowl and finish by sprinkling basil leaves (one sheet) and black olive powder.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Kimchi (¼), cucumber (1), paprika (yellow, red each), perilla leaf (5 sheets), shrimp (2), egg water (2 pieces), radish leaves (⅓ Zoom), Crami (2 lines), cooking oil (0.3ts)
rcpNaTip: •Soaking kimchi in water and blanching crami and shrimp in water can reduce sodium intake.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the kimchi clean, soak it in cold water for 30 minutes, take it out, squeeze the water, and cut the upper part slightly.
2. Chop cucumbers and paprika into 5cm long pieces, wash perilla leaves and radish leaves cleanly, drain them, and cut crami into pieces.
3. Peel the shrimp, blanch it in boiling water until cooked, and cut it into two halves.
4. Put cooking oil on a pan heated over a low heat and pour egg water to make the egg.
5. Spread kimchi on seaweed feet one by one.
6. Put the eggplant, trimmed vegetables, and shrimp on top of the kimchi, roll it up and cut it into bite-sized pieces.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Home Meal Ingredients] Noodle Tteokbokki Rice Cake (20 pieces, 130g), Beef Yangji (110g), Fish Cake (1 sheet, 40g), Cabbage (60g), Tteokbokki Seasoning Powder (30g)

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice cabbage, fish cake, and paprika long and blanch chives once.
2. Put a little cooking oil on the pan, stir-fry the fish cake, and grill the beef brisket in the same pan to prepare.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Simple ingredients] Buckwheat noodles (raw noodles, 166g), cucumbers (55g), onions (42g), carrots (25g), pigs' feet (200g), egg garnish (20g)

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash carrots, onions, and perilla leaves thoroughly, and shred cucumbers, cabbage, and apples.

rcpNm: Tomato vegetable soup and steamed salmon soba

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut tomatoes (100g), radishes, carrots, garlic, and onions into small pieces, and spread salmon into two long sheets.

rcpPartsDtls: Chamnamul (30g), radish (20g), lemon (1), sugar (10g), apple vinegar (20g), water (20ml), apple vinegar (15g), garlic (2), red pepper (1), apple (½)

rcpPartsDtls: 14g beef, 15g radish, 3g spring onions, 5g oyster mushrooms, 5g bean sprouts, 10g low-salt soy sauce, 150g water

rcpPartsDtls:

rcpPartsDtls: 40g of rice, 30g of brown rice, 5g of brown rice glutinous rice, 20g of zucchini, 20g of saesong mushrooms, 20g of cucumbers, 15g of red paprika, 15g of yellow paprika, 15g of orange paprika, 2.5g of vinegar, 2g of sugar, 1g of green laver, 1g of flavor, 0.3g of lemon, 0.1g of dried laver
rcpNaTip: It's a refreshing mixed vinegar with lemon, and you can enjoy it without any other seasoning.

manualSteps.content: 1. Rice, brown rice, and brown rice glutinous rice are soaked in water and cooked.

5. After making the rice long in the shape of sushi, make sushi with paprika, cucumbers, mushrooms, and zucchini on top.
6. Wrap the rice so that the vegetables are fixed with long sliced blue seaweed.

rcpPartsDtls: 8.2g of blue crabs, 4g of clams, 11.3g of Korean radish, 5g of kanyangpa, 9.2g of zucchini, 5.3g of green bean sprouts, 1.3g of Korean anchovies, 0.3g of dried seaweed, 2g of kanjangpa, 1.4g of soy sauce, 0.6g of red pepper powder, 0.5g of soybean paste, 0.6g of red pepper paste, 300ml of water
rcpNaTip: We lowered salinity by using the organic acid and natural sweetness of clams and blue crabs.

manualSteps.content: 1. Make broth with dried anchovies and dried seaweed.
2. Cut the crab into a good size to eat, and prepare the clams by cutting them.
3. Slice radish, slice onion square, cut zucchini half-moon, and cut green onion sideways.
4. Bean sprouts ripen.
5. Add radish, crab, and clams to the broth and boil them.
6. Add bean sprouts, onions, and zucchini green onions, boil, and season to finish.

rcpPartsDtls: 300ml water, 2g kelp, 15g onion, 30g freshwater fish, 20g flour, 10g pumpkin, 10g radish, 5g Cheongyang red pepper, 5g garlic, 5g crown, 5g red pepper powder, 3g red pepper paste, 2g salt, 1g soy sauce
rcpNaTip: If you use vegetables to boil the broth, you can reduce the use of salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add kelp, onion and water to make broth.
2. Remove the impurity gate and wash the seaweed fulvescens, and add water to the flour to make the dough by hand.
3. Slice radish and pumpkin, chop peppers and green onions sideways, and chop garlic.
4. Stir-fry radish, red pepper paste, and red pepper powder in a pot with perilla oil, then pour the broth and boil it.
5. Boil in the sea bass, pumpkin and red pepper garlic.
6. Add the hand sujebi and green onion, season, and put the crown daisy on top at the end.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: dried seaweed (2g), dried pollack (4g)
•Soup: Hwangtae head (5g), kelp (1g), shiitake mushroom (1g), green onion (1g), water (250g)
•Seasoning: sesame oil (1g), minced garlic (1g), low-salt soy sauce (2g)
rcpNaTip: •We used potassium-rich seaweed as an ingredient and preserved the natural taste of the ingredients through dried pollack and vegetables.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil water and broth ingredients to make broth.
2. Sift the boiled stock through a sieve.
3. Soak dried seaweed and dried pollack in water and cut them into edible sizes.
4. Put sesame oil in a pot and stir-fry seaweed and pollack.
5. Put the stock in a pot and boil it
6. Season and finish with minced garlic and low-salt soy sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 100g chicken, 30g eggplant, 5g plum extract, 5g green onion, 2g garlic, 3g soybean oil, 3g soy sauce, 2g vinegar, 2g mirin, 2g oligosaccharide, 1g sesame oil
rcpNaTip: Instead of boiling it in soy sauce, it was lightly roasted with a small amount of soy sauce to taste it.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the chicken and eggplant into bite-size pieces.
2. Marinate chicken in minced green onion, minced garlic, cooking wine, sesame oil, and oligosaccharide.
3. Make a sauce by mixing plum extract, soy sauce, vinegar, minced garlic, mirin, and water.
4. Grill eggplant and chicken in the oven.
5. Mix the roasted chicken and eggplant in the plum sauce.
6. Stir-fry chicken and eggplant with sauce on the pan.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) 500g strong flour, 5g instant yeast, 7g salt, 50g egg(1), 250g milk, 50g grape seed oil 
(Ingredients) 1000g of saury, 3g of lemon juice
rcpNaTip: I used safflower jam made of safflower and lemon juice to reduce sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the skin of the saury, sift it through a sieve, add lemon juice to a pot and boil it down to make jam.

2. Mix strong flour, salt, and instant yeast first, then knead by adding eggs, grape seed oil, and warmed milk.
★ If the liquid temperature exceeds 60℃, yeast may die, so be careful.
3. After first fermenting the finished dough at room temperature for 1 to 2 hours, it is divided into 3 chunks and fermented for about 15 minutes.
4. Make the dough into 8 chunks of 60g each and spread thinly like pizza dough using a push rod.

5. After applying safflower jam on the thin dough and repeatedly placing the dough on top, place the dough without safflower jam on top and place it in a cube bread mold coated with a small amount of grape seed oil.

6. "Put the bread frame in the oven preheated to 180 degrees and bake for about 40 minutes.
★ If there is a lot of color on the top, cover it with paper foil and cook it to the inside."

rcpPartsDtls:
(Dish ingredients) 320g strong ingredients, 80g raw bean powder, 140ml warm milk, 8g yeast, 2 eggs, 20g coconut oil, 2g salt 
(Biscuit ingredient) 100g tough rice flour, 60g roasted soybean flour, 2g baking powder, 2 eggs, 60g butter 
(Ingredients) 500g sweet potato, 50g milk, 100g cranberry, 30g almond
rcpNaTip: I used soy flour instead of sugar in the dough and biscuits to reduce sugars, and added flavor with the freshness of cranberries.

manualSteps.content:
1. Mix steamed sweet potato with milk, minced almonds and cranberries.
★ If you boil sweet potatoes in water, there is a lot of moisture, so you have to control the amount of milk.

2. (Biscuit) Make butter soft, then stir-fry soy flour and salt, mix, then add eggs little by little to knead so that it doesn't separate. Mix the sieved rice powder and baking powder, and leave it in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
3. Knead all the dough ingredients except coconut oil, then add coconut oil and knead until soft, then ferment until the dough doubles in size. (About an hour)

4. The first fermentation dough is divided into 30g pieces, rounded, and then medium fermentation (about 15 minutes), then the gas in the dough is removed, and 40g of the ingredients in ① are added and wrapped.

5. Divide 20g of biscuits, thinly spread over plastic, and cover over bread dough using plastic.
★ When the dough sticks to the plastic, sprinkle a little bit of extra powder.
6. After panning, perform a second fermentation (about 15 minutes) and bake in an oven preheated to 180℃ on the top and 160℃ on the bottom for 20 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: Frozen konjac (200g), shredded onion (50g), flattened garlic (10g), vegetable stock (100g), almond (100g), peanut (100g), whole wheat flour (45g), mirin (20g), soy sauce (5g), ground garlic (10g), tomato paste (30g), sugar (3g), balsamic vinegar (5g), cooking oil (5ml)
rcpNaTip:
If you use konjac that has been frozen and defrosted once, the texture is chewy.
Instead of breadcrumbs, we added savory flavor with almonds and peanut flour.

manualSteps.content: 1. After cutting the frozen konjac, put the marinated seasoning and water (40ml) together in a pot and cook for 5 minutes.
2. Add shredded onions and flattened garlic to the pan and stir-fry for 3 minutes, then add tomato paste (30g) and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
3. Add vegetable stock (100ml), soy sauce (10g), sugar (3g), and balsamic vinegar (5g) and boil them for 3 minutes, then sift them to filter out the ingredients to make my sauce.
4. Stir-fry almonds and peanuts for 5 minutes in a dry pan heated over a medium heat and chop them finely.
5. Coat the boiled konjac with a mixture of whole wheat flour (45g) and water (40ml) and coat it with chopped nuts.
6. Put cooking oil (5ml) on a pan heated over a medium heat and add the konjac coated with nuts and bake for 3 to 5 minutes back and forth. Put the konjac gas in a bowl and add the sauce of 3.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Onion (25g), scallops (200g), shrimp (6), ramie clam (6), cheongyang red pepper (2), tofu (200g), milk (200g), whipped cream (⅔ cup), pepper powder (slightly), minced garlic (0.7 Ts), basil (4 sheets), granafadano cheese (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip: •We added seafood and a small amount of cheese to make it savory and increase the flavor with vegetables and spices, reducing the use of salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop the onion into 5mm thick pieces, cut the cheongyang red pepper diagonally, remove the seeds, rinse the scallops cleanly, and season with pepper powder.
2. Add milk and whipped cream to tofu and mix evenly to make tofu cream.
3. Put cooking oil (1.5 Ts) on a pan heated over a medium heat and grill it until it becomes opaque.
4. Put cooking oil (0.5 Ts) on the same pan and stir-fry it with minced garlic and onions, then stir-fry it with shrimp, ramie clams, and cheongyang peppers.
5. Add water (100ml) and boil it until the clam opens its mouth. Add tofu cream and when it boils, add scallops and cook for 3 minutes.
6. Place the basil in a bowl and finish with granafadano cheese.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
•[Simple ingredients] Cabbage (40g), woomoksim (50g), perilla leaf (5g), bok choy (25g), enoki mushroom (20g), shiitake mushroom (5g), bean sprouts (30g)
•[Additional Ingredients] Squid (30g), shrimp (40g), mussels (164g), Vietnamese dried red pepper (10g), tomato (250g), cheongyang red pepper (4g), onion (50g), green onion (50g), sliced garlic (10g), commercial nurungji (50g), tomato paste (20g), cooking oil (10g), soy sauce (6g), red pepper powder (3g), red pepper powder (20g), water (4 cups=800g)
rcpNaTip:
• I used potassium-rich tomatoes to help release sodium.
• I added red pepper powder to compensate for the boring taste with the spicy taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put the pack back in water and boil it over medium heat for 20 minutes to make the broth, peel the squid and cut it into pine cones, remove the mussels from the whiskers, and peel the shrimp from the body.
2. Peel the tomatoes and cut them into 5×5mm sizes, shred cabbage, shiitake mushrooms, cheongyang red pepper, onion, woomoksim, perilla leaf, and cut bokchoy at an angle.
3. Stir-fry the tomato paste in a pan, add the tomato and boil it, add red pepper powder and kelp stock (200ml) and boil it lightly to make tomato sauce.

4. Put cooking oil on a pan, stir-fry green onions and sliced garlic, add umoksim, shrimp, squid, mussels, cabbage, onions, shiitake mushrooms, and dried peppers, season with pepper, and add soy sauce.
5. Add tomato sauce and boil for 5 minutes.
6. Add bokchoy, enoki mushrooms, and bean sprouts and stir-fry them slightly, and finish with perilla leaves and nurungji.

rcpPartsDtls: 35g tomatoes, 2g garlic, 20g onions, 15g honey, 15g vinegar, 15g bellflower root, 30g spinach, 20g bracken, 20g red pepper paste, 2g salt, 5g sesame oil
rcpNaTip: The potassium in the tomato in the marinade helps release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch tomatoes, peel them, and chop them into small pieces.
2. Mix garlic and onions with chopped tomatoes, red pepper paste, honey, and vinegar.
3. After peeling the bellflower, remove the bitterness by immersing it in water and tear it into 5cm long and 0.5cm thick.
4. Cut off the roots of spinach and divide them into 2 to 4 equal parts.
5. The bracken is soaked in water after washing it cleanly.
6. Blanch the salt in boiling water in order of balloon flower, spinach, and bracken, then rinse in cold water to squeeze the water and add the sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Strong flour 300g, salt 3g, dry yeast 12g, butter 36g, cooking oil 6g, carrot 50g, Chamnamul 50g, lotus root 30g, nuts 10g, water 100ml
rcpNaTip: I added more flavor and flavor by grinding vegetables into bread that might be boring because it doesn't contain sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Divide the dough made with strong flour, salt, yeast, and water into three parts and mix them with carrots, Chamnamul, and lotus root, respectively.

2. When gluten is formed in the dough, mix it with cooking oil and butter, and mix the dough with lotus roots with nuts at the end.
★I added nuts to the lotus root dough, which is less fragrant than other doughs.
3. When the dough is complete, ferment for the first time for 3-40 minutes.
4. After the first fermentation, 30 g is weighed, rounded, and pushed long after the intermediate fermentation.
5. Let's ferment for about 20 minutes.
6. Bake for 18 minutes in a lower flame 160, upper flame 180℃ oven.

rcpPartsDtls: Cabbage (2), spinach (20g), cucumber (60g), carrot (20g), red pepper powder (1t), soy sauce (1t), apple vinegar (1t), apple juice (1t)
rcpNaTip:
It used cabbage and spinach with a lot of potassium to help discharge sodium.
I used apple juice instead of sugar to reduce sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch cabbage and spinach in boiling water (800ml), rinse them in cold water and sieve to remove moisture.
2. Slice blanched spinach, cucumbers and carrots thinly.
3. Spread the blanched cabbage and roll the shredded ingredients on top.
4. Make the marinade.
5. Cut the cabbage roll into bite-sized pieces, put it in a bowl, and add the sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Cauliflower (50g), sweet potato (1), onion (1), lamb (fan flesh, 250g), garlic (7-8 pages), sweet pumpkin (1), olive oil (5ts), basilupd (3ts), basil pesto (3ts), holgrain mustard (2ts), minced garlic (2ts)
rcpNaTip:
•We used sweet pumpkins, onions, sweet potatoes, and cauliflower to enhance the texture and complement the sweetness.
•We supplemented the boredom of the taste with basil pesto and hol-grain mustard.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove only the pine part of the cauliflower, and cut the sweet potato and onion into bite-sized pieces.
2. Cut lamb into bite-sized pieces, season, and marinate for 15 minutes.
3. Add the trimmed vegetables and garlic to the marinated meat and mix evenly, then place it on a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry until the sweet potato is slightly cooked.
4. Add seasoning and mix evenly with ingredients.
5. Microwave the sweet pumpkin for 5 minutes, cut off the top a little when it's cooked, remove the seeds, and fill the pumpkin with lamb and stir-fried ingredients.
6. Put it in a steamer and steam it for 25 minutes, then cut it into eight and finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Home Meal Ingredients] Beef (180g), sweet pumpkin (50g), enoki mushroom (20g), pine mushroom (25g), oyster mushroom (20g), lettuce (10g), red modern (10g), cabbage (20g), bean sprouts (20g)
• [Additional Ingredients] Eggs (3 pieces = 180g), milk (75g), cooking oil (26g), salt (2g), sprout vegetables (50g), ricotta cheese (20g), olive oil (20g)
rcpNaTip:
• By using ingredients of shabu-shabu, excluding commercial seasoning, we reduced sodium intake through reduction of soup intake by changing the cooking form (soup → grilled food).
• Cheese is high in sodium, so be careful not to eat too much.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut sweet pumpkin, enoki mushroom, mushroom, oyster mushroom, ssamchu, red bean paste, cabbage, bean sprouts, and beef into 3cm pieces.
2. Put cooking oil (20g) on a pan and stir-fry the trimmed vegetables and beef over a medium heat.
3. Beat the egg in a bowl, add salt and milk, and mix to make egg water.
4. Put cooking oil (6g) on a tart frame, stir-fried vegetables, beef, and add ③.
5. Bake in an oven preheated to 140 degrees for about 25 minutes to make a frittata.
6. Place the sprout vegetables and ricotta cheese on the frittata and finish with olive oil.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Home Meal Ingredients] Mackerel (1 = 250g), dried radish (30g), radish (20g), green onion (20g), cheongyang red pepper (20g), marinade (75g)
• [Additional ingredients] Tomato hole (200g), eggplant (60g), zucchini (90g), shiitake mushroom (40g), tofu noodles (50g), bonito fish 2g, basil leaves (2g), cooking oil (20g), water (3 cups = 600g)
rcpNaTip:
• We used only one-third of the sauce for home meals to reduce the amount of sodium and sugar used.
• I used a tomato rich in potassium to help with the release of sodium.
• We reduced the amount of sodium used by increasing the umami taste by using broth using bonito fish.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put water, radish, and green onion in a pot, when it boils, turn off the heat, add bonito fish, and after 30 minutes, sift through a sieve to make broth.
2. Cut zucchini, eggplant, and shiitake mushrooms into 5mm thick pieces. Shrimp is minced thickly.
3. After washing the mackerel in running water, drain them with a kitchen towel, apply cooking oil to a pan preheated to 180 degrees, and bake the mackerel for 10 min from the skin back and forth.
4. Stir-fry the dried radish greens using the remaining oil in a frying pan, add the tomato hole and crush them with a spatula.
5. Add stock (500g), marinade, roasted mackerel, trimmed zucchini, eggplant, and shiitake mushrooms and cook over medium heat.
6. Add Cheongyang red pepper and tofu noodles and cook for another 2 minutes, turn off the heat, put it on a plate, and finish with basil leaves on top.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] hairtail(70g(1 piece)) , avocado(35g), tomato(10g), onion(10g), garlic(10g), lemon(10g), lime(10g), basil(5g)
[Seasoning] Olive oil (12g), salt (1g), pepper (1g)
rcpNaTip: •We didn't season hairtail separately, but added a savory taste with guacamole to complement the boring taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. The avocado is halved to remove the seeds and crush the pulp. Halve the lemon and squeeze the juice, and slice the lime thinly.
2. Slice tomatoes, onions and garlic, and finely chop basil
3. Put the trimmed avocado, tomato, onion, garlic and basil in a bowl and mix olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper to make guacamole.
4. Cut the clean hairtail and bake it in a heated pan until golden.
5. Place grilled hairtail on a plate and serve with guacamole.
6. Place the trimmed lime on a plate and finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] Cabbage (23g), chives (5g), sesame seeds (2g), seasoned fresh kimchi (15g)
[Seasoning for geotjeori (124g)] Steamed potatoes (20g), red pepper powder (25g), plum syrup (5g), sand lance sauce (10g), salted shrimp (3g), radish (20g), onion (30g), ginger (1g), garlic (10g)
rcpNaTip:
• I used potassium-rich potatoes to help release sodium.
• I used the sweetness of onions instead of sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut cabbage into bite-sized pieces.
2. Cut the chives into 3cm long pieces, and cut the steamed potatoes into bite-sized pieces
3. Wash garlic, ginger, radish, and onion and cut them into bite-sized pieces.
4. Put steamed potatoes, red pepper powder, plum syrup, sand lance sauce, salted shrimp, radish, onion, ginger, and garlic in a mixer and grind them to make the outside seasoning.
5. Mix the trimmed cabbage, chives, and fresh kimchi seasoning (15g).
6. Put it on a plate and finish with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g of ripe persimmon, 20g of pear, 50g of carbonated water, 50g of cider
rcpNaTip: The boat that goes into the ade helps discharge sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the safflower in half and peel it.
2. Remove the seeds and cut them into three halves.
3. Peel the pears by quarter.
4. Put pear and saury in the mixer and grind.
5. Freeze 4 slightly in the freezer.
6. Mix carbonated water and cider when half-frozen.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g octopus, 20g ripe kimchi, 40g bean sprouts, 40g radish, 5g green onion, 5g garlic, 3g Korean anchovies, 5g soybean oil, 1.5g soy sauce, 300ml rice water, 5g red pepper powder
rcpNaTip: The aged kimchi was washed in water to reduce the salty taste, and red pepper powder and bean sprouts were added to add a spicy and cool taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil the broth with rice water and dried anchovies and take out anchovies.
2. Slice radish, slice green onion sideways, and chop garlic.
3. Rinse the aged kimchi in water to remove the salty taste and stir-fry it slightly in oil.
4. Boil anchovy stock with aged kimchi, octopus, red pepper powder, radish, and garlic.
5. Add bean sprouts and season with soy sauce to boil.
6. Finish with green onion.

rcpNm: Purple sweet potato butter cream bread
rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) 290g strong flour, 70g hard flour, 4g yeast, 5g salt, 50g egg(1), unsalted butter 30g banana 180g, chestnut sweet potato 130g, water 150g 
(Ingredients) Boiled chestnut sweet potato 380g, banana 180g, banana slice 
(Butter cream ingredient) Boiled purple sweet potato 190g, boiled chestnut sweet potato 100g, 30g hard flour, 50g egg (1 piece), butter 120g, water 100g
rcpNaTip: Instead of sugar, we used natural sugars in sweet potatoes and bananas to ferment yeast.

manualSteps.content: 1. Round 35g of the mixture of boiled chestnut sweet potatoes and bananas, and slice the spare banana into 0.5 thicknesses.
2. (Butter cream) Crush boiled purple and chestnut sweet potatoes, add water to knead them, mix them well, add butter, mix them so that they don't form lumps, and put them in a piping bag.
3. Add salt and yeast to the strong powder and tough powder on a sieve, mix 130g of chestnut sweet potato, 180g of banana, and 1 egg, and add 30g of unsalted butter when the dough becomes a lump.
4. After the first fermentation so that the dough is doubled, 50g is divided into rounds and fermented in the middle for about 10 minutes.

5. Add sediment and banana slice to the dough to make it round, ferment it second time, and put sweet potato butter cream on top before baking.
★If the tooth breaks open, the dough will burst as you bake it, so stick it carefully.
6. Bake for 20 minutes in an oven preheated to 160°C under the upper fire of 180°C.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) Blueberry fermentation seed 250g, strong ingredient 250g, salt 3g, water 100ml
(Sauce) Tomatoes 150g, mushroom 50g, onion 50g, paprika 50g, rosemary 5g, cooking oil 10g, water 50ml
(Topping) Low-salt cheese 200g
rcpNaTip: I used non-sugar ciabatta bread and made sauce with raw tomatoes to reduce the use of processed products.

manualSteps.content: 1. After mincing all the ingredients in the sauce, stir-fry the onions in the oiled pan first, then stir-fry the remaining ingredients, add water and boil them.
2. The dough ingredients are added and mixed until the final stage at 27°C, and the first fermentation is fermented at 27°C for 1 hour with a high temperature fermentation.

3. Divide 150g each to shape it and pan it on a cotton cloth.
★The dough is very tough. If it gets on your hands, proceed by spraying over flour.
4. In the second fermentation, the temperature is 30°C, the moisture is fermented at 75% for 60 min, and then panned in an oven pan.
5. Apply tomato sauce made on the dough and bake at 160℃/230℃ for 13 minutes.
6. Add cheese and bake for 4 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: Onion (75g), potato (50g), carrot (40g), chicken breast (100g), tomato (150g), coconut water (100g), milk (100ml), brown rice (150g), olive oil (10g), pepper powder (3g), curry powder (10g), water (3T), Greek yogurt (45g), salt (0.5g), olive oil (10g), oligosaccharide (10g), minced garlic (15g), curry powder (10g), parsley powder (0.5g)
rcpNaTip: If you use sour yogurt as a sauce, you can increase the salty taste even with a small amount of salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop the onion (30g), and cut the rest of the onion, potato, carrot, and chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
2. Season the chicken breast to marinate it evenly.
3. Blanch tomatoes in boiling water for 20 seconds, peel them and divide them into eight.

4. Put olive oil (10g) on a pan heated over a medium heat, add minced onions, oligosaccharides, minced garlic, and curry powder and stir-fry for 2 minutes, then add the trimmed tomatoes and stir-fry as if crushed.
5. Stir-fry the trimmed vegetables and seasoned chicken breasts for 2 minutes, then pour coconut water and milk to boil.
6. Put brown rice in a bowl, pour curry, and finish with yogurt sauce and parsley powder (0.5g).

rcpPartsDtls: Sweet pumpkin (1 piece = 800g), egg (1), cooking (1T), milk (1T), mozzarella cheese (30g), granafadano cheese (1Ts), almond flakes (2Ts), honey (1Ts), parsley powder (slightly)
rcpNaTip: Sweet pumpkin and cheese are used to harmonize the sweetness and salty taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut out the upper part of the sweet pumpkin about 3mm to remove the seeds, and cook it in a microwave for 5 minutes.
2. After removing the sweet pumpkin seeds, dig out the inside (50g) and put it on the side.
3. Beat the eggs finely, sieve them, and put them in a mixer with the cooking wine, milk, mozzarella cheese (20g), and the pumpkin.
4. Add the ground ingredients to the hollow sweet pumpkin, close the lid, and microwave it for 8 minutes to cook.
5. Remove the lid and place mozzarella cheese (10g) and microwave it for 3 minutes to dissolve.
6. Place sweet pumpkin in 6th to 7th grade decomposition bowl and sprinkle with honey, granafadano cheese, almond flakes, and parsley powder.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] onion (1), mushroom (6p), garlic (5p), tomato (3p), thaliatele (200g), dried tomato (2), minced parsley (0.5 Ts), pink pepper (5p), basil leaves (2), baguette (a little), water (1260ml), radish (150g), kelp (5x5cm, 2pcs), olive oil (2ts), fine red pepper powder (0.5ts), vegetable whipped cream (⅔ cup), soy milk (¼ cup), pepper paste
rcpNaTip: •Tomatoes and pine mushrooms high in potassium help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice the onion thickly, cut the mushroom into shape, cut the garlic flat, and cut the tomato into 6 to 8 pieces.
2. Boil thaliatelle in vegetable stock (6 cups) for 13 minutes.
3. Put olive oil on a pan heated over a medium heat, cook the flattened garlic until golden, add onions and mushrooms and stir-fry for 3 minutes.

4. Add noodles (1 cup), turmeric powder, and fine red pepper powder to mix evenly, stir-fry tomatoes, add vegetable whipped cream and soy milk, and when it boils, add dried tomatoes and boil for 1 minute.
5. Add boiled thaliatelle, stir-fry the sauce evenly so that it permeates the noodles, and sprinkle with pepper.
6. Place in a bowl, sprinkle with chopped parsley and pink pepper, and finish with basil leaves and baguettes.

rcpNm: Ssam tofu and lasagna with perilla leaves
rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Simple ingredients] Ssam tofu (18g), beef brisket (120g), bean sprouts (80g), bokchoy (30g), cabbage (60g), glass noodles (30g)
• [Additional Ingredients] Ssam tofu (1 pack = 100g), mozzarella cheese (1 cup = 100g), perilla leaves (10g), hard-boiled tomatoes (80g), onions (80g), beef boiled pork (100g), white wine (50g), oregano (5g), bay leaf (1g), minced garlic (20g), cooking oil (30g), salt (5g), pepper (3g)
rcpNaTip:
• I used a tomato rich in potassium to help with the release of sodium.
• I made my own sauce and lowered the sodium and sugar content.
• We used herbs such as oregano and bay leaves to increase the flavor and reduce the amount of sodium used.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice peeled tomatoes into dice, and chop onions, cabbages, bok choy, and bean sprouts into small pieces.
2. After roasting the beef brisket in a pan, take it out, put cooking oil on the same pan, add the minced garlic and trimmed vegetables, and stir-fry until the water dries out.
3. Stir-fry beef meat and boil it with hard-boiled tomatoes, bay leaves, white wine, and oregano, and season it with salt and pepper to make a sauce.
4. Cut the glass noodles into 6cm long pieces, boil them in boiling water for 7 minutes, and put them in ③.
5. Ssam tofu → grilled beef Yangji → sauce → mozzarella cheese in that order and cook in an oven preheated to 180 degrees for 8 minutes.
6. Roll the perilla leaves and cut them up to finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
Serving standard
[Main ingredients] Chicken legs (25g), chicken tenderloin (30g), tomato (35g), cherry tomato (15g), spinach (5g), onion (10g), potato (7g), spaghetti noodles (5g)
[Seasoning] Red pepper paste (5g), red pepper powder (3g), minced garlic (3g), soy sauce (4g), allulose (4g),
rcpNaTip:
• We used tomato paste instead of ketchup to reduce sugar and sodium use.
• It supplemented the boring taste with a savory sauce using sesame seeds.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice eggplant into 0.3cm thick slices and cut cherry tomatoes, paprika and onions into small pieces.

5. Pour cooking oil on a pan heated over a low heat and cook evenly for 5 minutes, turning the sausage.
6. Raise the heat to a high heat and cook for a minute to finish.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] 1 pine mushroom, onion (½), tomato(two to three), eggplant(two), pork(pork neck, 200g), Shred mozzarella cheese(½ cup), olive oil(1Ts), minced garlic(2Ts), ssamjang(0.5Ts), paprika powder(slightly), basil leaves(three to four sheets)
rcpNaTip:
•Tomatoes high in potassium help release sodium.
•Paprika powder was used to enhance the bland taste by adding umami.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop the mushrooms, onions, and tomatoes into thick pieces, cut them into long pieces in the shape of an eggplant, and cut the pork into bite-sized pieces.
2. Place eggplants on a dry pan heated over a medium heat and bake them back and forth until golden.
3. Add olive oil to the same pan and stir-fry minced garlic until golden, then add onion and pine mushroom and stir-fry until onion becomes transparent.
4. Put the pork neck on a medium heat and stir-fry it until the color of the outside changes, then crush it with tomatoes.
5. Add ssamjang and paprika powder and mix evenly, and when the tomato soup is oozing out, tear the basil by hand and boil it until the soup becomes self-made.
6. Put the ingredients of ⑤ in a bowl, put the eggplants in a cross-section, put the cheese on top, and cook in a microwave until the mozzarella cheese melts and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Mature kimchi (¼ leaves), cabbage (6 pieces), perilla leaves (10 pieces), beef (for shabu shabu, 150g), bean sprouts (1 zoom = 20g), dried pollack (1 zoom = 10g)
rcpNaTip:
•Sodium content was reduced by soaking aged paper in water.
•We used bean sprouts and dried pollack to preserve the natural flavor of the ingredients.

manualSteps.content: 1. Rinse the aged kimchi in running water and soak it in cold water for 30 minutes.
2. It is layered in the order of cabbage, perilla leaf, beef, and aged kimchi.
3. Cut the stacked materials into 3~4cm pieces.
4. Place the ingredients in a pot and put bean sprouts and dried pollack in the center.
5. Add water (3 cups).
6. Boil over medium heat for 10 minutes to finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: pollack cloth (40g), fried powder (20g), eggs (1/4), cooking oil (5g), water (30g)
•Seasoning: Pepper powder (1g), lemon juice (3g)
•Tartare sauce: boiled egg(1/2), mayonnaise(5g), red pepper(1g), cheongyang red pepper(1g), onion(3g), pepper(2g), lemon juice(10g)
rcpNaTip:
•Red pepper and cheongyang red pepper were added to the tartar sauce instead of pickles for a spicy taste to lower sodium.
•I lowered the sodium by using lemon juice instead of salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Place pollack on a kitchen towel to remove moisture.
2. Sprinkle pepper and lemon juice to remove the fishy smell.
3. In a bowl, mix the frying powder, egg, cooking oil, and water to make the batter
4. Coat the pollack cloth with frying cloth and fry it twice in oil at 170°C.
5. Mix boiled egg, red pepper, cheongyang red pepper and onion in a bowl and mix mayonnaise, lemon juice and pepper to make sauce
6. Place fishcats with tartare sauce.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Simple ingredients] Curry sauce (80g), fried red shrimp (150g), cauliflower (50g), french fries (100g)
• [Additional ingredients] Potatoes (2 pieces = 360g), soaked seaweed (70g, dried seaweed 10g), onion (110g), cooking oil (10g), water (100g)
rcpNaTip: • Potatoes and seaweed are rich in potassium and help release sodium in the body.

manualSteps.content: 1. The dough made of potato is half the size of a spoon and shaped into a circle.
2. Cook the fried red shrimp in an air fryer preheated to 180 degrees for 15 minutes.
3. Add cooking oil to the pan, chop the onion, and stir-fry it until it is brown.
4. Add cauliflower, french fries, and soaked seaweed and stir-fry for another 3 minutes.
5. Add the curry sauce, water (1/2 cup = 100g), and ongsimi and boil for 3 minutes.
6. Place on a plate and finish with fried red shrimp.

rcpPartsDtls: 100g konjac, 50g potatoes, 5g green peppers, 5g red peppers, 10g kelp, 15g soy sauce, 10g sugar, 15g Mirim, 3g sesame oil, 10g vinegar, 200g water
rcpNaTip: You can reduce sodium by boiling konjac and potatoes separately without cooking them in the marinade.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the konjac and potatoes into 2cm? 2cm pieces and cut the green and red peppers into small pieces to remove the seeds.
2. Put kelp in water (200g) and boil it to make broth, then remove the kelp.
3. Make a marinated sauce by mixing soy sauce, sugar, and mirin in the broth.
4. Put the konjac and potatoes in boiling water, cook about 80% and take them out to cool.
5. Add 50g of the marinade to 4 and boil it down slightly.
6. Turn off the heat and mix the sesame oil.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g cabbage, 30g tofu, 20g onion, 10g green onion, 5g anchovy, 1g Cheongyang red pepper, 0.5g minced garlic, 0.5g ginger juice, 2g soybean paste, 60ml rice water, 300ml water
rcpNaTip: If you blanch tofu in advance, you can reduce salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut cabbage, onion, and tofu into bite-sized pieces and prepare green onions and Cheongyang red pepper by cutting them sideways.
2. After pre-treatment, add the remaining onion skins, green onion roots, and anchovies again, strain the broth, and filter.
3. Put tofu in boiling water for about 10 minutes to remove the salinity.
4. Stir-fry sesame oil and cabbage in a pot and boil them with rice water and broth.
5. Add tofu, onion, green onion, and red pepper.
6. Season with soybean paste, ground garlic, and ginger juice.

rcpPartsDtls: 17.5g beef sirloin, 7.5g onion, 15g potato, 3.2g paprika, 25g tomato, 1.7g garlic, 1.7g flour, 13.7g tomato paste, 9g ketchup, 5g butter, 1g olive oil, 0.1g bay leaf, 0.1g salt, 0.1g pepper, 300ml water
rcpNaTip: The sweet and sour taste of tomatoes replaces the salty taste, so you can reduce sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the beef sirloin into cubes, season with salt and pepper, and coat it with flour.
2. Slice potatoes and tomatoes into bite-sized pieces, slice garlic, shred paprika, and chop onions.
3. Put butter and olive oil in a pan, stir-fry onion and garlic, then add beef and stir-fry.
4. When the beef is cooked, add potatoes, tomatoes, and paprika.
5. Stir-fry tomato paste and ketchup and boil them with water and laurel leaves.
6. Season with salt and pepper and cook well.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g turnips, 0.2g chives, 1g fine red pepper powder, 1g thick red pepper powder, 1g minced garlic, 2g plain yogurt, 0.2g salt
rcpNaTip: We reduced the use of salt by adding the refreshing taste of plain yogurt to turnips called fruit radish.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut turnips into 2.5*2.5*0.3cm pieces.
2. Make a marinade by mixing fine red pepper powder, thick red pepper powder, minced garlic, salt, and yogurt.
3. Cut the chives into 0.2cm pieces and prepare them.
4. Add marinade to turnips and mix.
5. Let the seasoned turnips be refrigerated for about a day to mature.
6. It is served with aged turnip kimchi with chives as garnish.

rcpNm: Hamcho tofu steak with cream curry sauce
rcpPartsDtls: Onions (30g), carrots (20g), mushrooms (20g), soaked haemcho (15g), mashed tofu (120g), chicken breast (60g), eggs (40g), breadcrumbs (5g), flour (10g), butter (10g), milk (250g), turmeric powder (10g), seaweed salt (0.5g), minced garlic (5g), low-salt soy sauce (3g), cooking oil (10ml)
rcpNaTip:
Use dried seaweed after soaking it in hot water (100ml) for 40 minutes.
We reduced the use of sodium by adding seaweed instead of salt to the steak dough with tofu and chicken breasts.
We have reduced the use of sodium by making handmade cream curry sauce instead of a commercial sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onions, carrots, mushrooms, and soaked seaweed into small pieces.
2. After removing the water from the crushed tofu, put it in the chicken breast and mix it with finely ground onion (20g), carrot (10g), Hamcho (7.5g), egg, breadcrumbs, and Hamcho salt (0.25g).
3. Make the tofu dough round and put cooking oil (10ml) on a pan heated over a medium heat and bake it back and forth for 4 minutes until golden.

4. Put flour and butter in a pot heated over low heat to make a roo, mix milk, turmeric powder, minced onion (10g), carrot (10g), mushroom, and minced garlic (5g), and season with low-salt soy sauce (3g) and green vinegar salt (0.25g).
5. Finely grind the sauce and minced seaweed (7.5g) in a mixer.
6. Place the hamcho tofu steak in a bowl and sprinkle with sauce.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: Back ribs (150g), garlic (10g), lemon (15g)
•Seasoning: soju (10g), rosemary (1g), minced garlic (1g), pepper powder (1g), olive oil (5g)
•Dipping sauce: yogurt (10g), honey (2g), lemon juice (2g)
rcpNaTip:
•I adjusted it with lemon and lowered the sodium content.
•If you dip it without spraying the dipping sauce, you can reduce sodium intake.

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak the ribs in cold water (5 cups) to remove blood for more than an hour.
2. Slice the back ribs one by one.
3. Season the trimmed back ribs and marinate them with garlic and rosemary for about 30 minutes.
4. Roast marinated back ribs in an oven preheated to 190°C for 40 minutes, turn them over, and bake at the same temperature for another 30 minutes.
5. Make dipping sauce.
6. Put grilled back ribs in a bowl, sprinkle lemon with juice, and finish with dipping sauce.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on 2 servings
• [Home Meal Ingredients] Cabbage (200g), beef (200g), bean sprouts (80g), bokchoy (30g), shiitake mushrooms (20g), saesongi mushrooms (50g), white wood mushrooms (3g), kelp (10g), perilla leaves (5g)
• [Additional Ingredients] Tofu (150g), mustard (17g), garlic (10g), onion (35g), tomato (200g), milk (60g), perilla powder (30g), olive oil (60g), soy sauce (30g), rosemary (2 leaves=10g), salt (8g), pepper (4g), starch (15g), water (2 cups=400g)
rcpNaTip:
• We used a sauce using onions, a natural ingredient that tastes sweet, to reduce the amount of added sugar.
• Instead of butter, olive oil, milk, and perilla powder were used in the duxel sauce to increase flavor and savoryness and reduce the amount of salt used.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop shiitake mushrooms, onions, and garlic, and blanch cabbage, bean sprouts, and bokchoy in boiling water. Peel the tomatoes, remove the blood with a kitchen towel for beef, and drain the tofu.
2. Put olive oil (20g) in a pan, stir-fry the trimmed shiitake mushrooms, onions (15g), and garlic, then add soy sauce (15g), perilla seed powder, and milk to make a duck cell and cool it.

3. Stir-fry onion (20g), pour water, add kelp, pine mushroom, white pine mushroom, and tomato, boil over medium heat for 15 minutes, grind, and season with soy sauce (15g) and salt (3g) to make brown sauce.
4. Apply mustard and duck cel to beef, wrap it with perilla leaves, tofu, bean sprouts, and bokchoy, sprinkle salt (5g), pepper, put olive oil (20g) on a pan, bake beef, and add rosemary.
5. Sprinkle olive oil (20g) on a paper foil, place the blanched cabbage, place the grilled meat and Duckcel (30g) on top, roll and bake in an air fryer at 200 degrees for 10 minutes.
6. Place the wellington on a plate, add the extra Ducksel and Brown sauce and finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] Chamnamul (5g), Korean pancakes (15g), chicken breast (40g), Cheongyang red pepper (2g)
[Seasoning] Olive oil (12g), red pepper paste (10g), red pepper powder (2g), allulose (5g), pepper (1g), minced garlic (4g), sesame (1g), salt (1g), water (15m)
rcpNaTip: •I added Cheongyang red pepper to supplement the boring taste with a spicy taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Finely chop chicken breast, Korean pancakes, Chamnamul, and Cheongyang red pepper.
2. Put it in a bowl, season it with salt, and cut it into quarters to make hamburger steak.
3. Grease a heated pan with olive oil and bake hamburger steak.
4. Add red pepper paste, red pepper powder, allulose, pepper, minced garlic, and water to make the sauce.
5. Put the sauce in a heated pan and boil it down slightly.
6. Put the hamburger steak on a plate, put the sauce on it, and finish with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: 300g chicken (legs), 15g grapes, 30g mini apple, 15g pineapple, 80g starch, 20g sugar, 70g lemon, 10g rice wine, 0.2g pepper, 2g salt, 200g water
rcpNaTip: You can use fruits to reduce salt use by giving them a natural sweet and sour taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove only the flesh of the chicken legs and cut them into 4cm? 1cm pieces.
2. Season 1 with salt and pepper, then add rice wine to marinate.
3. Cut the grapes into two halves and cut the apples and pineapples into bite-sized pieces.
4. Season 2 with starch and fry 2 times in oil.
5. Add water, sugar, and lemon juice to a pan and boil a little.
6. Add water starch to the sauce to adjust the concentration and add the sliced fruit.

rcpPartsDtls: Cauliflower 25g, dried seaweed 2g, (boiled) water 500ml, Depori 2g, onion 20g, radish 20g, (seasoning) Low-salt soy sauce 1g, dried shiitake 3g, dried shrimp 3g, water 300ml
rcpNaTip: Natural seasonings made by grinding dried shiitake mushrooms and dried shrimp enhance the flavor and reduce salt use.

manualSteps.content: 1. Stir-fry the depot slightly, add the water, onion and radish, and make broth.
2. Stir-fry dried shrimp and grind it finely with dried shiitake mushrooms.
3. Cut and stir-fry cauliflower into bite-size pieces.
4. Soak the pot and stir-fry the seaweed and sesame oil.
5. Boil the broth and season with ② and low-salt soy sauce.
6. Finally, add cauliflower to complete.

rcpPartsDtls: Handon (vacation) 30g, quail eggs 30g, carrots 10g, konjac 10g, gojija 5g, onion 10g, green onion 10g, kelp 5g, garlic 10g, shiitake mushrooms 10g, low-salt soy sauce 15g
rcpNaTip: I made low-salt stewed soy sauce with yakji and vegetables, which are medicinal ingredients.

manualSteps.content: 1. Prepare the Korean pork as a situation, cut it into small pieces, and wash it.
2. Wash onions, green onions, kelp, shiitake mushrooms, and garlic and cut them into appropriate sizes, and prepare carrots and konjac by cutting them into small pieces.
3. Prepare the marinated sauce in a 2:1 ratio of water and low-salt soy sauce in a pot.
4. Boil the rice cake, onion, green onion, kelp, shiitake mushrooms, and garlic in the steward.
5. When the marinade boils, add the sage, quail eggs, carrots, and konjac and cook.
6. Put it on a plate and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g cabbages, 5g colabi, 2g cucumbers, 2g carrots, 1g silpa, 1g blue and red pepper, 5g lemon, 5g omija extract, 30g vinegar, 5g sugar, 10ml water
rcpNaTip: The sweet and sourness of Omija extract and vinegar makes it taste without salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut cabbage, colabi, cucumber and carrot into slabs.
2. Cut the lemon into ginkgo leaves, cut the red pepper sideways, and cut the thread into 1.5cm long pieces.
3. Make sweet vinegar with vinegar, sugar, and omija syrup.
4. Add vegetables, lemons, peppers, and green onions to sweet vinegar and ripen.
5. After aging, look at the color and add more omija syrup.
6. Put the aged omija nabak kimchi in a bowl.

rcpPartsDtls: Lettuce (40g), carrot (10g), cherry tomato (30g), chicken breast (60g), buckwheat noodles (90g), children's leaf vegetable (10g), vinegar (20g), soy sauce (15g), olive oil (15g), minced garlic (3g), oligosaccharide (5g), citron syrup (10g)
rcpNaTip: We reduced the use of sodium by using handmade citron oriental sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces, shred carrots, and cut cherry tomatoes into quarters.
2. Add chicken breast to boiling water (2 cups) and cook for 10 minutes, then take it out and tear it apart.
3. Boil buckwheat noodles in boiling water (2 cups) for 5 minutes, rinse them in cold water, and sieve to remove moisture.
4. Make citron extract sauce.
5. Put the prepared ingredients and children's leaf vegetables in a bowl and sprinkle with citron essential sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Sweet potato (50g), walnut (15g), milk (10ml), tofu (150g), breadcrumbs (50g), mozzarella cheese (15g), cooking oil (100ml)
rcpNaTip: You can use sweet potatoes and mozzarella cheese to taste both sweet, salty and savory.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil the sweet potato in boiling water (2 cups) for 4 minutes, remove the skin, and finely crush it.
2. Walnuts are crushed thickly.
3. Add walnuts and milk to the mashed sweet potato and mix evenly.
4. Use a kitchen towel to remove the moisture from the tofu, crush it finely, and add breadcrumbs (15g) to mix.
5. Slice the tofu thinly and add sweet potato and mozzarella cheese to make it round.
6. Slice the tofu thinly and add sweet potato and mozzarella cheese to make it round.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Eggplants (1), zucchini (½), tomatoes (1 ½), sweet pumpkin (1 piece), smoked duck (400g), garlic (6 pieces), minced onion (½ cup), minced tomato (1 cup), minced paprika (1 cup), olive oil (2 Ts), salt (0.3 Ts), pepper powder (0.3 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•We reduced the use of sugar and salt with homemade sauce instead of market sauce.
•Blanching smoked duck in boiling water can reduce sodium intake.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice eggplants, zucchini zucchini, and tomatoes into 0.3mm thick slices.
2. Microwave the sweet pumpkin for 5 minutes, and when cooked, cut off the top a little and remove the seeds.
3. Put smoked duck and garlic in a pan heated over a medium heat, stir-fry them evenly, and fill them in the sweet pumpkin.
4. Put olive oil on a pan and raise it over a low heat, add the ingredients of latatui sauce, salt and pepper, stir-fry for 10 minutes to make latatui sauce.
5. Spread the ratatui sauce in a low-height pot and cover the trimmed vegetables.
6. Place the sweet pumpkin filled with duck in the middle, spread it in 6 to 8 equal parts, and steam it for 15 minutes to finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: oyster mushroom (25g), paprika (10g each red and yellow), green bell pepper (10g), crami (10g), cooking oil (3g)
•Seasoning: Salt (1g), pepper (3g), soy sauce (1g)
rcpNaTip: •We reduced the use of salt by using the liver of the crab.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the base of oyster mushrooms, blanch them in strands, rinse them in cold water to remove moisture.
2. Shred paprika and green bell pepper, and shred crami.
3. Grease the pan and stir-fry the trimmed paprika and bell pepper.
4. Stir-fry oyster mushrooms.
5. Stir-fry crab meat and color it with soy sauce.
6. Finish with salt and pepper.

rcpNm: Ducks, sesame, mustard sauce, seasoned with vinegar
rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] Duck meat (90g), onion (10g), carrot (10g), cucumber (10g)
[Seasoning] Perilla seed powder (8g), mustard powder (4g), vinegar (10g), lemon juice (5g), water (15ml)
rcpNaTip: •We added perilla seed powder, mustard powder, and vinegar to complement the boring taste with a spicy and sour taste and add a deep taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put duck meat in a heated pan and stir-fry it over high heat.
2. Make a marinade by mixing perilla powder, mustard powder, vinegar, lemon juice, and water.
3. Shred onions, carrots, and cucumbers.
4. Chill the roasted duck.
5. Mix duck meat, trimmed vegetables, and marinade in a bowl.
6. Finish on a plate.

rcpPartsDtls:
Chicken breast 60g, red bell pepper 24g, onion 30g, yellow paprika 24g, mushroom 9g [Sauce Introduction] Sauce: 6g onion minced, 1.2g garlic minced, ketchup 9g, red tomato 12g, sugar 3g, water 18g
Italian seasoning: 0.9g time, 0.9g rosemary, 1.2g basil, oregano 1.2g
rcpNaTip: Low-sodium sauce can contain much more ketchup with low salinity than salt and soy sauce, so it is good to use in meat dishes.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut chicken breasts into 3cm dice and season with cooking oil and Italian seasoning.
2. Cut red bell pepper, yellow paprika, and onion into 3cm pieces and cut the mushroom in half.
3. Add sauce ingredients and boil.
4. Bake the chicken breast, cook it half-cooked, and place it on a skewer with vegetables.
5. Bake completely on the grill.
6. Pour the sauce over it.

rcpPartsDtls:
Chicken breast 100g [Sauce Introduction] Seasoning: yogurt 6g, cooking oil 1g, pepper 0.03g
Seasoning: soy sauce 3g, sugar 5g, honey 1g, dried red pepper 1g, Jongjong 5g, sesame oil 0.8g, green onion 10g
rcpNaTip: It is recommended that chicken be grilled in the oven without seasoning and served with low-sodium soy sauce, accompanied by it, or served just before eating.

manualSteps.content: 1. Preheat the oven to 175℃.
2. Marinate the chicken for about 30 minutes.
3. Bake marinated chicken in an oven at 175℃ for 15 minutes.
4. Add all the marinated sauce and boil it.
5. Add grilled chicken and boil for 10-15 minutes.
6. Cut the chicken into bite-size pieces and add the remaining sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g pork sirloin, 50g wet sticky rice powder [Sauce introduction] Seasoning: 1g soy sauce, 3g starch syrup, 2g minced garlic, 0.1g pepper powder, 1g radish, 0.3g redish, 1.5g perilla leaves, 3g low sodium soy sauce: 1g soy sauce, 15g pineapple, 30g water, 0.5g red pepper, 0.3g whole garlic

manualSteps.content: 1. Season pork with soy sauce, starch syrup, minced garlic, and pepper.
2. Shreddish, perilla leaves, and green onions.
3. All the sauce ingredients go to the mixer.
4. Cover the pork with glutinous rice powder twice.
5. Place pork dressed in a heated pan.
6. Place the sliced vegetables on the grilled pork and roll the meat with the sauce.

rcpPartsDtls:
Beef sirloin 38g, pear 12g, cucumber 9g, pine nuts 0.5g, cooking oil 0.5g [Sauce introduction] Meat marinade: Wine 2.5g, pepper 0.1g
Low sodium vinegar soy sauce: Soy sauce 1.3g, apple juice 3.8g, vinegar 1.3g, sugar 1.3g, wasami 0.8g
rcpNaTip: Marinate meat only with wine and pepper and do not season it. It is recommended to use low-sodium super soy sauce sauce by reducing the amount of soy sauce by about 1/5 to reduce salinity, and to sprinkle it on meat with reduced amount of soy sauce by adding apple juice instead.

manualSteps.content: 1. Trim the beef sirloin, tap it gently with the back of a knife, cut it into 4cm long pieces, and marinate it in the marinade for about 30 minutes.
2. Cut cucumbers into 0.2cm thick circles, salted them slightly, and salty them.
3. Remove the skin and seeds of the pear and cut them into 0.2 cm thick pieces in half-moon shape.
4. Add cooking oil to the pan, fry the cucumbers lightly over high heat, and the pears are golden.
5. Make beef sirloin marinated in a pan and make Cho-soy sauce.
6. Grilled beef sirloin on an earthquake belly with cucumber and pine nut powder, lightly wrapped, and dipped in low-sodium vinegar soy sauce.

rcpNm: pork sirloin steak with mushroom sauce
rcpPartsDtls: 100g pork sirloin, 45g mushroom, 15g shiitake mushrooms, 10g oyster mushrooms, 3g parsley mince, 5g butter, 0.1g pepper powder, 4g flour, 2g cooking oil, 50g white wine, 50g water
rcpNaTip: Butter sold on the market is usually salt butter, but when cooking low sodium, using salt-free butter helps reduce sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice the mushrooms and shiitake mushrooms thinly and tear the oyster mushrooms into small pieces.
2. Season the sliced pork with pepper and flour.
3. Place cooking oil in a heated pan and bake meat.
4. Push the meat aside and stir-fry the mushrooms, then add white wine and water and boil. When it's half-cooked, take out the meat.
5. Put butter in a pan to adjust the concentration of the sauce and sprinkle with minced parsley to complete the sauce.
6. Put sauce on the meat.

rcpPartsDtls: 80g of egg potatoes, 50g of beef minced, 50g of broth, 3g of starch powder [Sauce introduction] Beef seasoning: 1g of green onion minced, 1g of green pepper minced, 1g of red pepper minced, 1.2g of soy sauce, 1.2g of sugar, 0.5g of sesame salt, 1g of sesame oil, 0.1g of pepper powder, Minari leaf decoration
rcpNaTip: Steamed is usually cooked with soy sauce or salt for 2-3 percent of the time, but steamed beef potatoes are a dish that tastes well with less soy sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the potatoes and trim the bottom so that they can be split in half and placed comfortably.
2. Scoop out the top of the potatoes with a spoon.
3. Season minced beef with a lot of ingredients.
4. Starch the dug-out potatoes and fill them with seasoned beef.
5. Pour the broth to the point where the potatoes are submerged and boil.
6. When steaming is complete, add water starch to thicken it.

rcpNm: Grilled sirloin with mushroom and grape juice
rcpPartsDtls: 50g beef sirloin, 20g pine mushrooms, 50g grape juice, 80g tomatoes, 15g water, 2.5g basil, 1.3g sugar, 2g oregano, 0.5g garlic powder, 0.4g salt, 5g parsley ground, 0.2g bay leaves, 2.5g rosemary, 1g whole pepper, 2.5g thyme
rcpNaTip: In low-sodium dishes, mixing several speciﬁc spices prevents the low salinity from being well recognized due to its strong aroma.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put the meat in a glass bowl, add the rosemary, whole pepper mashed, chopped mushrooms, bay leaves, and grape juice and pickle them.
2. Combine tomato sauce, beef broth, basil, oregano, sugar and garlic powder in a small glass bowl.
3. Take out the marinated meat and cook the front and back in a heated pan.
4. Pour 1 remaining soup and 2 tomato sauce into the pan where the meat was grilled.
5. Scratch the pieces of meat attached to the pan and boil them together over medium heat to make a mushroom sauce.
6. Slice the steak and put it in a bowl and pour the mushroom sauce on top.

rcpPartsDtls: Cucumber 30g, radish 50g, red pepper 10g, paprika 20g, carrot 20g, water parsley 10g, vinegar 30g, pear 30g, red pepper powder 10g, sugar 5g
rcpNaTip: The ingredients were cut thinly without salt, reducing sodium addition.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g shrimp flesh, 20g tomato, 15g onion, 10g carrot, 15g zucchini, 3g dried radish, 3g butter, 5g ketchup, 10g pepper, 0.1g salt, 300ml water
rcpNaTip: I blanched shrimp meat to reduce salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Make broth with kelp.
2. Blanch the shrimp flesh, blanch the tomatoes, and peel them.
3. Slice tomatoes, onions, carrots, and pumpkins into edible sizes.
4. Stir-fry shrimp meat, carrots, and pumpkin in butter.
5. Put tomatoes and onions in an oiled pan and cook.
6. Boil ④, stock, and ketchup in ⑤, add pepper and season with salt to finish.

rcpNm: Nuts, octopus, and rice cake ribs
rcpPartsDtls: 80g of Donminchi, 30g of Uminchi, 40g of rice cake, 3g of octopus, 5g of pear, 3g of walnut, 3g of almond, 5g of minced garlic, 5g of minced green onions, 5g of glutinous rice flour, 1g of sesame oil, 1g of pepper, 0.5g of flour, 5g of cooking oil, 2g of jujube, 2g of pine nuts
rcpNaTip: It's seasoned with the salty taste of the octopus and made it savory with nuts.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut boiled octopus, pear, walnut, almond into small pieces, and chop green onions and garlic.
2. Turn and cut the jujube, roll it, and cut it.
3. Mix Donminji and Woominji well and ① Add ingredients, sesame oil, pepper, and glutinous rice powder.
4. Blanched and cooked rice cakes are coated with a thin layer of flour, and the dough of ③ is attached to make rib patties.
5. Place the short rib patties in a pan and bake until cooked.
6. Garnish the cut jujube and pine nuts.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g pear, 1g water parsley, 0.2g red pepper, 4g potato, 3g sugar, 2g garlic, 1g ginger, 100ml water
rcpNaTip: I used potassium-rich potatoes to help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil potatoes and grind them with water to make potato glue.
2. The boat is slaked.
3. Cut the red pepper at an angle.
4. Cut the water parsley into a size similar to that of peppers.
5. Add potato starch water, sugar, garlic, and ginger to the prepared ingredients and mix to make water kimchi.
6. Let it ripen for about a day and then eat it.

rcpPartsDtls: Korean melon 20g, onion 10g, pear 5g, green onion 3g, garlic 3g, red pepper 1g, ginger 1g, vinegar 4g, sugar 3g, yellow salt 0.5g, water 150ml
rcpNaTip: I used yeast salt that is four times lower in salinity than sea salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the skin and filling of Korean melons and cut them into edible sizes.
2. Slice pears and garlic, shred onions and green onions, and chop red pepper and ginger.
3. Add vinegar, sugar, and yeast salt to water to make soup.
4. Add Korean melon, pear, and onion to the soup and mix well.
5. Finally, add garlic, red pepper, and ginger and mix.
6. Put the dongchimi in a bowl and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: Tofu (8g), raw shrimp (45g), enoki mushroom (3g), carrot (3g), perilla leaf (1g), paprika (3g), minced beef (8g), potato starch (50g), egg white (60g), zucchini (1), low-salt soy sauce (1g), vinegar (1g), red onion (2g)
rcpNaTip: Eat it with pickled onions, so you can eat delicious zucchini sundae without seasoning it separately.

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix low-salt soy sauce, vinegar, and water (10ml) and add sliced red onion and ripen for 30 minutes to make onion pickles.
2. Put tofu, raw shrimp, enoki mushrooms, carrots, perilla leaves, and paprika in a mixer and grind them finely.
3. Stir-fry minced beef in a pan heated over a medium heat and mix it with finely ground ingredients, potato starch (45g), and egg white to make a cow.
4. Cut both ends of the zucchini, dig out the inside, and coat the inside evenly with potato starch (5g).
5. Fill the zucchini with the filling and steam it in a steamer for 8 minutes.
6. Cut zucchini sundae into 1cm thick pieces and put them in a bowl and place onion pickles on top.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] onion (1), carrot (½), tomato (2), chicken (each breast and leg 200g), whipped cream (200g), paprika (red and yellow), baguette (a little), bay leaf (1), whole pepper (5), cloves (1), yogurt (1 cup), garam masala (2 Ts), cumin powder (2 Ts), minced garlic (3 Ts), paprika powder (2 Ts), salt (1 ts), butter (2 ts)
rcpNaTip: •Seasoned with spices to reduce sodium use and preserve the traditional Indian taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut onions, carrots, tomatoes, and paprika into bite-sized pieces, and chicken into bite-sized pieces.

2. Mix the chicken with yogurt (1 cup), garam masala (1 Ts), cory and the powder (1 Ts), cumin powder (1 Ts), minced garlic (1 Ts), paprika powder (1 Ts), and salt (0.5 ts) and marinate for 15 minutes.
3. Melt butter (2 Ts) in a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry minced garlic (1 Ts), onion, carrot, and tomato for 5 minutes.
4. Bring water (⅓ cup), stock ingredients, and whipped cream to the boil, and when the carrots are cooked, finely grind them with a hand mixer and sift them.
5. Pour the ground curry into a pot, add garam masala (1 Ts), cori & the powder (1 Ts), cumin powder, (1 Ts), minced garlic (1 Ts), paprika powder (1 Ts), and salt (0.5 ts) and bring to a thick boil.

6. After alternately inserting paprika and chicken on a skewer, bake the chicken in a pan heated over a medium heat until it is cooked, put curry in a bowl, and finish with chicken skewers and baguettes.

rcpNm: Steamed beef and black bean sujebi
