rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Enoki mushroom (½ stick), oyster mushroom (½ zoom), Chinese cabbage (½ dog), chives (3 generations), eggplant (½ dog), carrot (¼ dog), white-legged shrimp (7), scallops (4), boiled black beans (½ cup), beef (bubby fan meat, 200g), bean sprouts (⅓ zoom), egg yolk (2), mugwort (⅓ zoom), mini sweet pumpkin (5), bokchoye (2), salt (0.3 Ts), whole wheat flour (¼ cup), pork potato flour (¼ cup), pork potato flour (½ cup)
rcpNaTip: •Sweet pumpkin, oyster mushrooms, black beans and potatoes high in potassium help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the bottom of enoki mushrooms and oyster mushrooms and cut them into bite-sized pieces, cut the cabbage into bite-sized pieces, and cut the crown daisy and chives into bite-sized pieces.

2. Slice the eggplant and carrot diagonally, cut the sweet pumpkin into 7-8 pieces after removing the seeds, make star-shaped cuts for shiitake mushrooms, wash the shrimp cleanly, and cut the scallops into bite-sized pieces.
3. Put boiled black beans and water (1 cup) in a mixer and grind them, put them in a bowl, mix them evenly with the black bean sujebi dough, and age them in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
4. Spread the beef for bulgogi, and roll the enoki mushrooms and chives on top.
5. In a bamboo steamer, cut vegetables, seafood, and bean sprouts are placed in order.
6. Put the meat mushroom roll on top of it and steam it over a medium heat for 10 minutes, finish with egg yolk and sauce.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] Beef(Chimchi meat) (100g), laver(3 sheets), fried powder(20g)
[Seasoning] Cooking oil (45g), minced chives (10g), minced garlic (12g), low-salt soy sauce (4g), red pepper powder (12g), sesame (20g), pepper (3g), water (15ml), water (4ml)
rcpNaTip:
•We used red pepper powder, sesame seeds, chives, and garlic, which are incense ingredients, to increase the flavor and reduce the amount of sodium and sugar used.
•We supplemented the boring taste by using laver with savory and deep taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the blood from the beef with a kitchen towel.
2. Make a sauce by mixing minced chives, minced garlic, low-salt soy sauce, red pepper powder, sesame seeds (18g), and water (4ml).
3. Mix the frying powder and water (15ml) to make the dough
4. Season the trimmed beef with pepper, chop it into bite-sized pieces, and roll it on top of seaweed to make seaweed roll.
5. Put the dough on the seaweed roll, put cooking oil on the heated pan, and bake the seaweed roll back and forth.
6. Put it on a plate and finish with the sauce and sesame seeds on top.

rcpPartsDtls: 100g chicken breast, 8g cooking oil, 2g paprika powder, 1g kien pepper, 1g onion powder, 1g garlic powder, 1g pepper, 1g white pepper powder, 0.5g oregano dry, 0.5g time dry, 1g basil, 0.5g rosemary dry *Select: 1g brown sugar

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix all spices except cooking oil.
2. Add cooking oil to the chicken breast.
3. Apply 1 spice well to only one side of chicken breast.
4. Add heated cooking oil and place chicken breast's spice burying side in contact with the pan.
5. Bake until the front and back are golden.
6. Put it in a bowl and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: Pork sirloin 100g, water 50g, sour cream 30g, shredded 4g [Sauce Introduction] Seasoning ingredients: paprika powder 3g, mustard seed 2.5g, cory & the seed 1g, onion juice 13g, garlic powder 1g

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix the seasoning ingredients over a small heat and season half with pork.
2. Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat.
3. Cook the front and back sides of the seasoned pork until the middle of the meat is pink, and transfer it to a bowl to cover it.
4. Place a pan on a high heat and pour 1 cup of water to dissolve the remaining ingredients at the bottom of the pan and boil for about 2 minutes.
5. When the water is reduced to 1/4 cup, lower the heat, add sour cream, stir with a whisk and cook for 2-3 minutes not to boil.
6. Put pork chop on a plate, put the sauce on top with a spoon, and sprinkle with shilpa.

rcpNm: Roasted chicken salad and low sodium fruit dressing
rcpPartsDtls: Chicken breast 60g, lettuce 18g, cherry tomato 18g, broccoli 20g [Sauce Introduction] Low sodium fruit dressing: 40g canned pineapple, 20g kiwi, 10g apple, 4g onion, 6g olive oil, 3.2g lemon juice, 3.2g sugar, 0.4g salt
rcpNaTip: Chicken breasts are not seasoned.

manualSteps.content: 1. Roast the chicken breasts in an oven at 170°C for 20 minutes, then tear them into small pieces.
2. Rip the lettuce into one leaf size, soak it in cold water, and drain it.
3. Cut cherry tomatoes in half after removing the top.
4. Broccoli is blanched in boiling water with pine mushrooms.
5. Put the low sodium fruit dressing ingredients in a blender and grind finely.
6. Mix the prepared ingredients together and serve with low sodium fruit dressing.

rcpPartsDtls: Pork belly 40g, green onion 5g, garlic 5g, ginger 1.5g, whole pepper 0.5g, nutritional pepper 10g, onion 2.5g, radish 15g, salt 0.1g, vinegar 1.5g [Sauce Introduction] Spicy sauce: 1g red pepper oil, 2g soy sauce, 10g balsamic vinegar, 5g low sodium tofu soybean paste sauce: 15g tofu, 2g soybean paste, 1g blue and red pepper minced, 2.5g water
rcpNaTip: The low-sodium tofu soybean paste sauce reduces the amount of soybean paste by about one-fifth and instead increases the amount of sauce by crushing tofu.

manualSteps.content: 1. Prepare pork in chunks and boil it with green onions, garlic, ginger, and whole pepper until it is ripe enough.
2. Cut leek and onion into 3cm long pieces and season lightly with spicy sauce seasoning.
3. Shred the radish, pickle it in salt, sugar, vinegar, and squeeze it.
4. Remove boiled pork and slice it thinly.
5. Serve with stir-fried pork, seasoned chives, and radishes on a plate.
6. The tofu is finely chopped and mixed with a large amount of sauce ingredients to make a low-sodium tofu soybean paste sauce and served with boiled pork.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g beef, 16g raw shiitake, 9g mushrooms, 12g oyster mushrooms, 0.4g white wood ear mushrooms, 0.4g wood ear mushrooms, 4g celery, 8g red bell pepper, 2g soy sauce, 10g stock, 0.2g pepper powder, 1g sesame oil, 9g cooking oil [Sauce introduction] Beef seasoning: 2g starch, 2g egg

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice beef into thick pieces.
2. Season the shredded beef with starch and eggs.
3. Wash mushrooms and vegetables and chop them into 0.3cm thick pieces.
4. Stir-fry beef in a frying pan.
5. Add vegetables and mushrooms and stir-fry once more.
6. Boil soy sauce, Jongjong, and pepper in the broth, then add sesame oil at the end.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g octopus, 20g octopus, 80g raw noodles, 20g cabbage, 13g onion, 13g oyster mushrooms, 13g shiitake mushrooms [Sauce Introduction] Stir-fried sauce: 8g green pepper, 5g red pepper, 15g green onion, 13g oyster sauce, 2g spicy pepper powder, 2g salt, 0.2g
rcpNaTip: Octopus and jukkumi can be eaten without seasoning, so stir-fry them without seasoning them with vegetables, and make a sauce and put them right before eating.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash octopus and jukkumi in salt water and trim them, respectively.
2. Cut the octopus into 5cm long pieces.
3. Slice the vegetables into 10cm slices each.
4. Make the sauce.
5. Blanch raw noodles in boiling water.
6. Add cooking oil to a heated pan and stir-fry vegetables, then add noodles and sauce and stir-fry enough.

rcpPartsDtls: Sea bream 100g, pepper powder 0.1g, flour 4g, cooking oil 12g, white wine 50g, water 50g, parsley 1g [Sauce Introduction] Mediterranean sauce: 20g tomatoes, 10g olives, capers 3g, onion minced 5g, garlic minced 2g, tomatoes 15g, basil 3g

manualSteps.content: 1. Dried sea bream with pepper and flour.
2. Peel and slice tomatoes and cut olives into 0.8cm dice.
3. Put cooking oil in a pan, add sea bream and cook, then add white wine.
4. Add the sauce ingredients and water to boil and boil in half.
5. Remove the sea bream and sprinkle the remaining sauce in the pan with minced parsley powder.
6. Serve with sea bream and sauce on a plate.

rcpPartsDtls: Shrimp 13g, Mosi Shell 15g, oyster 25g, shell 5g, squid 10g, angelica leaf 2.5g, cabbage leaf 2.5g, celery leaf 2.5g, 1 million pine mushroom 2.5g, mugwort 1.3g, enoki mushroom 1.3g, konjac 2.5g, sweet pumpkin 5g [Sauce Introduction] Sesame sauce: 9g seafood, 3.8g roasted sesame seeds, 5.8g pinnet butter, 0.5g cooking wine, 1g vinegar, 1g Tabisco sauce, 1g thick soy sauce

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the intestines of the shrimp, peel the squid and cut it diagonally inside into 5x6cm pieces.
2. Shake oysters in salt water and wash them in three halves, and soak ramie clams in salt water to defrost them.
3. Cut the konjac into 2x4cm pieces and twist it with a sheath in the center, tear the mushrooms and prepare.
4. Prepare crown daisy, celery, and angelica leaves by tearing off only the leaves, and stir and slice the cabbage leaves.
5. Grate sesame seeds and mix all other ingredients to make peanut sauce.
6. Pour kelp soup into a pot, season it lightly with salt, and cook seafood and vegetables alternately and dip them in the sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g mackerel, 4g flour [Sauce Introduction] Low sodium balsamic sauce: 1g soy sauce, 13g olive oil, 6g balsamic vinegar, 4g honey
rcpNaTip: Mackerel is a salt-free ecology and is grilled to a brown color.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the trimmed mackerel into 5cm long pieces and add a sheath to the shell.
2. Flour the cut mackerel.
3. Preheat the oven to 200℃.
4. Mix soy sauce, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and honey to complete the sauce.
5. Place mackerel in pan and bake in oven.
6. Serve with low sodium balsamic sauce and roasted mackerel.

rcpPartsDtls: 25g sea snail, 13g onion, 0.8g green onion, 25g cucumber, 13g water parsley, 3g perilla leaf [Sauce Introduction] Low sodium red pepper paste sauce: 1g red pepper powder, 1g ginger juice, 10g apple juice, 10g sugar, 2g red pepper paste, 3g sesame salt, 1.3g sesame oil, 1g garlic minced red pepper, 5g red pepper, 5g red pepper

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred onions and green onions and cut cucumbers half a month.
2. Chop the water parsley and perilla leaves into small pieces.
3. Drain the sea snail and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
4. Soak the green onion in ice water.
5. Make low-sodium red pepper paste sauce.
6. Season just before making a bet and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g oysters, 20g tofu, 1g garlic minced, 2g shimpa, 0.3g seaweed, 0.5g salted shrimp, 0.2g salt, 1g sesame oil, 100g kelp stock, 1g red pepper
rcpNaTip: The soup should be 100-150g and the seasoning should be 0.7%.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash oysters clean with salt and drain them.
2. Cut the tofu into 2x2x1cm pieces and cut the thread into 2cm pieces.
3. Grill the seaweed and tear it into small pieces or cut it with scissors.
4. Chop the peppers and remove the seeds.
5. Boil the kelp stock, add tofu and oysters, boil them together, add salted shrimp and minced garlic, and boil them once in a while.
6. Add shilpa and red pepper and seaweed and sesame oil at the end.

rcpPartsDtls: 12g beef (wool), 23g pork (battery), 1.3g bellflower root, 2.2g apple, 2.2g pear, 1.7g kan lotus root, 9g tomato, 9.5g kanyang onion, 1.3g pine mushroom, 11.4g carrot, 2.3g green bell pepper, 7g egg, 5g breadcrumbs, 6.6g pineapple, 3g cherry tomatoes, 1.2g butter, 1.2g flour, 0.8g lemon, 1g pepper, 1g ginger, 0.1g salt
rcpNaTip: I made puree using lotus roots, tomatoes, pears, and pineapples with a lot of potassium.

manualSteps.content: 1. The bellflower, apple, pear, and lotus root are ground to make puree.
2. Finely chop all vegetables, including lotus root, tomato, onion, mushroom, carrot, green bell pepper, etc.
3. Put puree, egg, pepper, ginger and breadcrumbs in the meat, knead them until they are smooth, flattened, and bake in the oven.
4. Stir-fry flour and butter to make a roo.
5. In ④, boil the chopped vegetables in ②, and sprinkle with salt and lemon juice.
6. Roasted handmade hamburger steak, decorated in the order of sprout vegetables-pineapple-drop tomatoes, and served with sauce.

rcpPartsDtls:
•Essential ingredients: radish (20g), pear (10g), melon (10g), garlic (1g), salted shrimp (0.5g), ginger (0.5g), shrew (1g)
•Seasoning: Red pepper powder (1g), sesame seeds (0.5g)
rcpNaTip: •Fruit kkakdugi is not salted, so the sodium content is lowered.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut pear and Korean melon into 1-1.5cm pieces.
2. Cut the radish into 1-1.5cm pieces.
3. Cut the green onion into 1cm long pieces.
4. Finely chop salted shrimp, garlic, and ginger.
5. Make a marinade by mixing red pepper powder, salted shrimp, garlic, ginger, and sesame seeds.
6. Mix pear, Korean melon, radish, and green onion with sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Boiled spaghetti (80g), potatoes (10g), Parmesan cheese powder (a little), children's leaf vegetable (a little), beet (40g), olive oil (30g), Sriracha sauce (5g), garlic (10g), mini sweet pumpkin (70g), whipped cream (100g), sugar (3g)
rcpNaTip: It was flavored with the spicyness of the beet sauce and the sweetness of the sweet pumpkin sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add the beet sauce ingredients to the blender and mix in the finely ground spaghetti.
2. Cut the mini sweet pumpkin into small pieces and cook in boiling water for 3 minutes.
3. Finely grate the cooked mini sweet pumpkin in a mixer, adjust the concentration with whipped cream, season with sugar to make sweet pumpkin sauce.
4. Slice the potatoes thinly into shape.
5. Stir-fry the sliced potatoes in a pan heated over a medium heat for 2 minutes to make them crisp and break them into small pieces.
6. Pour sweet pumpkin sauce into a bowl, add spaghetti mixed with beet sauce, and finish with children's leaf vegetables, Parmesan cheese powder, and chopped potatoes.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Cucumber (⅓), onion (⅓), paprika (red, yellow ½), acorn jelly (250g), seaweed noodles (1 pack = 180g), stevia (0.3 Ts), vinegar (1 Ts), soy sauce (0.5 Ts), sriracha sauce (1 Ts), plum syrup (0.5 Ts), minced garlic (1.5 Ts), sesame seeds (0.5 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•Seasoned with Sriracha sauce and reduced the use of sodium.
•We used stevia to reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred cucumbers, onions, and paprika in the same length, and shred acorn jelly into 2-3cm thicknesses.
2. Soak the onion in cold water for 5 minutes to remove the spicy taste, and rinse the seaweed noodles in cold water to remove the spicy taste.
3. Make the marinade.
4. Place seaweed noodles in the middle in a bowl, and place the trimmed vegetables and roasts on top.
5. Finish with the marinade.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Onions (3p), garlic (5p), potatoes (1p), paprika (red and yellow ⅓), carrots (½), broccoli (½), chicken sticks (20p), canned hole tomatoes (2 cans=822g), whipped cream (1 cup), Parmesan cheese powder (1 cup), bay leaf (1 sheet), salt (0.5 Ts), pepper powder (5 Ts), olive oil (5 Ts), white wine (⅓ cup), turmeric (1 Ts), coriander powder (0.5 Ts), cumin (1 Ts), cumin (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
• Tomatoes and potatoes high in potassium help release sodium.
•We used onions to sweeten and reduce the use of added sugar.
•Salt-free butter can reduce sodium intake.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onions and garlic, cut potatoes, paprika and carrots into bite-sized pieces, and remove broccoli only from pine mushrooms.
2. Season the chicken stick for 15 minutes.

3. Put olive oil in a pan heated over a medium heat, add minced onions and garlic and stir-fry the onions until they are brown, add white wine and stir-fry until they are self-made, add bay leaves and hall tomatoes, crush them, and boil for 5 minutes.
4. Mix the turmeric, coriander powder, cumin, redcrushd pepper, basil powder, oregano powder, cool it down, and grind it finely in a mixer to make tomato sauce.
5. Put butter on a pan heated over a medium heat and cook it back and forth until golden.

6. Stir-fry the trimmed vegetables in the same pan, add roasted chicken sticks and tomato sauce and boil them for 10 minutes, and add whipped cream and Parmesan cheese powder to boil until they become self-made.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Onion (½), cocktail shrimp (14), rice paper (8 sheets), perilla leaves (3 sheets), potato starch (2 Ts), pepper powder (1 ts), lemon juice (1 ts), minced garlic (2 ts), olive oil (2 ts), minced garlic (1 ts), oligosaccharide (1 ts), parsley powder (1 ts)
rcpNaTip:
•I used low-salt, potassium-rich potato starch instead of flour
•I added spices and lemon juice instead of salt to enhance the flavor.
•Instead of sugar or honey, we added a small amount of oligosaccharide to make it sweet and lower calories.

manualSteps.content: 1. Finely chop onions and perilla leaves, and finely chop cocktails shrimp after washing them cleanly.
2. Add seasoning to minced onions, perilla leaves, and shrimp, mix evenly, and make plump shrimp dough.
3. Dip rice paper in hot water (4 cups) and take it out and place it on a cutting board coated with cooking oil.
4. Put the shrimp dough in a zipper bag, cut the tip with scissors, squeeze the dough on the rice paper, and roll it to make shrimp sauce.
5. Place the shrimp sauce on a pan heated over a medium heat with cooking oil and bake until the outside turns white.
6. Place in a bowl and finish with garlic sauce on top.

rcpNm: Gamtae salad rolls and mushroom rolls
rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main Ingredients] Gamtae (2g(2 sheets)) rice paper (60g), lettuce (80g), red pepper (20g), dried shiitake (5g), oyster mushroom (10g), mandarin mushroom (10g), green pepper (5g), green onion (5g), garlic (5g)
[Seasoning] Mayonnaise (18g), Whole Grain Mustard (6g), Pineapple Cheong (6g), Grilled Soy Sauce (3g), Oyster Sauce (6g), Oligosaccharide (10g), Vinegar (8g), Sesame Oil (6g), Cooking Oil (20g)
rcpNaTip:
•I used potassium-rich eckloniae to help release sodium.
•We used mushrooms that are rich in umami to reduce the amount of sodium and sugars used.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred lettuce and red vegetables and dip them in cold water. Make a salad dressing by mixing mayonnaise, hole grain mustard, and pineapple syrup.

2. Remove the water from the blanched oyster mushrooms, mandarin mushrooms, and soaked dried shiitake mushrooms, chop them, stir-fry them in a preheated pan, and season them with thick soy sauce and sesame oil (3g).
3. Place on rice paper and wrap in bite-sized pieces. Put cooking oil (10g) on a preheated pan and bake.
4. Put the drained lettuce and red vegetables on rice paper, wrap them, and then put them on top of the seaweed and cut them into bite-sized pieces.

5. Put cooking oil (10g) on a preheated pan and stir-fry minced green pepper, red pepper, green onion, and garlic to make a kanpung sauce by adding oyster sauce, oligosaccharide, vinegar, and sesame oil (3g).
6. Place on a plate and finish with salad dressing and kkanpung sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Geumtae 50g, salt 0.1g, white pepper powder 0.1g, Cheongju 3g, ginger juice 3g, starch powder 1g, bean sprouts 16g, water parsley 12g, oyster mushroom 16g, red pepper 0.8g, carrot 10g, green onion 4g, radish 16g [Sauce Introduction] Steamed sauce: 100g of seaweed soup, 2g of soy sauce, 2g of cooking wine, 1g of vinegar
rcpNaTip: Usually, spicy steamed dishes have a salinity of 2-3%, so if you steam the fish as it is or sprinkle it with mild steamed sauce, it becomes a light fish dish with less fishy taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. After removing the gills and intestines, add a sheath to the body and season it with salt, white pepper, rice wine, and ginger juice.
2. Wipe off the moisture of the gilt and evenly coat it with starch powder.
3. Remove the head and tail of the bean sprouts, cut the water parsley into 7cm long pieces, tear the oyster mushrooms into thick pieces, and slice red peppers, green onions, carrots, and radishes.
4. Make a steamed sauce by mixing soy sauce, cooking wine, and vinegar with kelp broth.
5. Place sliced radishes and carrots in a steamer and steam them with starchy sea bream and steamed sauce.
6. Sprinkle with medium sauce and steam oyster mushrooms, water parsley, red pepper, bean sprouts, and shredded green onions.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g seaweed, 8g garlic, 5g ginger, 1.3g sesame seeds [Sauce introduction] Soy sauce: 30g water, 2g soy sauce, 2g sugar, 1g starch syrup, 1g vinegar, 1g red pepper

manualSteps.content: 1. Kim picks out the tea.
2. Chop red pepper, garlic and ginger finely.
3. Boil all the soy sauce marinade over low heat for about 20 minutes to cool.
4. Cut seaweed into 12 to 18 pieces in a good size to eat.
5. Mix garlic, ginger and red pepper in seasoned soy sauce.
6. Stack the seaweed one by one and pour the seasoned soy sauce on top.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g saury, 0.1g pepper powder, 4g flour, 8g starch powder, 2g cooking oil [Sauce introduction] Low sodium red pepper paste sauce: 2g tomato ketchup, 2g red pepper paste, 2g garlic, 2.4g ginger juice, 4g red pepper minced, 2g red pepper minced, 20g starch syrup, 1g soy sauce, 75g water, 5g cooking wine
rcpNaTip: Fish are baked without salt and eaten by sprinkling a little sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. The head and intestines of saury are removed, trimmed, and cut.
2. Season the trimmed saury with pepper and rice wine.
3. Remove the moisture from the marinated saury and coat it with flour.
4. Grill the floured saury in the pan until golden.
5. Put the low-sodium red pepper paste sauce ingredients in a pan and boil them down slightly.
6. Sprinkle the saury with the sauce.

rcpNm: Crab meat and sweet and sour crab
rcpPartsDtls: Blue crab 120g, pepper powder 0.3g, green pepper 1g, red pepper 1g, tomato ketchup 4g, garlic 1.3g, ginger 0.5g, ginger juice 4g, glutinous rice powder 8g, cooking oil 10g [Sauce introduction] Spicy red pepper sauce: spicy red pepper powder 1.3g, cooking wine 8g, soy sauce 2g, starch syrup 10g

manualSteps.content: 1. Trim the crab well.
2. Season the trimmed crab with ginger juice and pepper.
3. Cut green and red peppers in all directions of 0.7cm and chop ginger.
4. Mix all the ingredients of the spicy pepper sauce, put them in a pot, boil them, add the prepared vegetables and boil a handful.
5. Put glutinous rice powder on the crab and fry it.
6. Add to the sauce of 4 and mix.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g octopus, 30g silpa, 3g dried seaweed, 0.5g ssamdashima, 10g carrots [Sauce introduction] 1g red pepper paste, 2g vinegar, 2g sugar, 5g apple juice, 1g red pepper powder
rcpNaTip: The low-sodium gochujang sauce is a sauce that reduces the amount of gochujang to 1/5 compared to the regular gochujang sauce and adds apple juice and red pepper powder instead to complement the taste and quantity.

manualSteps.content: 1. Trim the intestines of octopus and rub them with flour to wash.
2. Blanch the washed octopus slightly in boiling salt water and remove the legs one by one.
3. Blanch the thread, blanch the soaked seaweed and kelp, and cut them appropriately.
4. Slice the carrots and prepare them.
5. Wrap the blanched octopus half by half with shimpa, seaweed, and kelp.
6. Make low-sodium gochujang sauce and accompany it.

rcpPartsDtls: Octopus 50g, cucumber 20g, chestnut 15g, water parsley 15g, pear 30g, red bell pepper 12g [Sauce Introduction] Pineapple sauce: 20g pine nuts, pear juice 37.5, white pepper powder 0.1g lemon juice 5g, salt 0.3g
rcpNaTip: Grinding pine nuts provides a base for a soft sauce with a rich and savory scent of pine nuts. Even if perilla seed powder is added, it becomes a sauce that goes well with low sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. The octopus is floured and washed with running water.
2. Blanch it in boiling water and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
3. Cut the middle seeds of cucumbers, cut them into eyebrow shapes, and cut red bell pepper and water parsley into 5cm long pieces.
4. Shred pear into thick pieces and thinly sliced chestnuts.
5. Finely chop the pine nuts and put them in a powder mill, add pear juice little by little, add the pure juice, lemon juice, white pepper powder, and salt.
6. Mix the prepared ingredients with the pine nuts sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 100g of tofu, 16g of sorasal, 16g of shellfish, 0.2g of salt [Sauce introduction] Garlic olive oil sauce: 0.2g of garlic, 7g of olive oil, 0.6g of basil mince, 8g of cherry tomatoes
rcpNaTip: Baked dishes are a suitable recipe to eat without adding salt as a baked aroma.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut tofu into 4x1.5x1cm pieces and sprinkle salt to remove moisture.
2. Remove the internal organs and cut them in half. Peel off the dirty membrane around the shell, clean it, and divide it into two to three parts.
3. Chop the basil leaves.
4. Put minced garlic in a bowl, season with salt, stir in one direction while adding olive oil little by little, and add minced basil to make garlic olive oil sauce.
5. Put tofu and seafood one after another on a skewer and spread the sauce evenly with a brush.
6. Bake in a preheated 250°C oven or grill until golden.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g tofu, 60g hemp, 3.5g dried shiitake mushrooms, 6g squid, 0.2g salt, 0.1g pepper powder, 0.8g starch, 4.8g cooking oil, 0.5g red pepper [Sauce introduction] Marinade: 1.5g soy sauce, 1.5g crude art, 0.5g sugar, 0.5g vinegar

manualSteps.content: 1. Wrap the tofu in a small window and crush it.
2. Peel the skin and grind it to a steel plate.
3. Chop the red pepper, soak the shiitake mushrooms in water, and chop them finely. Cut the squid into small pieces.
4. Mix all the tofu, hemp, and minced ingredients and season with salt and pepper.
5. Scoop out a spoonful of dough and bake in a pan with cooking oil until golden.
6. Mix the ingredients together to make the sauce

rcpPartsDtls: Anchovy medium 10g, glutinous rice flour 5g, cooking oil 2g, peanut 13g [Sauce Introduction] Red pepper paste sauce: 2g red pepper paste, 0.5g soy sauce, 10g onion juice, 1g garlic juice, 0.5g ginger juice, 5g cooking wine, 3g sugar, 3g starch syrup, 2g cooking oil, 0.3g sesame oil, 4g black sesame, 5g shilpa

manualSteps.content: 1. Pick out the tea for anchovies, select them, and slice the green onions.
2. Put cooking oil in a pan and add sauce seasoning to reduce heat to concentration.
3. Only 1/3 of the glutinous rice flour is soaked in water and cooled down.
4. Cook the grass lightly on anchovies and coat them with the remaining glutinous rice powder.
5. Set the temperature of the frying oil to 170-180℃, and quickly fry 4 anchovies.
6. After cooling, toss or pour over the sauce in (2).

rcpNm: Seaweed, water, squid, soft tofu, first time
rcpPartsDtls: 25g of soft tofu, 25g of soaked seaweed, 25g of water squid, 4.2g of kkari peppers [Sauce introduction] Low sodium seasoning: 2.5g of red pepper paste, 0.8g of soy sauce, 1g of starch syrup, 0.8g of lemon juice, 0.8g of vinegar, 0.2g of garlic minced, 1g of ginger juice, 0.2g of green onion minced, 0.1g of sesame oil, 0.2g of sesame seeds

manualSteps.content: 1. Scoop soft tofu with a small spoon.
2. Cut the soaked seaweed into 4cm long pieces.
3. Peel the squid and blanch it with a sheath.
4. Cut the blanched squid into pine cones.
5. Blanch the pepper.
6. Put the ingredients nicely and serve with the marinade.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g of bean sprouts, 20g of clam meat, 5g of chives, 5g of carrots [Sauce introduction] Boiled soybean paste: 1g soy sauce, 1g of rice wine, 1g of sugar, 1g of ginger juice, 0.5g of garlic minced

manualSteps.content: 1. Rinse the clam meat with light brine and drain it.
2. Cut chives into 2-3cm lengths and cut carrots short.
3. Put all the ingredients of the stew in a pot and when it boils a little, add the clam meat and blanch it slightly to take it out.
4. Add 3 cups more water to a pot of 3 and add carrots to boil down until about 2/3 of the marinated area.
5. Stir-fry in another pan without oiling it until it is drizzled.
6. Pour all 4 into 5 and add shredded chives and blanched clam meat and stir-fry them until the seasoning is evenly distributed.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g smoked salmon, 0.01g white pepper powder, 2.4g starch powder, 3.8g cucumber, 15g Radish, 7.5g celery, 7.5g pear [Sauce Introduction] Low sodium pineapple sauce: 3g pineapple, 4.5g pineapple canned soup, 3.6g olive oil, 1.5g lemon juice, 4.5g apple, 0.2g salt, 1.5g sugar
rcpNaTip: In the case of low-sodium pineapple sauce, the amount of salt is reduced by more than one-fifth, but pineapple juice is a sauce that can be eaten without feeling bland because it is combined with sugar and olive oil.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut salmon into dice.
2. Sprinkle a little bit of white pepper powder and coat it with starch powder.
3. Starch-coated salmon is steamed in a steaming steamer and cooled down.
4. Finely chop cucumbers, radishes, celery, and pears, soak them in cold water, and then pick them up.
5. Finely chop the canned pineapple and grate it in a blender with a quantity of ingredients.
6. Place prepared vegetables and steamed salmon on a plate and serve with sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Squid 80g, carrot 17g, spinach 17g, egg 19g, shiitake mushroom 7g, cooking oil 1.4g, flour 1.1g [Sauce Introduction] Tomato Ketchup Sauce: 1.1g of minced garlic, minced onion 1.1g, tomato Ketchup 2g, water 60g, pepper 0.1g
rcpNaTip: Ketchup has a lower salinity than red pepper paste or soy sauce, so adding ketchup to cook it refreshingly can complement low-sodium cooking.

manualSteps.content: 1. After peeling the squid, blanch it by putting a diagonal cut inside.
2. Cut carrots, spinach, and soaked shiitake mushrooms into 0.5cm thick slices.
3. Blanch spinach in boiling water, rinse it in cold water, and drain it.
4. Beat the egg well, make a thick egg roll, and slice it like a carrot.
5. Remove the moisture from the squid, sprinkle a little flour, add all the ingredients of 2 and 3 and roll it up like rolling kimbap and fix the two places with a skewer.
6. Mix the ingredients of the tomato ketchup sauce and boil it in a pan, add 4 squid, add the sauce, boil it, and cut it into 1.5cm thick pieces.

rcpNm: Squid bossam and low sodium soybean paste sauce
rcpPartsDtls: Cuttlefish 50g, carrot 9g, cucumber 9g, lettuce 7g [Sauce Introduction] Low sodium soy sauce: 1.6g soy sauce, onion 1.3g, water 6.6g, vinegar 0.4g, sugar 0.2g, green pepper 0.2g, red pepper 0.2g
rcpNaTip: Cut soybean paste to 1/5 of the usual amount and add onion, green pepper, and red pepper into small pieces to increase the volume.

manualSteps.content: 1. Squid is split in half to remove the skin and cut diagonally inside the torso.
2. Blanch the cut squid in boiling water.
3. Cut the blanched squid into bite-sized pieces.
4. Cut cucumbers into 3cm long pieces, and cut carrots into 4cm long pieces.
5. Make a low-sodium soybean paste sauce by mincing onions, green and red peppers for dressing and mixing them with a small amount of ingredients.
6. Eat the prepared squid, cucumbers, carrots, and low-sodium soybean paste sauce on lettuce according to your preference.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g white shrimp, 4g ketchup, 6g green onions, 3g starch powder, 6g flour, 10g eggs, 4g peas, 5g cooking oil, 0.5g sesame oil [Sauce introduction] Low sodium chile sauce: 1g soy sauce, 3g red pepper oil, 6g sugar, 2g garlic, 0.2g ginger, 2g rice wine, 3g vinegar
rcpNaTip: Low-sodium chili sauce can complement the taste of low-sodium by adding red pepper oil.

manualSteps.content: 1. Trim the shrimp to remove the water.
2. Make fried clothes with eggs, starch powder, and flour and coat them with shrimp.
3. Fry the fried shrimp twice in 170℃ cooking oil.
4. Chop green onions, garlic, and ginger.
5. Put red pepper oil in a pan and stir-fry 2. Add rice wine, bean sprouts, and ketchup to stir-fry. Add water and season with sugar and vinegar.
6. Slightly boil down, add fried shrimp and peas, adjust the concentration with water starch, and finally add sesame oil.

rcpNm: Lotus root salad, black sesame sauce
rcpPartsDtls: Black sesame 30g, lotus root 80g, lemon 20g, mayonnaise 15g, plain yogurt 15g, vinegar 5g
rcpNaTip: The black sesame in the sauce helps release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the lotus root after washing it.
2. Slice the lotus root.
3. When vinegar is added to water and boiled, blanch the lotus root.
4. squeeze lemon juice.
5. Mix black sesame, mayonnaise and plain yogurt to make black sesame sauce.
6. Serve the lotus root with black sesame sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g pork, 20g beef, 20g sweet pumpkin, 10g onion, 1g garlic, 7g carrot, 20g egg, 5g breadcrumbs, 50ml milk, 2g soy oil, 0.4g salt, 0.1g pepper, 3g oligosaccharide
rcpNaTip: Instead of a high-sodium commercial sauce, it was accompanied by handmade sweet pumpkin sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Steaming sweet pumpkin, dig out the filling, boil it with milk and oligosaccharide to make sauce.
2. Chop beef, pork, onions, garlic, and carrots all into small pieces.
3. Add breadcrumbs, eggs, salt, and pepper to ② and beat them.
4. Make the chidan dough round and flat.
5. Grease the pan and bake until golden.
6. Serve the hamburger steak with sweet pumpkin cream sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 80g pear, 5g chives, 5g red pepper powder, 3g plum extract, 2g sugar, 1g sesame seed
rcpNaTip: I mixed the pear with red pepper powder and plum syrup without salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel a pear.
2. Slice the peeled pear into pieces.
3. Cut chives into bite-sized pieces.
4. Mix pear and chives with red pepper powder to cut the color.
5. Add plum syrup and sugar and mix sweet and sour.
6. Sprinkle sesame seeds to complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: cherry tomato (60g), onion (70g), paprika (120g), jalapeno (10g), smoked chicken breast (40g), sesame bread (45g), mozzarella cheese (30g), parsley powder (1g), sugar (0.5g), salt (0.5g), lemon juice (15ml), pepper powder (0.5g)
rcpNaTip: We reduced the use of sodium by flavoring it with light chicken and pungent and sour salsa sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut cherry tomatoes, onions, paprika, jalapeno, and smoked chicken breasts into small pieces.
2. Mix the seasoning evenly with the trimmed ingredients.
3. Cut out the top 1cm of sesame bread.
4. Fill the bread with the mixed ingredients and add mozzarella cheese.
5. Put the filling bread in an oven preheated to 180℃ and bake it for 5 minutes.
6. Place the baked bread in a bowl and sprinkle with parsley powder.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Broccoli (¼), zucchini (½), lemon (½), onion (½), yellow paprika (¼), cherry tomatoes (five), garlic (side eight), salmon fillet (270g), rosemary (three stalks), olive oil (1 Ts), lemon juice (3.5 Ts), olive oil (7 Ts), salt (slight), pepper powder, minced onion (½ cup)
rcpNaTip:
•We reduced the use of sodium by seasoning it with lemon juice.
•We saved the original taste of fruits and vegetables and reduced the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the broccoli only, cut zucchini and lemon into 4mm thick rounds, cut onion and yellow paprika into bite-sized pieces, cut cherry tomatoes into quarters, and remove the top of garlic.
2. Put lemon juice in a bowl, pour olive oil little by little, and mix evenly with a whisk.
3. Add salt, pepper powder, and minced onion to lemon juice mixed with olive oil, mix evenly to make lemon sauce, mix with salmon and marinate for 15 minutes.
4. Lay zucchini, salmon, lemon, and rosemary on paper foil in order, and place the trimmed vegetables on top.
5. Sprinkle with olive oil (1 Ts), turn both ends of the paper foil, and make two or three small holes.
6. When the steam rises in the steamer, add salmon, cover and cook for 25 minutes on high heat to finish.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: Tteokbokki rice cake (40g), green onion (3.5g), onion (7g), cooking oil (3g)
•Seasoning: ketchup (8g), Sriracha (3g), oligosaccharide (2g), minced garlic (2g), soy sauce (1g), sesame oil (1g), sesame seeds (0.5g)
rcpNaTip: •We used ketchup and Sriracha instead of red pepper paste to save the sweet and spicy taste and reduce sodium intake.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch tteokbokki rice cakes in boiling water.
2. Place blanched rice cake on a skewer.
3. Chop green onions and onions.
4. Make the sauce by mixing minced onions and green onions with the sauce ingredients.
5. Add cooking oil to the pan and stir-fry the sauce.
6. Put the sauce on the rice cake skewers and finish with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] Chives (30g), onions (10g), pears (15g)
[Seasoning] Minced garlic (8g), red pepper powder (8g), anchovy sauce (6g), low-salt soy sauce (3g), lemon juice (10g), sesame seeds (4g)
rcpNaTip:
•I used pears to take advantage of the sweetness of fruits instead of sugar.
•We used chives to increase flavor and reduce sodium usage.

manualSteps.content: 1. Trim the chives and cut them into 5-6cm pieces, and slice the onions thinly by removing the roots and skin.
2. Remove the skin of the pear, divide it into eight equal parts, and remove the seeds to slice it.
3. Make the sauce by mixing minced garlic, red pepper powder, anchovy sauce, low-salt soy sauce, lemon juice and sesame seeds (2g)
4. Drain chives, onions and pears.
5. Put it in a bowl and mix it with the sauce.
6. Put it on a plate and finish with 2g of sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g soft tofu, 35g avocado small, 50g crab meat frozen, 25g onion, 0.25g mint [Sauce introduction] Wasabi dressing: 6g horseradish ground, 1g soy sauce, 0.2g salt, 10g lemon juice, 30g olive oil extra
rcpNaTip: Low sodium sauce is low in salt, so it complements the taste when used with strong flavored spices such as horseradish

manualSteps.content: 1. The avocado is selected with a black light and a glossy flow, and the blade is vertically put in to turn once the blade touches the seed.
2. Hold both ends of the avocado with both hands, twist them in half, and poke the seeds into the inside edge of the blade to take them out.
3. Slice avocado pulp into 5cm thick slices.
4. Transfer frozen crabmeat to the refrigerator overnight, or thaw at room temperature before tearing into small pieces. Shred the onion thinly and cut the mint into small pieces.
5. Mix horseradish dressing ingredients.
6. Dip tofu in a circular frame, add onion, crab meat, avocado, add mint, and sprinkle with dressing.

rcpPartsDtls: 5g gelatin, 100g grapefruit juice, 20g canned tangerine, 5g canned pineapple, 15g cherry, 15g sugar

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak gelatin in water.
2. Add sugar to grapefruit juice and heat it.
3. Add soaked gelatin to dissolve gelatin over low heat.
4. Put tangerines, pineapples, and cherries in a mold.
5. Add the grapefruit juice melted with gelatin to the mold.
6. Cool it in the refrigerator and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: 150g peach, 100g sikhye, 20g sugar syrup, 0.1g mint

manualSteps.content: 1. Peaches are cut in half and seeds are dug out with only about 0.5cm left in thickness.
2. Add peaches, sikhye, and sugar syrup and grind them thickly in a blender.
3. Freeze 2 in the freezer for 4 to 5 hours, scrape it with a spoon every hour to make a sherbet.
4. Peaches that have been hollowed out are also frozen in the freezer and used as sherbet bowls.
5. Scoop out the 3 peach sikhye sherbet and put it in a frozen peach bowl.
6. Decorate it with mint.

rcpPartsDtls: Cheondo Peach 30g, Plum 20g, Cherry 40g, Raspberry 20g, Blueberry 10g, Apple 30g, Grape 10g, Grape Juice 50g, Sugar 20g

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the cheondo peach in half to remove the seeds, divide each into two, and split the plum in half to remove the seeds.
2. Cut the apple into eight pieces to remove the seeds.
3. Remove grapes from the egg, remove the cherry from the top, and prepare blueberries and raspberries in portions.
4. Put grape juice, sugar, and prepared fruit in a pot and boil over low heat.
5. Turn off the fire when the peach softens and the grape juice is concentrated.
6. Put the boiled fruit and juice together on a plate.

rcpPartsDtls: Onion 15, green bell pepper 15g, eggplant 10g, zucchini 18g, mushroom 8g, garlic minced 2g, tomato conkase 10g, potato 50g, olive oil 1g, chicken broth 15g, tomato paste 8g, whipped cream 8g, milk 8g, salt equivalent, pepper appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: Potatoes are easily crushed when they are hot, so work before they get cold. Tomato concase means that the skin is peeled and the seeds are removed and cut.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop garlic, and cut onion, green bell pepper, eggplant, zucchini, and mushroom into 1cm dice.
2. Blanch tomatoes in boiling water, peel them, remove seeds, and cut them into the same size as vegetables.
3. Peel the potatoes, cut them into large pieces, boil them, and when they are fully cooked, remove moisture from the oven and mash them with milk, whipped cream, salt, and pepper.
4. Add oil to the pan and stir-fry the onion until it becomes transparent, then stir-fry with garlic and tomato paste, then stir-fry with green bell pepper, eggplant, pumpkin, mushroom, and tomato.
5. When the vegetables are soft, add chicken broth and boil it again, season with salt and pepper.
6. Place the finished mashed potatoes on a plate and place the vegetable stew on top of it.

rcpPartsDtls: 15g sweet potato, 40g rice, 40g water, 8g kimchi, 95g apple, 1g sesame oil, 1g garlic minced [Sauce1] soy sauce, 1g soup soy sauce, 1g red pepper powder, 1g minced garlic, 1g sesame seeds, 1.5g sesame oil, 0.5g sesame oil
rcpNaTip: When cooking rice with vegetables, it is recommended to accurately determine the amount of water so that it does not lose strength due to moisture from the ingredients, and to ensure that rice and water are equal.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut sweet potatoes into 1cm dice.
2. Slice the kimchi washed in water and fry it in a pan covered with sesame oil, add garlic and salt, and finish with sesame seeds.
3. Put the soaked rice, sweet potatoes, and stir-fried kimchi in a pot and cook the rice.
4. Cut the top of the apple, dig out the inside, and fill it with rice.
5. Put the rice-filled apple in an oven preheated to 160℃ and bake it until the apple is cooked.
6. Mix the ingredients of the marinade to make the marinade and serve with rice.

rcpPartsDtls: Pork (for bulgogi) 120g, pineapple 35g, cabbage 15g, onion 10g, carrot 7g, green onion 5g, sugar 5g, leek 1g, garlic 2g, sesame oil 3g, soy sauce 5g
rcpNaTip: Even if you use less soy sauce with pineapple, you can make it flavorful.

manualSteps.content: 1. Dip pork in running water to remove blood.
2. Cut some pineapples into bite-size pieces and grind the rest in a blender.
3. Make a marinade by mixing ground pineapple and seasoning.
4. Mix the blood-removed pork with the sauce and marinate it.
5. Grease a frying pan and stir-fry seasoned pork and sliced vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
6. Add the chopped pineapple.

rcpPartsDtls:
•Must-have ingredients: Biri vegetables (70g), onion (10g), garlic (3g), ginger (1g)
•Kidama stock: water (200g), kelp (5g)
•Seasoning: Soybean paste (2g), red pepper paste (1g), mayonnaise (2g), red pepper powder (1g)
•Seasoning: Sesame (1g), sesame oil (4g)
rcpNaTip: •The use of salt was reduced by blanching fish greens in kelp broth to enhance the flavor.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the greens into appropriate lengths, blanch them in kelp broth, rinse them in cold water, and drain them.
2. Chop the onion into 2mm thick pieces and finely chop the ginger and garlic.
3. After finely mince the soybean paste, filter it through a sieve with a large hole to save the texture and mix it with red pepper paste, mayonnaise, and red pepper powder.
4. Mix minced ginger and garlic in the sauce.
5. Add onions and marinade to the greens and season evenly.
6. Mix lightly with sesame oil and finish with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: 3g beef (both sides), 20g radish, 30g alto, 15g green onion, 10g oyster mushrooms, 10g bracken, 10g bean sprouts, 10g red pepper powder, 3g perilla leaves, 15g perilla powder, 3g salt, 3g soy sauce
rcpNaTip: You can use perilla seed powder to create a deep taste without using salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak the sun in cold water to remove blood.
2. Boil the brisket and radishes in a pot and pick up the brisket.
3. Soak the altoran in rice water for about an hour and boil it in salt water to remove the taste.
4. Trim various vegetables and tear the sunsets that have been taken out.
5. Boil the trimmed vegetables and Yangji in the broth.
6. Add red pepper powder and perilla powder and boil.

rcpNm: Braised fruit pork belly & seasoned green onions
rcpPartsDtls: 70.8g pork (pork belly), 2.8g of sprout vegetables, 3.5g of kkangpa, 1.5g of pineapple, 1.5g of pear, 1.5g of apple, 2g of kkangyangpa, 1.2g of ginkgo soy sauce, 1.2g of kkang garlic, 0.3g of kkanggang, 0.17g of red pepper powder, 1g of lemon, 0.4g of vinegar, 0.1g of sugar, 0.1g of soy sauce,
rcpNaTip: I used fruit to reduce the use of soy sauce and sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Pork belly is prepared in chunks and boiled.
2. Grind pears, apples, pineapples, onions, peeled garlic, and peeled ginger and boil them with soy sauce.
3. Add boiled pork belly to ② and cook it glossily.
4. Chop the green onion into thin slices, and wash the sprout vegetables cleanly.
5. Mix vegetables with a sauce made with lemon juice, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, and red pepper powder.
6. Serve with pork belly cut into bite-sized pieces and ⑤.

rcpPartsDtls: About 60g of pangon, 2g of chives, 7g of paprika (red, yellow, and blue), 30g of giant squid, 30g of white kimchi, 3g of brewed vinegar
rcpNaTip: I didn't use sugar or salt. I used the sweetness of white kimchi and paprika

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice the konjac thinly and blanch it, then pickle it in white kimchi broth.
2. Add vinegar to boiling water and boil the squid lightly so that it is not tough.
3. Paprika is shredded.
4. White kimchi removes moisture.
5. Spread konjac, add squid and paprika and roll them with white kimchi.
6. Make a knot with the blanched leek so that it doesn't unravel.

rcpNm: Sweet and sour red pepper chicken
rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] twisted red pepper(2 zoom=100g), onion(½), dried red pepper(3) garlic(10 pages), green onion(1 unit), chicken meat(400g), white pepper powder(0.3Ts), cooking oil(8Ts), sesame(0.3Ts), starch(2Ts), egg white(1 unit), oyster sauce(1.5Ts), oligosaccharide(1Ts), minced garlic(0.5Ts), ginger powder(0.5Ts), pepper powder(0.25Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•Be careful not to use too much oyster sauce because it is also high in sodium.
•The subtle scent of oil made of dried peppers, garlic, and green onions gave it a non-irritating taste.
•We used onions to reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the garlic, onion, and dried peppers into 3cm long pieces, halve the garlic, and cut the green onion into small pieces.
2. Cut the chicken meat into 4×4cm pieces, mix it with white pepper powder, and coat it with the ingredients of the frying cloth.
3. After pouring cooking oil on a pan heated over a low heat, stir-fry red pepper, garlic, and green onion to make oil.
4. Add the fried chicken flesh and fry it until golden, then add the onion and stir-fry it until it becomes transparent.
5. Put the sauce on a high heat and stir-fry it quickly, then stir-fry it for 10 seconds with kkari pepper and take it out.
6. Sprinkle sesame seeds to finish.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Tofu (1 mo = 300g), paprika (red and yellow ¼), perilla leaves (4 sheets), multigrain rice (70g), canned tuna (50g), stevia (0.5 Ts), soy sauce (0.5 Ts), sesame oil (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•When using processed foods such as canned tuna, blanching in water or pouring hot water can reduce sodium intake.
•We used stevia to reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put tofu in a large bowl and place a heavy bowl of water for 3 minutes to remove moisture.
2. Dig out the tofu into a square shape, and squeeze the water out of the dug tofu.
3. Chop the paprika and perilla leaves into small pieces.
4. Sift canned tuna in a sieve and pour hot water to remove oil and salt.
5. Put mashed tofu, trimmed vegetables, mixed rice, and tuna in a bowl, season and mix evenly.
6. Make the rice ball round and finish it by putting the filling in the tofu.

rcpPartsDtls:
Based on one serving
[Main ingredients] Young radish (30g), tote (10g), garlic (3g), ginger (1g)
[Seasoning] Fish soy sauce (5g), red pepper powder (2g), sesame seeds (2g)
rcpNaTip:
•To reduce the amount of sodium used, I used young radishes without pickled radishes.
•We used fish soy sauce to increase the flavor and reduce the amount of sodium used.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the tots several times in clean water, blanch them slightly in boiling water, and drain them
2. Cut young radish into 3cm pieces.
3. Blanch the trimmed young radishes slightly in boiling water and drain them.
4. Chop garlic and ginger into small pieces.
5. Put the chopped young radishes, tots, garlic, and ginger in a bowl and season with red pepper powder and fish soy sauce.
6. Put it on a plate and finish with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g minced onion, 10g minced green bell pepper, 2g minced garlic, 2g minced green pepper, 35g cod meat, 30g tomato conkase, 1g peanut butter, 13g whipped cream, 1g paprika powder, 20g shrimp, 1g olive oil, proper amount of salt, proper amount of pepper
rcpNaTip: Shrimp becomes tough when heated too much, so put it in and cook it later.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onion, green bell pepper, garlic, and red pepper, and cut cod meat into thick pieces.
2. Blanch the tomatoes, peel them, remove the seeds, and slice only the pulp.
3. Stir-fry onions and peppers in an oiled pan, then add garlic and stir-fry.
4. Add whipped cream and peanut butter and boil them in order of tomato, paprika, and shrimp.
5. Add sliced cod meat.
6. Season with salt and pepper.

rcpPartsDtls: 15g millet, 10g jujube, 5g kanbam, 10g glutinous rice powder, 70g water, salt equivalent
rcpNaTip: You can use glutinous rice flour instead of millet.Prepare glutinous rice water by mixing glutinous rice and water in a 1:1 ratio.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the millet and soak it.
2. Put jujube and peeled chestnuts in a pot, add 4 cups water, and boil the jujube until it is ripe.

rcpNm: Soybean paste boiled pork with water
rcpPartsDtls: Front leg pork (for bossam) 100g, onion 40g, green onion 20g, salted soybean paste 4g, whole pepper 1g, bay leaf 1g, ginger powder 2g, minced garlic 4g
rcpNaTip: It was cooked with the moisture of the vegetable itself, and the original taste of the ingredients was saved and the use of salt was reduced.

manualSteps.content: 1. Make a cut on the flesh of the front leg of the pork.
2. Pork is aged by coating it with soybean paste, ginger powder, minced garlic, whole pepper, and bay leaves.
3. Cut green onions and green onions into large pieces and prepare them.
4. Place onion and green onion in bottom of pot or oven container.
5. Put the aged pork on ④ and heat it for about 50 minutes to cook it completely.
6. Serve cut into 0.5cm thick slices.

rcpPartsDtls: Cucumber 80g, pear 50g, red bell pepper 5g, green bell pepper 5g, yellow bell pepper 5g, vinegar 3g, sugar 6g, water 100ml, pickling spice 1g
rcpNaTip: You can make low-salt pickles with the sweet and sour taste of pickles and fresh vegetables.

manualSteps.content: 1. Divide the cucumber into three pieces and dig out the filling.
2. Cut bell peppers and paprika into U-shape.
3. Shred the pear.
4. Fill the center of the cucumber with paprika and pear.
5. Add water, vinegar, sugar and pickling spice to make pickle water.
6. Add pickle water to ④ and let it ripen for about 30 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: Dried vegetables (10g), dried pollack mushrooms (20g), soaked rice (80g), soaked konjac rice (60g), minced pork (20g), eggs (1), Chamnamul (10g), soy sauce (7g), sesame oil (3g), salt (1g), cooking oil (3ml)
rcpNaTip: Chamnamul is a food ingredient high in beta carotene and potassium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak dried vegetables and dried shiitake mushrooms in hot water (200ml) for 30 minutes.
2. Put soaked rice, konjac rice, soaked dried vegetables, and water (100ml) in a rice cooker and press the cooking button to cook rice.
3. Put the soaked shiitake mushrooms in a pan that is chopped and heated over medium heat, add minced pork, soy sauce (5g), and sesame oil (2g) and stir-fry them for 3 minutes to take out.
4. Put cooking oil (3ml) on another pan heated over medium heat and add eggs to make scrambled eggs.
5. Blanch the Cham greens in boiling water (300ml) for 1 minute, rinse them in cold water, and mix them with salt (1g), soy sauce (2g), and sesame oil (1g).
6. Put chwinamul konjac rice in a bowl and put roasted mushrooms, meat, scrambled eggs, and seasoned Chamnamul on top.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Chicken (1), onion (1), green onion (1), water parsley (½ zoom), pine mushroom (3), enoki mushroom (1 bag), garlic (6 pages), mushroom (4), egg (1), starch (0.7 Ts), soy sauce (0.5 Ts), salt (0.3 ts), pepper powder (slightly)
rcpNaTip: •The broth with onions, green onions, and water parsley gave it a non-irritating taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the chicken clean and prepare it, and divide the onion and green onion into quarters.
2. Cut the mushroom into thick pieces in shape, cut the enoki mushroom at the base and cut it into pieces, and cut the water parsley into bite-sized pieces.
3. Put the chicken in a pot and pour enough water to soak, add onions, green onions, water parsley (½ content), and garlic, raise it to a high heat, and boil it until the chicken is cooked.
4. Take out the chicken, onion, and water parsley, cool it down, and then remove the meat from the chicken.
5. Mix chicken, onion, remaining water parsley, eggs, and starch evenly to make chicken balls.
6. Add chicken balls, mushrooms, enoki mushrooms, mushrooms, and leftover water parsley to the broth, season with seasoning, and boil it a little to finish.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] lettuce (2 sheets), apple (½), tortilla (4 sheets), Shred mozzarella cheese (slightly), onion (⅛), paprika (⅛), tomato (½), jalapeno pickles (4 pieces), Sriracha sauce (1 Ts), stevia (0.5 Ts), avocado (½), salsa sauce (1 Ts), lime juice (1 Ts), unsweetened plain yogurt (2 Ts), mayonnaise (1 Ts), minced garlic (1 Ts), parsley powder (0.5 Ts), lime juice (1 Ts), lime juice (1 T)
rcpNaTip: •Avocados and tomatoes high in potassium help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred lettuce, sliced apples into thin slices, and chopped onions, paprika, tomatoes, and jalapeno pickles.
2. Add the remaining salsa sauce ingredients to the minced onions, paprika, tomatoes, and jalapeno pickles and mix evenly.
3. Remove the seeds and skin from the avocado, mash evenly and mix evenly with the rest of the guacamole ingredients.
4. Make garlic yogurt sauce.
5. Place the tortilla on a dry pan heated over a low heat and bake for 1-2 minutes to take out, then wrap it in a glass of beer to shape it.
6. Put shredded lettuce, apple, and shred mozzarella cheese on a tortilla and finish with salsa sauce, guacamole, and garlic yogurt sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g pork neck minced, 20g bok choy, 10g ketchup, 5g green onion minced, 5g ginger minced, 5g starch, salt equivalent
rcpNaTip: To prevent the shape of the meatball from being broken, put lukewarm water in a bowl of the meatball so that the shape of the meatball is not broken.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put minced meat, green onions, ginger, salt, and water starch in a bowl, mix them evenly, and add ketchup.
2. Hit 1 in one direction and let the meat be marinated.
3. Cut bok choy into 1cm square shapes.
4. Hit it again so that it becomes tenacious in 2, and make it into a 1.5cm diameter round shape.
5. Put water in a pan and cook it when it boils.
6. Add bok choy, boil it slightly, season it with salt, and boil it more so that the sauce remains a little.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g ripe persimmon, 40g banana, 10g raw chestnut, 5g jujube, 5g walnut
rcpNaTip: Be careful not to oversize the size of the raw chestnut so as not to strain the child's weak teeth.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the skin from the saury and crush it.
2. Bananas are sieved.
3. Mix 1 and 2 well.
4. Slice raw chestnuts flat.
5. Turn the jujube, peel it, remove the seeds, and shred it.
6. Season 3, 4, and 5 well and put them in a bowl.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g sweet potato, 20g castella, 5g milk, 2g butter, 3g honey, 20g raisins, just the right amount of salt
rcpNaTip: For sweet potatoes, choosing chestnut sweet potatoes is good to control the concentration of the dough.

manualSteps.content: 1. Steam sweet potatoes in a steamer.
2. Peel the sweet potato and finely sieve it.
3. Cut off the brown part of the top of the castella and grind it finely in a mixer to powder.
4. Mix milk, butter, honey, and salt in 2 and knead.
5. Put one or two raisins in the dough of 3 and make a dumplings.
6. Coat the dumplings with castella powder.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g tofu, 10g perilla leaves, 10g flour flour, 2g baking powder, 10g sugar, 20g egg, 3g black sesame, salt equivalent

manualSteps.content: 1. Squeeze the water out of tofu using a cotton cloth and crush it finely.
2. Mix flour and baking powder and sieve.
3. Put the mashed tofu in a bowl, add sugar, eggs and black sesame seeds, and stir well with a whisk.
4. Add sliced perilla leaves to 3 and knead them with 2 flour.
5. Sprinkle lightly with flour on the cutting board, push 4 into 2mm thick pieces, and cut into rectangles 1cm wide and 4cm long.
6. Place the cut dough in an oven pan and bake for 10 minutes in an oven preheated to 180℃.

rcpNm: Tofu and sweet red bean jelly
rcpPartsDtls: 2g of chija, 1g of white lotus vinegar powder, 30g of tofu, 2g of agar, 10g of sugar, 40g of water
rcpNaTip: It is recommended to soak agar in lukewarm water before using it.

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak the dental flakes in warm water to brew the color, and dissolve the white lotus vinegar powder in water.
2. Squeeze the water out of the tofu on a cotton cloth and crush it with a knife.
3. Put the necessary amount of agar in two pots, add 1 each, and soak for about 30 minutes.
4. Divide the mashed tofu into three halves, add sugar, and mix evenly.
5. Place 4 in a shape frame and let it harden in the refrigerator.
6. When the yokang hardens, it is turned upside down in lukewarm water for a day.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g of rice, 20g of small anchovies, 5g of sesame seeds, 5g of sugar

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove blemishes from the small anchovies and stir-fry lightly in an ungreased pan.
2. Add 1 sesame seeds and sugar to the cooked rice and mix evenly.
3. Put 2 in a square frame, wrap it, and push it flat with a push rod.
4. Dry 3 in a well-ventilated place.
5. Place 4 in oven preheated to 175℃ and bake until rice is crisp.
6. Crush it into bite-size pieces and put it on a plate and sprinkle with sugar.

rcpPartsDtls: 5g of Omija, 30g of Cheondo Peach, 10g of pear, 10g of sugar, 45g of water, 1g of pine nuts, the same amount of sugar serum sugar and water are slowly dissolved over medium heat. Make it to your liking.
rcpNaTip: Omija is angry and buys the dried one well.

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak Omija in 7 times more water for 8 hours so that the taste and color come out.
2. Cut the cheondo peach into 0.5cm dice and sprinkle it with sugar for about 30 minutes.
3. Dip the pear into a shape frame, cut it into 0.3cm thick pieces, and pickle it in sugar.
4. Sift the omija soup with cotton cloth and adjust the sweetness with syrup.
5. Add peach and pear to 4.
6. Float pine nuts and ice on 5.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g apples, 60g grape juice, 2g cinnamon powder, 30g ice cream
rcpNaTip: Apples use watery, hard tissue.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the whole apple seed.
2. Cut 1 into 2cm thick pieces.
3. Put apple and grape juice in a pot and slowly boil over medium heat.
4. Place the boiled apples in the refrigerator to cool them down.
5. Place apples on a plate and sprinkle with cinnamon powder.
6. Scoop ice cream on 5 and top it.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g frozen ripe persimmon, 5g omija, 35g water, 4g lemon juice, 5g honey, 1g mint
rcpNaTip: Omija is recommended to be cooked at room temperature and brewed in a glass or saucer bowl.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel and remove the frozen saury.
2. Cut 1 into small pieces.
3. Simmer omija in 7 times more water for more than 8 hours so that the taste and color come out.
4. In a blender, add ripe persimmon, omija water, honey, and lemon juice and grind them together.
5. Put 4 in a cup.
6. Decorate with mint.

rcpPartsDtls: Buckwheat flour 20g, glutinous rice flour 20g, water 20g, salt equivalent [small ingredients] Kimchi 20g, squid 30g [seasoning] sugar 5g, sesame salt 1g, green onion minced 4g, garlic minced 3g, sesame oil 1g
rcpNaTip: When cooking kimchi, add various vegetables to eat.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put salt in buckwheat powder, flour, and glutinous rice powder and lower it in a sieve, then add boiling water to knead it.
2. Slice the kimchi and peel the squid and chop it thickly.
3. Grease a heated pan and stir-fry kimchi, then stir-fry squid and cool.
4. Remove the dough and make it into a 10cm round shape, then put 3 in the center and fold it into a half-moon shape to form a shape.
5. Put a cotton cloth on a steaming steamer and steam it for 14 minutes, then simmer for about 5 minutes.
6. Cool it down and put it on a plate.

rcpPartsDtls: Grain rice black rice black beans 50g, pizza cheese 20g, onion 10g, green bell peppers 8g, red bell peppers 8g, mushrooms 10g, ham 5g, canned corn 10g, shilpa 5g [pizza sauce] garlic minced 2g, onion minced 5g, beef minced 5g, tomato ketchup 8g, sugar 3g, soy sauce 1g, pepper powder appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: Add only the amount of water so that the grains of rice fall off each other.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add a small amount of water to the multigrain rice and release the grains of rice.
2. Bake 1 on both sides in an ungreased pan until golden in thickness of 0.4 cm.
3. Slice onions, green, red bell pepper and ham into appropriate sizes and drain the canned corn.
4. Put cooking oil in a pot, stir-fry minced garlic, minced onions, and minced beef, then add tomato ketchup and water to boil down and season with sugar, soy sauce, and pepper.
5. Spread 4 evenly over the nurungi and sprinkle the topping ingredients, pizza cheese, and chopped green onions on top.
6. Bake number 5 in a preheated oven.

rcpPartsDtls: 125g small sweet pumpkin, 20g small shrimp, 20g tofu, 10g dried pomegranate, 10g green bell pepper shaker, 10g red bell pepper shaker, 5g shilpa, 8g flour, 3g garlic, 1g sesame salt, 1g sesame oil, 1g salt, 1g white pepper powder
rcpNaTip: It is also good to make rice and nuts together in sweet pumpkin.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the surface of the sweet pumpkin cleanly to remove moisture, cut the top of the top, dig out the filling with a spoon, and sprinkle with salt.
2. Chop the shrimp flesh, wrap the tofu with cotton cloth, remove the water, crush it finely, chop the dried shiitake mushrooms, green and red bell pepper finely, and chop the thread green onions.
3. Mix the ingredients of 2 and season them with salt, minced garlic, sesame salt, sesame oil, and white pepper powder to make a cow.
4. Remove moisture from the inside of 1.
5. Sprinkle the inside of 4 with a little flour and make sure the flour is evenly coated.
6. After filling the prepared cow, cover the cut top with a lid, steam it in a steaming steamer for about 20 minutes, and divide it into 4-6 portions.

rcpPartsDtls: Tofu 80g, kiwi 20g, orange 20g, tomato 20g, banana 20g, apple 20g, honey 10g, salt equivalent, cooking oil 5g
rcpNaTip: If possible, buy a hard one for tofu.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut tofu into 3cm dice and season with salt.
2. Cut the fruit into 5mm dice and mix it with honey.
3. Put 1 in an oiled pan, earthquake 5 sides golden and remove grease with a paper towel.
4. Use a spoon to carefully dig out the unspoiled side of 3.
5. Fill the hollow tofu with 2.
6. Decorate it with mint

rcpPartsDtls: 20g shrimp, 5g red bell pepper, 5g enoki mushrooms, 15g bean sprouts, 3g radish leaves, 5g lettuce, 5g chives, rice noodles, 20g rice paper [sweet sauce] onion, 5g garlic, 1g red pepper, 1g blue pepper, 1g water starch, a little bit of vinegar, 1g sugar, a little bit of red pepper oil
rcpNaTip: It's also fun to prepare all the ingredients and have kids roll up the rolls.

manualSteps.content: 1. After dealing with boiling water, cool the shrimp by immersing it in cold water and peel it.
2. Slice the red bell pepper thinly and prepare the enoki mushrooms by cutting the base, blanch the bean sprouts in boiling water, cool them in cold water, drain them, and shred the lettuce.
3. Boil rice noodles in water, blanch them in boiling water, and cool them in cold water to remove moisture.
4. Soak rice paper in warm water, take it out, place it on a cotton cloth, remove the water slightly, raise 1, 2, 3 and roll it carefully.
5. Chop garlic and chop onion, red pepper, and green pepper into 0.3mm pieces.
6. Put red pepper oil on the pan and stir-fry minced garlic, add onion, add blue and red pepper, stir-fry slightly, add water, vinegar, and sugar, and adjust the concentration with water starch.

rcpNm: sea bream coated with lemon and parsley breadcrumbs
rcpPartsDtls: Sea bream 40g, garlic minced 2g, bread crumbs 10g, butter 1g, lemon juice 3g, lemon zest 2g, parsley minced 2g, salt equivalent, pepper equivalent
rcpNaTip: Zest: Refers to thinly cut and mince the skin of lemons, oranges, etc.

manualSteps.content: 1. Season sea bream with salt and pepper and chop garlic and parsley.
2. Put the minced garlic in a butter pan and make the garlic-flavored butter water.
3. Mix breadcrumbs in 2 and transfer them to a mixing bowl.
4. Add chopped parsley, lemon juice, lemon zest, salt and pepper to 3 and mix well with a rubber spatula.
5. Season the sea bream and put 4 on top of the sea bream.
6. Bake 5 in the oven.

rcpPartsDtls: 80g flour gravy, 2g yeast, 20g warm water, 1g salt, 1g olive oil, 10g green bell pepper, 10g red bell pepper, 5g bacon, 10g onion, 5g sheep pine, 5g tomato sauce, 12g mozzarella cheese, 1g basil, 1g oregano, 2g parmesan cheese
rcpNaTip: You can use tortilla or baguette bread when it is difficult to ferment pizza dough.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put flour in a bowl, make a puddle in the center, melt it with warm water and yeast, add salt, mix flour little by little, and knead the dough.
2. Once the dough is lumped together, wrap it in plastic wrap and ferment it in a warm place for about 30 minutes.
3. Spread the fermented dough with a roll.
4. Cut the top of the green and red bell pepper and cut it into a ring shape to remove the wick, and slice bacon, onion, and Yangsongi.
5. Transfer 3 to an oven pan, add tomato sauce and add the prepared ingredients and pizza cheese.
6. Roll out the dough, put a sheath in the top, and bake in an oven preheated to 175℃.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: chicken meat (90g), green onion (10g), radish (70g), onion (20g), red pepper (5g), garlic (3g), cheongyang red pepper (5g)
•Boiled ingredients: chicken bone (200g), kelp (3g), green onion (5g), garlic (2g), water (600g)
•Seasoning: Pepper (5g)
rcpNaTip: •We made a thick broth with chicken bones and vegetables to lower the sodium content.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the chicken meat and chicken bones thoroughly, add water, garlic, green onions, and kelp, and boil the broth.
2. When the chicken meat is cooked, take it out and tear it into small pieces.
3. Slice radishes, slice green onions, red peppers, and cheongyang peppers at an angle, and chop onions and garlic.
4. When the broth comes out, strain the broth through a sieve.
5. Stir-fry garlic in a pot, add chicken, stir-fry it together, add stock and trimmed vegetables, and boil it.
6. Season with pepper to finish.

rcpNm: Water parsley mushroom meat roll & wild vegetable sauce
rcpPartsDtls: 80g of pork loin, 24g of saesong mushrooms, 18g of water parsley, 0.3g of pepper, 15g of sticky rice powder, 5g of Chamnamul, 5g of Chwinamul, 10g of olive oil, 2g of peanuts, 1g of Parmesan cheese, 1g of garlic
rcpNaTip: I seasoned the wild vegetable sauce with parmesan cheese instead of salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Sirloin is molded extensively.
2. Shred mushrooms are long cut, and water parsley is cut into similar sizes.
3. Wrap the meat with water parsley and pine mushroom and bake it with glutinous rice powder.
4. Grate Chamnamul, Chwinamul, Olive Oil, Peanuts, Garlic, and Pepper in a mixer to make the sauce.
5. Mix parmesan cheese with sauce.
6. Serve grilled meat with sauce.

rcpNm: Seasoned with sweet and sour cucumber paprika
rcpPartsDtls: 10g cucumber, paprika(red/yellow) 5g each, 2g vinegar, 2g sugar
rcpNaTip: Raw vegetables without a pickling process can reduce salt intake.

manualSteps.content: 1. Scrub cucumbers with thick salt and wash thoroughly.
2. Cut cucumbers into appropriate thicknesses and cut them into quarters.
3. Wash paprika clean and remove the seeds.
4. Cut paprika into appropriate sizes.
5. Mix vinegar, sugar, and water to make sweet vinegar.
6. Mix cucumbers and paprika with sweet vinegar.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: lettuce (60g), carrot (10g), red cabbage (10g), chicory (5g)
•Sauce: apple (20g), pineapple (15g), lemon juice (1g)
rcpNaTip: •It was accompanied by handmade dressing instead of a high sodium-rich commercial dressing.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the lettuce clean and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
2. Chop carrots and red cabbage finely, and chop chicory finely.
3. Remove the skin and core of the apple and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
4. Remove the peel and shim from the pineapple and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
5. Put the trimmed fruit and lemon juice in a mixer and grind them finely to make a dressing.
6. Place lettuce, carrots and red cabbage on a plate and finish with dressing.

rcpPartsDtls: Spinach 70g, green onion 5g, garlic 5g, perilla powder 15g, sesame seeds 5g, perilla oil 5g, salt 5g
rcpNaTip: We reduced the use of salt by adding perilla powder and perilla oil to the spinach vegetable seasoning.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop green onions and garlic.
2. Boil water and salt in a pot.
3. Blanch the washed spinach.
4. Rinse the blanched spinach in cold water, squeeze the water, and cut it into bite-size pieces.
5. Add perilla powder, green onions, garlic, sesame seeds, and perilla oil to spinach and season.
6. Put it on a plate and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Eggplants (1), cucumbers (1), rice (400g), salt (0.4 ts), kelp powder (2 ts), plum vinegar (2 ts), sesame oil (2 ts), sesame seeds (2 ts)
rcpNaTip: •I used kelp powder instead of salt to reduce sodium intake and add umami.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice eggplants and cucumbers vertically.
2. Pickle the sliced cucumbers in salt (0.2ts) for 10 minutes and squeeze out the water.
3. Place the sliced eggplant on a dry pan heated over low heat and bake it back and forth until golden.
4. Add the remaining seasoning to the rice and mix evenly.
5. Put rice together in bite-sized pieces on salted cucumbers and roasted eggplant.
6. Roll it up and finish it in a bowl.

rcpPartsDtls:
80g beef corgi, 40g saesongi mushrooms, 4g flour, 1g pine nuts.
[Ddeokgalbi seasoning] 5g soy sauce, 5g pear juice, 5g onion juice, 4g honey, 5g minced green onions, 3g minced garlic, 1g sesame salt, 1g sesame oil, 1g pepper powder
rcpNaTip: Pine powder must be used in a soft way by laying paper or paper towels.

manualSteps.content: 1. Finely chop beef.
2. Add the marinade of tteokgalbi to the minced beef and season it evenly.
3. Cut the pine mushroom into 1.5cm wide and 6cm long and coat it with flour.
4. Make tteokgalbi by wrapping 2 on 3 with 1cm left on top and bottom of mushrooms.
5. Bake in pan not to burn back and forth.
6. Sprinkle with pine nuts.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g cabbage, 30g egg, 20g pork, 3g ginger mince, 2g soy sauce, 10g wood ear mushrooms, 10g chicken broth, 10g water starch, 3g cooking oil, salt equivalent

manualSteps.content: 1. Take off the leaves of the cabbage, cut it into large pieces, and tear it into 3cm long pieces.
2. Put the cabbage in a heated pan with oil, stir-fry it slightly, and remove moisture.
3. Beat in the eggs and cook in the pan.
4. Stir-fry shredded pork in a pan, add green onions, minced ginger and soy sauce, and stir-fry again.
5. Add wood ear mushrooms, cabbage, and eggs to 4 and mix well.
6. Add stock, salt, and water starch to 5.

rcpNm: a pork sirloin dish with apples and onions
rcpPartsDtls: Pork sirloin 100g, oregano dry 1g, basil dry 1g, olive oil 1g, onion 15g, apple 20g, salt equivalent, whole pepper 2g
rcpNaTip: Pork smells less and tastes good when used after removing blood using a paper towel.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice pork sirloin about 4cm thick.
2. Mix the dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and whole pepper in a bowl to make a herb mix and coat it evenly in 1.
3. Heat the pan, coat it with olive oil, bake it brown on both sides of the sirloin, wrap it in aluminum foil and cook it completely in the oven.
4. Slice the onion, remove the skin and seeds of the apple, and slice thinly.
5. Grease another pan and fry the onions and apples until light brown while the meat is fully cooked.
6. When the meat is done, take it out, cut it into appropriate thickness, and serve with stir-fried onions and apples.

rcpNm: Richie and fries stuffed with shrimp
rcpPartsDtls: Shrimp 60g, egg white 10g, shilpa 5g, water chestnut minced 15g, salt equivalent, pepper equivalent, rich can 35g, potato 30g, starch 3g [sauce] Oleb oil 1g, minced onion 3g, minced ginger 1g, minced garlic 1g, red pepper oil 0.5g, vinegar 3g, sugar 1.5g, pepper equivalent, starch 1g, minced lemon peel
rcpNaTip: Water chestnuts and lychees can be canned.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop the shrimp into small pieces and mix it with the whites, salt and pepper to let it soak.
2. Mix 1 with chopped water chestnuts and green onions, then fill the drained lychee with a paper towel.
3. Put starch on a filling lychee and fry it in oil.
4. Add olive oil to a heated pan and lightly stir-fry onion, garlic and ginger mince.
5. Add water, red pepper oil, sugar, salt, and pepper to 4. Season and adjust the concentration with water starch.
6. Peel the potatoes, slice them thinly with a shredder, soak them in water, remove the starch, fry them, and put them on a plate and put 3 and 4.

rcpNm: Steamed glutinous rice with fish meat
rcpPartsDtls: Sticky rice 30g, chija 5g, spinach 10g, carrot 10g, white fish 100g [white fish seasoning] Egg white 15g, ginger juice 2g, salt equivalent, white pepper powder appropriate amount, starch 3g
rcpNaTip: If you don't have dental flakes, you can use them or grind vegetables and put them together to use color.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash glutinous rice thoroughly, soak it in water for about 40 minutes, drain it, mix it with a little salt, and transfer it to a dry cotton cloth to remove moisture and crush it about half.
2. Blanch spinach in salt water, rinse it in cold water, squeeze the water, and chop the carrots into small pieces.
3. For white fish, squeeze the water with a cotton cloth, chop it finely, and add ginger juice, salt, and pepper powder while beating it so that it becomes tenacious.
4. Add egg whites and starch to 3 so that the teeth will continue to stick, then mix with chopped spinach and carrots.
5. Remove 4 little by little to make a fish meatball and coat 1.
6. Lay a wet cotton cloth in a steamer, place the fish balls so that they do not stick together, and steam them for about 20 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: Oatmeal 15g, honey 5g, plain yogurt 18g, almond 5g, apple 8g, raisin 4g, milk 30g, cinnamon powder equivalent, banana 10g, kiwi 10g
rcpNaTip: Using oligosaccharides, functional sugars, instead of honey, can reduce calories and increase lactobacilli in the intestine.

manualSteps.content: 1. Stir-fry almonds in an ungreased pan until light brown.
2. Remove the skin from the apple and cut it into dice.
3. Peel the banana and kiwi and cut them into the same size as the apple.
4. Put honey, plain yogurt, and milk in a bowl and mix well.
5. Put oatmeal in a clean bowl and mix well with 4.
6. Place the prepared fruit, almonds, and raisins on 5 and sprinkle with cinnamon powder according to preference.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g onion, 3g jalapeno, 10g beef ground, 10g tomato bean case, 10g lettuce, 10g olive oil, 1g tortilla 8-inch 30g, avocado 6g, sour cream 3g, salt equivalent, pepper powder appropriate amount [Gangnang bean puree] 40g kidney beans, 2g bacon, 1g garlic, 10g onion, a little bit [salsa] pear 3g orange 3g, lemon juice 2g, paprika powder 1g
rcpNaTip: Jalapeno buys bottled or replaces it with cheongyang red pepper.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onions and jalapeno into small pieces, and blanch tomatoes in boiling water to remove the skin and seeds, chop and saute, then add ground beef and season with salt and pepper.
2. Slice bacon, garlic, and onion into small pieces and drain kidney beans with a sieve.
3. Stir-fry bacon in a pan to remove the oil, stir-fry garlic and onion, add kidney beans, season with a little bit of dried basil, salt and pepper, and grind them in a mixer to make puree.
4. Slice pears and oranges into 1cm dice and mix them with lemon juice and paprika powder to make salsa.
5. After lightly roasting tortillas in an oil-free pan, apply a thin layer of kidney bean puree, add stir-fried beef, shredded lettuce, avocado, bacon, tomato, and sour cream.
6. Five with pear and orange salsa.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g egg, 1g mayonnaise, 1g Dijon mustard, 2g lemon juice, 35g bread, 6g avocado, 1g watercress, a little salt, a little pepper
rcpNaTip: The avocado can be peeled, cut in half, and turned 90 degrees in the middle seed to remove the seed.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil the eggs hard-boiled, cool them in cold water, peel them, put them in a bowl and crush them roughly with a fork.
2. Mix mustard, lemon juice, salt, pepper and mayonnaise with crushed egg.
3. Remove the skin and slice the avocado thinly.
4. The bread is baked on both sides until golden.
5. Top 4 with avocado and top with egg salad and cover with bread.
6. Cut the edge of the sandwich and cut it to the desired size.

rcpPartsDtls: Spinach 10g, carrot 15g, flour 50g, water 10g, potato 10g, zucchini 15g, shilpa 5g, anchovy stock 200g, minced garlic 2g, soy sauce 2g, salt 1g
rcpNaTip: If you want a soft dough, make the sujebi dough thinner and put it on a spatula and cut it.

3. Make the dough of 2 into a round shape of about 1.5cm in diameter.
4. Cut the potatoes and zucchini into 1.5cm dice and cut the yarns into 2cm lengths.
5. Put potatoes, sujebi dumplings, zucchini, minced garlic, and shilpa in anchovy stock and boil them.
6. Season 5 with soy sauce and salt.

rcpPartsDtls: 15g minced onion, 2g minced garlic, 1g minced ginger, 1g minced green pepper, 25g minced shrimp, 1g butter, 1g lemon juice, 3g fish stock, 2g curry powder, 3g tomato paste, 5g egg water, 20g spring onion, 1g olive oil
rcpNaTip: The traditional method is to boil potatoes, mash them, and use them as blood.
