2. Stir-fry onion, ginger, garlic, red pepper, and curry powder in the order of butter pan.
3. Stir-fry tomato paste, lemon juice, and shrimp in 2.
4. Pour a little stock into 3, boil it over low heat, evaporate the moisture, and cool it in a bowl.
5. Add 4 to the spring kwonpi in moderation and put egg water on the end to complete it.
6. Spread a little olive oil on the outside, place in an oven pan, and bake crispy in an oven at 170℃.

rcpPartsDtls: Pork ribs (for barbecue) 120g [Sauce] Onion cut 20g, garlic minced 4g, cooking oil 1g, red wine vinegar 2g, brown sugar 2g, honey 5g, demiglass 10g, tomato ketchup 2g, mustard 2g, Worcester sauce 2g, a little bit of KN pepper, salt equivalent, pepper equivalent
rcpNaTip: Pork ribs are soaked in cold water and used by boiling blood several times.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put the sauce ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
2. Spread the sauce evenly on the pork ribs and marinate for more than 6 hours.
3. Wrap marinated pork ribs in foil.
4. Bake 3 in an oven at 170°C for 30 minutes.
5. Remove the foil from the grilled pork ribs.
6. Bake for about 30 minutes, spreading the sauce evenly, until the ribs of 5.

rcpNm: Jeju bingtteok. Tangerine soy sauce sauce
rcpPartsDtls: Buckwheat flour 50g, radish 30g, pepper 2g, kelp 2g, minced garlic 5g, minced green onions 5g, low-salt soy sauce 5g, sesame seeds 2g, tangerine juice 10g, sesame oil 2g

6. Put it on a plate.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g beef, 6g pork, 15g onion, 10g pear, 5g garlic, 2g ginger, 3g low-salt soy sauce, 5g sticky rice powder, 2g sesame oil, 5g sesame seeds
rcpNaTip: I used low-salt soy sauce instead of salt to reduce sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Finely chop the meat and peel the vegetables.
2. Grate the pear for juice, mince the onion, and stir-fry it lightly in an ungreased pan.
3. Finely grind garlic and ginger, mix them with pear juice, and put them in minced meat.
4. Season the dough with low-salt soy sauce and sesame oil, and add glutinous rice powder to stick it.
5. Make it into a round shape and lightly press the middle to bake in an oiled pan.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g potato, 5g garlic, 5g onion, 10g mayonnaise, 5g plain yogurt, 1g mustard, 2g sugar, 1g parsley
rcpNaTip: You can reduce sodium by dressing with mustard, mayonnaise, and plain yogurt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the potatoes clean, cut them into bite-sized pieces, and boil them.
2. Slice garlic into thin slices.
3. Chop onions thickly.
4. Put cooking oil on the pan, stir-fry the minced onions, and bake the garlic crispy.
5. Make a dressing by mixing mayonnaise, mustard, plain yogurt and sugar.
6. Mix potatoes, stir-fried onions, and dressing evenly, and sprinkle with garlic chips and parsley.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: chicken (120g), radish (30g), carrot (20g), onion (10g), red pepper (1g), green pepper (1g), radish shredder (80g)
•Seasoning: Minced garlic (2g), pepper (1g), low-salt soy sauce (5g), sugar (3g), starch syrup (5g)
rcpNaTip: •The sodium content was lowered by adding a spicy taste using red pepper.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice the chicken into parts and blanch it slightly in boiling water.
2. Mix the blanched chicken with the seasoning ingredients and marinate it for more than 30 minutes.
3. Slice radishes, carrots, and onions in squares, and cut peppers into small pieces.
4. Blanch the radish shredder once more in boiling water and cut it into 6cm long pieces.
5. Put water (30g), chicken, and dried radish greens in a pot, and cook them with trimmed vegetables except for red pepper.
6. Finish with red pepper and green pepper.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g tofu, 20g eggs, 2.5g perilla leaves, 10g cornstarch, 10g cooking oil, 1g Honda Rangatsuobushi, 10g radish, 2g lemon juice, 2g double brewed vinegar, 1.5g low-salt soy sauce, 6g unflavored, 1g sugar
rcpNaTip: I reduced the use of soy sauce by using Katsuobushi soup.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut tofu into 2cm squares, mix starch and egg water and fry them in oil.
2. Grate radishes in a blender or steel plate.
3. I added a little bit of katsuobushi to the boiling water Drain and boil the soup.
4. Add sugar, flavor, lemon juice, vinegar, and low-salt soy sauce to the radish and katsuobushi soup and mix.
5. Sift the perilla leaves finely.
6. Place tofu and perilla leaves on a plate and serve with sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 35g squid, 70g flour, 50g water, 32.5g egg, 0.1g pepper, 500g cooking oil, 5g strawberry jam
rcpNaTip: I replaced the sauce with strawberry jam instead of vinegar soy sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the squid into bite-sized pieces.

3. Add water, eggs and pepper to the flour to make fried dough.
4. Put fried dough on squid and fry it in cooking oil.
5. Place on kitchen towel to remove oil.
6. Serve with strawberry jam.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g citrus, 8g peas, 4g sorghum, 10g yulmu, 20g chickpeas, 10g citron syrup, 6g chicory, 10g olive oil
rcpNaTip: The savory taste of beans, the sweetness of citrus, and the sour taste reduced the use of sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. The citrus peel, separate the egg, and split it in half.

rcpNm: a basil-flavored sweet potato chal baket
rcpPartsDtls:
(Dish ingredients) Strong flour 675g, salt 6g, raw yeast 10g, water 375ml (for baguette dough), Pinesoft T 300g, Pinesoft C 50g, Strong flour 50g, salt 8g, powdered milk 8g, almond powder 74g, dry yeast (gold) 10g, unsalted butter 54g, egg 50g(one), water 200ml (for dough)
(Ingredients) 200g cream cheese, 30g basil pesto, 20g yolk, 100g sweet potato dies
rcpNaTip: It doesn't use sugar separately and makes use of the sweet potato's natural sweetness.

manualSteps.content:
1. Mix all the dough and ferment for 30 minutes, punch, and ferment for 40 minutes.
★punch refers to the process of removing gas.
2. Divide into 150g and do 20 minutes of intermediate fermentation.
3. After dividing 80g of the dough, spread it thinly with a roller, squeeze the ingredients mixed with cream cheese and basil pesto, and roll the boiled sweet potato dies at tight intervals.

4. After intermediate fermentation, spread the baguette dough carefully by making the pores as much as possible. Place the sticky dough on top of the spread dough and roll it lightly into a wicker shape.
5. After spraying the dough with water, apply powder and ferment it for a second time for 1 hour.
6. Make the bread three times with a dry diagonal line so that it does not burst, and bake it in a 195°C convection oven with a set of 16 minutes steam for 8 seconds.

rcpPartsDtls: Trimmed mackerel (60g), onion (10g), garlic (6g), mushroom (1), cheongyang red pepper (2g), perilla leaf (1g), soaked brown rice (150g), black bean soy milk (200ml), egg yolk (1), kelp (2g), soy sauce (5g), lemon juice (8g)
rcpNaTip: We supplemented the salty taste by using various spices such as lemon and perilla leaves.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put water (500ml) and kelp (2g) in a pot and boil for 3 minutes, and take out the kelp to make broth.
2. Mackerel is placed in an air fryer and baked at 180℃ for 10 to 15 minutes.
3. Chop onions, garlic, mushrooms, and cheongyang peppers into small pieces, and shred perilla leaves into thin slices.
4. Put cooking oil on a pan heated over a medium heat, add minced onions, garlic, mushrooms and soy sauce and stir-fry for 2 minutes, then add the soaked brown rice and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
5. Divide the kelp stock (250ml) into two to three times to cook brown rice, add black bean soy milk, boil it down, and add lemon juice and minced Cheongyang red pepper to mix evenly.
6. Put brown rice risotto in a bowl and place it in the order of grilled mackerel → shredded sesame leaves → egg yolk.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Cocktail shrimp (2), apple (½), onion (⅓), carrot (¼), baguette (2 pieces), minced parsley (0.5 Ts), blueberry (6 pieces), apple mint leaves (6 pieces), carrot (⅓), onion (⅓), lemon (⅓), pepper powder (3t), lemon juice (6 Ts), vinegar (0.6 Ts), olive oil (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip: •We reduced the use of added sugar by using apples that have sweet taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch the stock ingredients and cocktail shrimp in water (3 cups) until the shrimp is cooked, and then remove them.
2. Chop apples and onions into small pieces, and cut carrots into long pieces.
3. Add chopped apples, onions, shredded carrots, pepper powder, lemon juice, vinegar, and olive oil and mix evenly.
4. Place the ingredients on top of the baguette.
5. Add blanched shrimp, sprinkle with chopped parsley and pepper powder, and add blueberries.
6. Finish with apple mint on top.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Lettuce (3 sheets), lemon (½), avocado (1), tomato (1), egg (1), paprika (red and yellow each ½), salt (0.2 ts), vinegar (0.5 ts), salt (0.3 ts), pepper powder (0.5 t), basil powder (0.5 t), oregano powder (0.5 t), olive oil (1 Ts), lemon juice (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•We used lettuce, tomatoes, paprika, etc. to increase the texture.
•Seasoned with perfumes and reduced sodium use.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the lettuce clean and tear it into bite-sized pieces, slice the lemon thinly into shape, remove the seeds and skin, and slice the avocado into bite-sized pieces.
2. After removing the seeds of paprika, cut them into bite-sized pieces, and cut tomatoes into bite-sized pieces.
3. Add vinegar to boiling salt water (4 cups of water + 0.2ts of salt), add eggs and make poached eggs.
4. Make dressing.
5. Place the trimmed vegetables in a bowl and finish with poached eggs and sliced lemon.

rcpPartsDtls: 100g beef brisket, 2g starch, 2g soy sauce, 10g orange juice, 2g oyster sauce, 3g honey, 1g sesame, 1g cooking oil, 1g ginger, 20g orange, 28g pineapple
rcpNaTip: If raw pineapple is added to the meat without being cooked, the meat may become too soft and become an unwanted texture, so it is cooked and used.

manualSteps.content: 1. The beef is cut into a rectangular shape of about 6cm in length, 2cm in width, and 0.5cm in thickness and marinated with starch and soy sauce.

4. Stir-fry sesame seeds in an ungreased pan, cool, oil the pan, and cook the marinated beef evenly back and forth.

6. Place 5 in a dish and sprinkle sesame seeds just before serving.

rcpPartsDtls: Chicken breast 80g, breadcrumbs 5g, chive 2g, basil 1g, parsley 1g, salt equivalent, pepper equivalent [10g onion minced, buttery equivalent, 30g, breadcrumbs 5g, whipped cream equivalent
rcpNaTip: It can only be used as a steak or as a hamburger patty.

manualSteps.content: 1. Finely chop the onion and slice the mushroom into 0.5cm slices.
2. Put butter in a pan and when it melts, stir-fry the onion and then stir-fry it with the mushroom.
3. Season with whipped cream, salt, and pepper, and when water is drained from the mushrooms, add breadcrumbs to adjust the concentration and transfer to a bowl to cool.
4. Chop chives, oregano, basil and parsley.
5. Mix the ground chicken and 3 and 4 in a bowl to make it sticky, then make it into a circular or rugby ball shape with a diameter of about 10cm.
6. Grease the pan and cook the chicken steak, or just color it in the pan and cook it in the oven.

rcpPartsDtls: 35g egg, 4g green onion, 10g tomato sauce, 8g sugar, appropriate amount of salt, 2g vegetable oil, 1g sesame oil

manualSteps.content: 1. Beat the egg in a bowl.
2. Stir-fry 1 in a heated pan to make scramble.
3. Slice the green onions.
4. Stir-fry 3 in an oiled pan first, scent it, add tomato sauce and stir-fry it.
5. Add sugar, salt and 2 to 4 and mix.
6. Sprinkle sesame oil to finish.

rcpNm: Rice pancake made with dried radish greens
rcpPartsDtls: 40g rice, 10g minced onion, 5g minced carrot, 15g natto, 10g dried radish, 3g curry powder, 2g minced green onion, 5g flour, 10g egg, appropriate amount of cooking oil, appropriate amount of salt, appropriate amount of pepper
rcpNaTip: You can use cheonggukjang instead of natto, and if you don't like the smell, you can purchase and use a product that has removed the smell.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onions and carrots into small pieces.
2. The dried radish leaves are soaked to squeeze out the water.
3. Finely chop the dried radish greens twice.
4. Add 1 and 3 to the hot rice.
5. Add natto, curry powder, and minced green onion to 4 and mix evenly.
6. Season 5 with salt and pepper.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g eggs, 5g peas, 10g cucumbers, 20g tomatoes, 10g red onion, 10g romaine, 2g red pepper, 2g black olives, 1g basil, 20g canned tuna olive oil, 2g red wine vinegar, 1g Dijon mustard, 1g garlic, sugar equivalent
rcpNaTip: You can use honey mustard instead of Dijon mustard.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil the eggs hard-boiled, peel them, and divide them into four vertically, and boil the peas in boiling water, rinse them in cold water, and drain them.
2. Cut cucumbers into 1cm dice, slice onions into rings, and tear romaine into cold water to make it easy to eat.
3. Cut tomatoes into egg-like shapes, cut red peppers diagonally, and drain tuna so that they have lumps.
4. Slice the basil and chop the garlic.
5. Mix olive oil, red wine vinegar, mustard, sugar and minced garlic in a bowl to make a dressing.
6. Add the vegetables, eggs, and tuna prepared in another bowl, and add drilling and mix.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g kelp, 3g nutritious chives, 3g minced red pepper, 3g minced red pepper, 10g minced shrimp, 10g flour, 8g water, salt equivalent [mackerel sauce] 2g salted anchovies, 3g water, 2g sugar, 2g sesame salt, 1g red pepper powder, 2g shilpa
rcpNaTip: If the thickness of the kelp is too thin, it is difficult to make pancakes, so choose the right one.

manualSteps.content: 1. Pour enough water to immerse the kelp in a pot, boil it over a medium heat, leave it for about 10 minutes, take it out, soak it in cold water, and cut it into 18cm pieces.
2. Remove the seeds from the green and red peppers and chop the flesh of chives and shrimp.
3. Add water and salt to flour, knead it, add minced vegetables, and mix evenly.
4. Add kelp to 3 and coat it with dough water and coat the pan with oil to make it golden.
5. After cooling the kelp pancake, fix it with a skewer so that it can be rolled up and cut.
6. Cut 5 into 4cm long pieces and add anchovy sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 35g corn, 3g pine nuts, 25g green bell pepper, 25g carrots, 35g chicken, 1g cooking oil, 6g water starch, appropriate amount of salt
rcpNaTip: You can put it on an iron plate and serve it hot.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut green bell peppers, carrots, and chicken into corn grains size pieces.
2. Stir-fry chicken in a pan.
3. Add carrots to 2 and stir-fry.
4. Add pine nuts, green bell pepper, and corn to 3 and stir-fry.
5. Season with 4.
6. Adjust the concentration with water starch.

rcpPartsDtls: 15g oyster mushrooms, 15g raw shiitake mushrooms, 15g enoki mushrooms, 15g fresh mushrooms, 15g cucumbers, 15g boiled rice cakes, 8g perilla seeds, 50g water, 2g perilla oil, salt equivalent

manualSteps.content: 1. Rip the oyster mushrooms blanched in boiling water by hand, blanch the raw shiitake mushrooms, squeeze the water, and slice them.
2. Remove the base of the enoki mushrooms and cut them in half, and cut the saesong mushrooms into the size of enoki mushrooms.
3. Peel the rice cakes in water, cut the cucumbers into three halves, cut them obliquely, and drain them in cold water several times.
4. Using a sprayer, perilla seeds are finely ground while adding water little by little, and prepare perilla seed water in a sieve, and discard the waste.
5. Put perilla oil in a pot and stir-fry the cucumbers, pour perilla seed water to boil, then add rice cake and boil.
6. When the rice cake of 5 floats up, add mushrooms, boil them, and season them with salt.

rcpPartsDtls: 8g of green vitamin, 8g of chicory, 15g of pear, 10g of grape juice, 30g of smoked duck breast, 20g of yarns [Sanmadrashing] 10g of mountain horse, 10g of milk, 3g of lemon juice, 3g of orange juice, 3g of walnuts, appropriate amount of salt
rcpNaTip: You can use chicken breast instead of smoked duck breast.

manualSteps.content: 1. Take vitamins and chicory into bite-sized pieces, soak them in cold water, and drain them before eating.
2. Put the mountain horse, milk, lemon juice, orange juice, walnuts, and salt in a mixer and grind them finely to make a drilling.
3. Remove the skin of the pear, divide it into quarters, remove the seeds, and slice them into 4 to 5 mm thick pieces.
4. Pour the grape juice into the pan and add the sliced pear to boil down so that the pear turns grape-colored.
5. Slice the smoked duck breast thinly.
6. Place 5 and 4, yilgon yak, and vegetables on a plate and drizzle with drilling.

rcpPartsDtls: Tofu 35g, pork 15g, carrot minced 10g, red pepper oil 2g, peas 10g, green onion 5g, ginger 3g, water starch 10g, salt appropriate amount

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut tofu into 1cm dice.
2. Put 1 in hot water, then take out and drain.
3. Chop carrots and pork into small pieces.
4. Add red pepper oil to the pan and stir-fry 3.
5. Add green onions, minced ginger, water, peas, salt, and tofu and boil down to taste.
6. Add water starch to adjust the concentration of the sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Deodeok 40g, wet sticky rice powder 30g, powdered green tea 2g, white vinegar powder 2g, sugar 1g, honey 5g, salt proper amount, fried oil 8g
rcpNaTip: If you choose a deodeok that is too big, it has a lot of fiber and goes through, so choose the right size.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the deodeok, slice it into 0.3cm thick, soak it in salt water to remove the bitter taste, and transfer it to a cotton cloth to push or beat it thinly.
2. Mix glutinous rice powder with salt and lower it in a sieve.
3. Divide 2 into 3 and mix powdered green tea and white vinegar powder, respectively.
4. Add deodeok to each of the 3 and press it tightly front and back to coat it with glutinous rice powder.
5. Fry twice in oil at 170℃, remove the oil, and sprinkle with a little sugar when it is hot.
6. Dip it with honey.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g pork fillet, 10g water starch, appropriate amount of salt, 25g spinach, 10g chives, 5g soy sauce, 5g green onion, 3g ginger, 2g cooking oil
rcpNaTip: Or, depending on your taste, you can add octagonal ones.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred pork and season it with salt and water starch.
2. Stir the marinated meat so that it does not stick while roasting it in an oiled pan.
3. Cut spinach and leeks into 4-5cm pieces.
4. Grease a heated pan and add green onions, ginger and octagonal to scent.
5. Add 2 and soy sauce to 4 and stir-fry.
6. After adjusting the concentration by adding water starch, add leek and spinach to the final layer.

rcpNm: oven-baked vegetables flavored with balsamic and rosemary
rcpPartsDtls: Sweet pumpkin 40g, carrot 40g, beet 40g, sweet potato 40g, honey 8g, balsamic vinegar 30g, rosemary 2g, salt equivalent, pepper appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: Fruits such as apples and pineapples are also possible

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel sweet pumpkin, beet, sweet potato and carrot.
2. Cut 1 into 2 to 2.5cm thick pieces naturally.
3. In a bowl, combine 2 and balsamic vinegar, honey and rosemary leaves.
4. Season with salt and pepper.
5. Bake in a preheated oven at 150℃ until cooked.
6. Turn over in the middle and cook evenly.

rcpNm: Sea bream wrapped in paper and baked (papilote)
rcpPartsDtls: 65g sea bream, just the right amount of salt, just the right amount of pepper, 3g of celery, 3g of carrot, 3g of green onion, 6g of green onion, 5g of bell pepper, 5g of brecculli, 1g of lemon zest, 3g of enoki mushrooms, 2g of butter, 2g of parchment paper [Herb butter] butter, 1g of parmesan cheese, a little of whole pepper, 0.2g of oregano, 0.3g of garlic, 0.5g of onion
rcpNaTip: Put it on a heat-resistant plate or oven pan when you put it in the oven.

manualSteps.content: 1. Season sea bream with salt and pepper.
2. Slice celery, carrots, green onions, onions, and bell peppers, broccoli into small bunches, lemon peel thinly zest, and enoki mushrooms at the base.
3. Fold the parchment paper in half, spread it, and apply soft butter on the inside.
4. Place half of the prepared portion of celery, carrot, green onion, enoki mushroom, onion, bell pepper, and lemon zest on one butter-coated side of 4 and place the seasoned sea bream on top.
5. Place the remaining vegetables on the sea bream again, cover the vegetables with one side of the parchment paper, and fold and seal the corners.
6. Cook in an oven preheated to 160℃.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g of cabbage, 15g of red onion, 5g of green onion, 3g of green pepper, 5g of garlic, 3g of unsweetened red pepper, 5g of red pepper powder, 2g of plum extract, 5g of vinegar, 10g of apple
rcpNaTip: It uses a lot of potassium-rich unsweetened, peppers, and onions to help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. After washing, cut the cabbage into a good size to eat and put it in water.
2. Slice green onions and green peppers diagonally and shred onions thickly.
3. Finely chop the garlic and grate the apple in a blender.
4. Mix apple juice, minced garlic, red pepper powder, plum juice, and vinegar to make the fresh kimchi seasoning.
5. Take out the cabbage that was soaked in water, drain it, and put it in a wide bowl.
6. Mix cabbage, onions, green onions, green peppers, and radish greens evenly with the seasonings.

rcpPartsDtls: Chicken breast 80g, tofu 20g, onion 12.5g, green onion 5g, walnut 5g, peanut 2.5g, garlic 2g, ginger 0.5g, pepper 0.3g, sugar 3.8g, vinegar 2.5g, egg 65g (1.5), rice flour 7g, bread flour 25g, turnip 24g, soy milk 45ml, hole grain 2.5g, peanut butter 5g, lemon 7g, parsley 0.5g
rcpNaTip: I reduced the use of sodium by making mayonnaise with tofu and soy milk.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onions, green onions, walnuts, and chicken breasts.
2. Mix the drained tofu, ginger, garlic, and pepper in ① and knead.
3. The dough is coated in the order of rice flour, egg water, and bread flour and fried to make a croquet.
4. Put tofu and soy milk in a mixer and grind to make tofu mayonnaise.
5. Chop turnips and onions and prepare eggs by boiling them.
6. Add ⑤ ingredients, sugar, lemon, vinegar, peanut butter, pepper, holgrain, and parsley powder to tofu mayonnaise to make tar sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Nurungji 5g, romaine lettuce 7.5g, paprika(red/yellow) 12.5g, citron syrup 7.5g, cooking oil 500g, olive oil 3.5g, lemon juice 1g, vinegar 1g, pepper 0.1g
rcpNaTip: The refreshing taste of the fruit and the savory taste of the fried nurungji complemented the bland taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
2. Cut paprika into 0.3cm pieces in all directions.
3. Fry the nurungi and crush it.
4. Make a dressing by mixing citron syrup, lemon juice, olive oil, vinegar, and pepper.
5. Garnish the paprika and fried nurungji with romaine lettuce.
6. Serve with dressing.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) 60g strong powder, 30g soft powder, 150g mixed powder, 4g yeast, 5g salt, 50g eggs (1), butter 30g, almond 20g, sunflower seeds 30g, pumpkin seeds 10g, raisins 20g 
(Almond milk) Almond 30g, milk 180g 
(Topping) Butter 10g, Almond slice 10g, Grain powder 10g
rcpNaTip: It is a bread that uses the sweetness and savory taste of nuts that occur when baking nuts.

manualSteps.content: 1. (Almond Milk) Grind almonds and milk in a blender to make almond milk.
2. Add flour, grain powder, yeast, salt, eggs, and almond milk and knead by hand. Add almond, sunflower seeds, and pumpkin seeds and knead.
3. ②When this lump becomes one, add unsalted butter to knead it and finally mix it with raisins.

4. "First ferment until it becomes 2.5 times bigger, fold the dough, remove the air, divide it into three parts, and ferment it for about 10 minutes."
★When the dough sticks, it's easy to work while spraying the powder."
5. After fermentation, do the rounding again, pan the smooth side of the dough up, and ferment it for a second time for 40 to 50 minutes.

6. "Bake it in an oven at 180℃ for 20-25 minutes, finish it, put butter on top and top it with almond slices and grain powder.
★ Melt the butter slightly and use it."

rcpPartsDtls: Onion (10g), chives (3g), lemons (3g), radish leaves (20 pieces), anchovies (7~8), dried seaweed (3g), kelp (5g), rice (210g), kkari pepper (5 pieces), pork (sirloin, 120g), poached egg (1), laver powder (2g), horseradish (2g), garlic (3 pieces), ginger (1tol), dried pepper (3), octagonal (1T), pepper powder (1 ⅓ Ts), cooking oil (20ml)
rcpNaTip: We reduced the use of sodium by grinding anchovies, seaweed, and kelp and seasoning them with natural condiments.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred onions, chives, lemons, garlic, ginger, and dried peppers.
2. Stir-fry anchovies in a dry pan heated over a medium heat for 3 minutes to dissipate moisture, then place them in a mixer with dried seaweed and kelp and grind them finely.
3. Put cooking oil (20ml) and trimmed spices in a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry for 3 minutes to make a fragrance.
4. Add sesame oil, pepper powder, and finely ground anchovy powder to the sperm and mix them evenly.
5. Put the leftover sperm (10g) in a pan heated over a medium heat, add the kkari pepper and pork, and bake for 9 minutes, and cut the pork into bite-sized pieces.
6. Place bibimbap, grilled pork and kkari peppers, trimmed onions, chives, lemon, seaweed flakes, wasabi, radish leaves, and poached eggs in a bowl.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] lettuce (3 sheets), onion (¼), tomato (one medium size), cheongyang red pepper (2), jalapeno pickles (10p), chicken breast (270g), sweet pumpkin (1), rice paper (7p), plain yogurt (1 cup), garlic (3-4p), green onion (½), pepper powder (0.5ts), curry powder (1ts)
rcpNaTip:
•We used sweet pumpkins to enhance the texture by using lettuce and onions to enhance the original sweetness of the ingredients.
•Sweet pumpkin with high potassium content, tomatoes help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred lettuce, cut onions and tomatoes into small bite-sized pieces, and chopped Cheongyang peppers and jalapeno pickles.
2. Put water (10 cups), chicken breast, chicken breast boiling ingredients and pepper powder (0.3ts) in a pot and boil for about 7 minutes, then take out and tear thinly.
3. Cut the pumpkin into four pieces to remove the seeds, steam it by putting water (1 cup) in a steamer, peel it, and crush it by pouring water (1 cup).
4. Put crushed sweet pumpkin, chicken breast, minced cheongyang red pepper, curry powder, and pepper powder (0.2ts) in a pan heated over low heat and stir-fry until the moisture is gone.
5. Pour cooking oil (2 cups) into a pan, preheat it to medium heat, add rice paper, fry it, and take it out immediately.
6. Finish with stir-fried sweet pumpkin, trimmed vegetables, and plain yogurt on the fried rice paper.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g apples, 5g celery, 4g mayonnaise, 1g lemon juice, 1g vinegar, 5g walnuts, 4g raisins, salt equivalent
rcpNaTip: Apples are put in water containing lemon juice to prevent color change and give a lemon scent.

manualSteps.content: 1. Divide apples into quarters and remove seeds.
2. Divide 1 back into quarters.
3. Remove and slice celery.
4. Make a drasing by mixing mayonnaise, lemon juice, vinegar, and salt.
5. Put apples, celery, walnuts and raisins in a bowl.
6. Add the drilling made in 5 and mix evenly.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g sweet potato, 10g honey, 2g cinnamon powder, 5g date, 5g pumpkin seeds
rcpNaTip: You can make a pretty shape by drawing gold diagonally using a tool that can draw lines.

manualSteps.content: 1. After peeling the sweet potato, cut it into large pieces and steam it in a steamer.
2. Finely sift the steamed sweet potatoes.
3. Mix 2 with honey and cinnamon powder.
4. After removing the seeds, cut the jujube into 0.5mm rhombus.
5. Remove the sweet potatoes little by little and make them round.
6. Make a top with pumpkin seeds and chopped jujube.

rcpPartsDtls: 25g orange, 25g apple, 15g sugar, 4g water starch, 1g butter, 30g bread
rcpNaTip: It is also possible to replace it with dumpling skin.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the oranges and cut them into small pieces. Wash the apples thoroughly and cut them into small pieces.
2. Put the oranges and apples in a pot, add the sugar, and boil them down so they don't burn over a medium heat.
3. When it becomes dry with water from the fruit while boiling, add water starch to adjust the concentration and cool it down.
4. Cut off the edges of the bread and then push flat with a pusher to apply butter.
5. Place the boiled fruit on top and roll, then press both ends with a fork to stick.
6. Lightly coat the surface of the bread with butter and place in an oven preheated to 170℃ to bake until golden.

rcpPartsDtls: Carrot 50g, ginseng 30g, honey 20g, water 10g, cinnamon powder 2g
rcpNaTip: As the age increases, ginseng or carrots are ground thickly or sliced thinly and refined.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash carrots and ginseng cleanly.
2. Put 1 in a mixer and grind it finely.
3. Pour 2 into a pot and boil it down with honey.
4. Mix the cinnamon powder.
5. Prepare bread or crackers.
6. Place the sweet and sour carrot on top of 5.

rcpPartsDtls: Red bean 10g, glutinous rice powder 15g, mugwort powder 5g, water 10g, sikhye 110g, salt appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: They freeze the correction fruit and use it by scratching it with a fork or spoon.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the red beans cleanly, pour water and boil them, discard the water, and pour cold water again to boil.
2. Drain the gently boiled red beans and crush them.
3. Divide glutinous rice powder into two pieces, one with mugwort powder, and the other with hot water in bare glutinous rice powder to make a dan, and cook it in boiling water.
4. Cool the cooked dumplings by soaking them in cold ice water immediately.
5. Add crushed red beans to sikhye, season with salt, put it in a bowl, freeze it in the freezer, and stir with a fork every hour so that air enters.
6. When the sherbet is gently frozen, place it in the prepared bowl with the dumplings.

rcpPartsDtls: Lotus root 20g, sweet potato 20g, potato 20g, sweet pumpkin 20g, carrot 20g, salt equivalent
rcpNaTip: It is dried or baked in the oven mainly using root vegetables.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash prepared vegetables thoroughly.
2. Cut lotus root, sweet potato, potato, sweet pumpkin and carrot into 0.2cm thick slices.
3. Soak lotus root, sweet potato, and potato in water.
4. Put the cut ingredients in the oven pan and sprinkle with a small amount of salt.
5. Bake 4 in an oven preheated to 130-150℃.
6. Cool the cooked vegetable chips.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g black bean rice, 10g rice rice, 10g menil rice, 6g starch syrup, 6g sugar, 3g water
rcpNaTip: If you add marshmallow to starch syrup and sugar melted, you can make a softer Gangjeong.

manualSteps.content: 1. Prepare fried rice of black beans, rice and buckwheat.
2. Add sugar and water to starch syrup and dissolve transparently over low heat.
3. Place 2 in a recessed pan.
4. Put 1 in a pan of 3 and stir over the heat until the syrup is threaded.
5. Before the gangjeong hardens, make it into an oval shape or push it with a roller.
6. Cut the shoved gangjeong into a rhombus shape.

rcpPartsDtls: 3g pine nuts, 3g walnuts, 3g jujube, 5g sesame seeds [syrup] starch syrup, 2g sugar
rcpNaTip: The higher the proportion of starch syrup, the less firm it becomes.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the cone and rub it with a wet dishcloth to clean the dust.
2. Soak walnuts in lukewarm water to remove the skin.
3. Turn the jujube thinly and finely chop it.
4. Put starch syrup and sugar in a pot, add a little water, and make clear syrup over low heat.
5. Add chopped dates and syrup to pine nuts, walnuts, and sesame seeds and mix well.
6. When it's slightly hot, clump it in a circle with your hands.

rcpPartsDtls: Brown rice flour 10g, flour 20g, milk 30g, sesame oil equivalent, salt equivalent [red bean paste] red bean 15g, sugar 10g [braised carrots] carrot 20g, sugar 10g, water 5g
rcpNaTip: It is recommended to make brown rice powder and seal it in the freezer.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash and boil the red beans cleanly, pour water, and pour water again to boil the red beans smoothly.
2. Cut carrots into 1cm dice.
3. Add sugar to each of the 1 and 2 and boil down.
4. Put brown rice flour, flour, and milk in a bowl, fold well to prevent lumps and leave for 30 minutes.
5. Put sesame oil on a heated pan, stir up a ladle of 4 over a low heat, round and cool.
6. Spread the crepe, place the red bean paste and braised carrot on top, and roll them into a circle.

rcpPartsDtls: Potatoes 80g, rice 80g, carrot minced 20g, spinach 20g, small anchovies 5g, boiled egg yolk 5g, black sesame 1g, white sesame 2g [rice seasoning] sesame oil 2g, salt equivalent, white pepper appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: If you purchase and use a shape frame, more shapes are available.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash potatoes clean, steam them in a steamer, peel them, and sieve them.
2. Season the minced carrots while roasting them in an oiled pan, trim and blanch the spinach, rinse it in cold water, squeeze the water, and finely chop it.
3. Saute the small anchovies lightly in the pan and chop them thickly.
4. Put 1, 2, 3, 4 in a bowl, add salt, white pepper powder, and sesame oil and mix.
5. Sift the boiled egg yolk.
6. Form 4 into a circle or triangle and roll evenly over egg yolk, black sesame, and white sesame.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g pork fillet, 30g peas, 5g water, 10g broth, 7g sugar, salt equivalent, 5g starch, 3g cooking oil
rcpNaTip: Pea contains starch and stretches well, so cook while stirring well.

manualSteps.content: 1. Trim the pork and cut it into pea-sized pieces.
2. Grate the peas finely in a blender.
3. Put 1 in an oiled pan and stir-fry it so that it doesn't stick.
4. Put 3 and sugar in 2 and boil.
5. Season 4 with salt.
6. Adjust the concentration of sauce with water starch.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g egg water, 1g cooking oil, 3g red pepper, 1g garlic minced, chicken breast 12g, shrimp 12g, onion 12g, bokchoy 20g, spaghetti noodles 40g, cherry tomato 15g, butter appropriate amount [soya sauce] 3g, balsamic vinegar 1g, oyster sauce 2g, honey 3g
rcpNaTip: If you prepare in advance, boil the noodles and mix them with oil to make them less sticky.

manualSteps.content: 1. Grease a pan and stir-fry red pepper and garlic until fragrant.
2. Add egg water to 1 and wait for the egg to swell gently, then stir lightly when half-cooked.
3. Add chicken, shrimp, and onion to 2 and stir-fry.
4. Add the prepared spaghetti noodles to the 3 and stir-fry once, add Soya sauce, and stir-fry the noodles until the seasoning is sufficiently cut.
5. When the noodles are stir-fried, add bok choy and cherry tomato and stir-fry slightly.
6. Add cold butter to 5 so that the sauce is glossy and concentrated.

rcpPartsDtls: Pork ribs 60g, thick salt equivalent, garlic minced 3g, ginger minced 2g, green onion 10g, tomato 25g [seasoning] soy sauce 5g, water 10g, vinegar 2g, sugar 3g, sesame oil appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: Various vegetables may be added when cooking with sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Pork ribs were prepared in 4 cm length to remove grease and soak in cold water to drain blood.
2. Add thick salt to 1, rub the ribs to soften them, and wash off the salt.
3. Put a sheath in the pork ribs, add green onions, garlic, and ginger, blanch them in boiled water, and rinse them.
4. Put oil on the pot and stir-fry the blanched ribs, pour the sauce, cover the lid, and stir-fry them slowly while cooking.
5. When the ribs are seasoned, stir them over high heat and stir-fry them glossily.
6. Place sliced tomatoes on a plate, stir-fry pork ribs, and sprinkle them with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g apple, 25g yam, 10g lemon juice, 5g raisins, 5g sliced almonds, 6g sugar [sauce] 25g yam, 40g soy milk, 5g starch syrup, 3g flour, 1g olive oil, just right amount of salt
rcpNaTip: Potatoes can be used instead of ma and the sauce can be replaced with cream sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the unpeeled apple and half and cut the peeled yam into 0.7cm dice.
2. Add lemon juice and salt to the apple, cook until soft, then add yam and boil slightly.
3. Peel the rest of the yam, slice it, and grind it in a mixer with soy milk, starch syrup, flour, and olive oil.
4. When 3 is pureed, it boils down thickly over low heat.
5. Mix raisins with 2, put them in a mold, spread out 4, and sprinkle with sliced almonds and sugar on top.
6. Bake in an oven preheated to 200°C for about 10 minutes until the surface is golden.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g pork sirloin, 4g flour, 12g egg, 4.5g breadcrumbs, 0.5g basil, 0.5g dry time, 0.5g butter, 1g cooking oil, 5g lemon, 2g Parmesan cheese, appropriate amount of salt, appropriate amount of pepper
rcpNaTip: If you soak pork in milk for about 10 minutes and use it, it is good for removing the smell and softening the taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Beat the pork (sirloin) with a sirloin hammer and stretch it to a thickness of about 1cm.
2. Season pork sirloin with salt and pepper.
3. Make herb breadcrumbs by mixing parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, dry basil and thyme.
4. The meat is coated in the order of flour, egg water, and herb breadcrumbs.
5. Grease a heated pan and cook the cutlets.
6. When the cutlets are cooked, remove the oil and place in a bowl.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g clamshell, 20g cocktails shrimp, 5g green peppers, 5g red peppers, 10g green onions, 3g garlic mince, 2g ginger mince, 80g kalguksu noodles, cooking oil, 4g water starch [soy sauce] anchovy stock, 50g soy sauce, 5g sugar, 5g onion juice, 5g minced garlic, 3g sesame oil, 1g sesame salt, appropriate amount of pepper powder
rcpNaTip: If you soak the clams in salt water in advance, they spit out the sand and have a good texture.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shake clams and shrimp in salt water and wash them with a sieve to remove moisture.
2. Chop green onions, blue and red peppers, and chop garlic and ginger.
3. Boil the noodles in boiling water, rinse them in cold water, and mix them with sesame oil.
4. Add a large amount of ingredients to the anchovy stock and make soy sauce.
5. Put cooking oil on a pan and stir-fry minced garlic, ginger, and red pepper, then stir-fry clam meat, shrimp, and rice wine over high heat, then add soy sauce and boil.
6. When the 5th half is boiled, stir-fry the noodles with kalguksu noodles, adjust the concentration with water starch, and finish by adding chopped spring onions and sesame oil.

rcpPartsDtls: Sticky rice powder 60g, spinach 30g, chija 5g, edible flower 5g, thyme 5g, sugar 15g, honey 20g
rcpNaTip: The hwajeon dough was flavored and colored using spinach and chimja.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch spinach and season it with warm water to grind it finely in a blender.
2. Add the blanched water to finely ground spinach, heat it, and pour it little by little into half of the glutinous rice powder to knead it.
3. Pour the heated dental flakes little by little into the remaining half of the glutinous rice powder and knead it.
4. Let it rest for 30 minutes, then oil the pan and build an appropriate size fire hydrant.
5. When cooking one side, place the flower on top and flip it over and touch it lightly.
6. Boil honey, sugar, and water in a ratio of 1:2:3 to make syrup, sprinkle it on the firework, and decorate it with time.

rcpPartsDtls: 22.18g kan lotus root, 2.12g beet, 2.12g spinach, 1.52g curry powder, 0.3g dried shrimp, 2.25g starch, 4.25g fried powder, 0.05g salt, 500ml vegetable oil
rcpNaTip: The dried shrimp was ground to add a savory taste and minimize salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Slice the lotus root thinly and soak it in cold water to remove starch.
2. Finely grind the dried shrimp.
3. Each spinach and beet is ground in a blender to prepare the juice.
4. Add shrimp powder and water to the frying powder and knead it.
5. Add spinach, curry, and beets to the dough to make three colors of dough.
6. Coat lotus roots with starch powder and coat them with frying clothes to make them crispy.

rcpPartsDtls: 5g perilla leaves, 6g lettuce, 7g cabbage, 10g egg, 10g fried powder, 5g soybean oil, ice
rcpNaTip: The children's preferred fried recipe allows them to feel the natural taste of vegetables.

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix the frying powder and egg water in a bowl to make the dough, then add ice to cool it.
2. Wash perilla leaves, lettuce, and cabbage clean and prepare.
3. Cut the ingredients into bite-sized pieces.
4. Pour soybean oil into a pot and heat it until it reaches an appropriate temperature.
5. Coat the vegetables with dough.
6. Fry it until it's golden.

rcpPartsDtls: Pohang vinegar 20g, apple 5g, carrot 2g, onion 2g, paprika 1g, lemon juice (or vinegar) 0.2g, low-salt soy sauce 0.4g, sugar 0.2g
rcpNaTip: Due to the influence of the sea breeze, the candle with moderate salt was flavored with apples.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash Pohang vinegar and cut it into 3cm pieces.
2. Slice carrots thinly, and shred apples with their skin and soak them in sugar water.
3. Cut onion and paprika into small cubes.
4. Add low-salt soy sauce, lemon juice, sugar, onion and paprika to make an oriental dressing.
5. Add carrots and apples to Pohang vinegar and mix them.
6. Serve salad with oriental dressing.

rcpPartsDtls: Onion (⅓), paprika (⅓), lemon (1), cherry tomatoes (4), trimmed white fish (½), prawns (2), clams (4), bay leaves (3 sheets), thyme (4-5 stems), salt (2g), pepper powder (1g), white wine (15g), olive oil (10g)
rcpNaTip: You can use seafood to make delicious dishes without seasoning them separately.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop onion and paprika, slice lemon thinly, and cut cherry tomatoes into two halves.
2. Season with trimmed white fish.
3. Place sliced onions on paper foil and season fish → trimmed paprika → lemon → cherry tomato in order.
4. Place the prawns, clams, bay leaves, thyme, and sprinkle with white wine and olive oil.
5. Wrap with paper foil and bake in an oven preheated to 200℃ for 15-25 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Green onion (15cm), spinach (1 zoom = 60g), soaked chickpea (½ cup), milk (1 cup), olive oil (0.5 Ts), sea salt (0.5 Ts), lime juice (0.3 Ts), white pepper powder (slightly), nutmeg powder (slightly)
rcpNaTip:
•Spinach with a high potassium content helps release sodium.
•Lime juice was added to compensate for the boredom of the taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop green onions and wash spinach clean to remove moisture.
2. Put olive oil on a pan heated over a low heat and add the soaked chickpeas and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
3. Pour water (5 cups) and boil it over a medium heat. When the water boils down, add milk and boil it until the amount is half.
4. Blanch spinach in boiling salt water (5 cups of water + 0.5 Ts) for 5 minutes, soak it in cold water, rinse it, and squeeze out the water.
5. Put the braised chickpeas, blanched spinach, lime juice, white pepper powder, and nutmeg powder in a mixer and grind them finely.

rcpNm: seaweed fulvescens and rice cake soup
rcpPartsDtls: Joraengi rice cake 140g, seaweed fulvescens 15g, oysters 30g, spring onions 5g, minced garlic 2g, Soup anchovies 3g, soy sauce 1g, salt 0.2g, water 300g
hashTag: a rice cake made with cold and sour sauce
rcpNaTip: When washing seaweed, wash it with a fine sieve or basket to prevent it from flowing down. Since oysters lose nutrients when washed in plain water, remove their skins or stones by washing them lightly, as if rinsing them in cold salt water.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil 1 cup and a half of water and 1 cup of anchovy soup in a pot.
2. Rinse the seaweed three or four times with water and hold it in a fine sieve to remove moisture.
3. Add salt to the oyster, rub it gently to prevent it from being crushed, rinse it three or four times with water, and support it with a sieve.
4. Slice the spring onions thinly and chop the garlic.
5. Boil the dried seaweed rice cake, seaweed fulvescens, and oysters in anchovy soup.
6. Add green onions and minced garlic, boil them once in a while, season with soy sauce and salt to finish.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g octopus, 5g potato, 20g carrot, 5g onion, 20g Korean wheat flour, 2g minced garlic, 0.1g pepper powder, 5g tomato ketchup, 5g honey mustard sauce, 5g brown rice oil
rcpNaTip: If octopus dough does not stick together well, adjust the concentration with flour and water. The shape of the hot bar can be made and applied in various ways.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch the trimmed octopus.
2. Cut onions and potatoes into appropriate sizes and chop tots and carrots into small pieces.
3. Blanched octopus, onions, and potatoes in a blender.
4. Put Korean wheat flour, minced garlic, and pepper powder in 2 and 3 and knead the dough to make a rectangular shape.
5. Put brown rice oil in a pan, add 4 octopus, and stick them on a skewer after an earthquake.
6. Serve with tomato ketchup and honey mustard sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g of pickled plum, 15g of pickled plum, 5g of onion, 1g of minced ginger, 1g of garlic, 10g of red pepper paste, 5g of minced garlic, 3g of minced green onions, 2g of soy sauce, 2g of plum extract, 1g of red pepper powder, 15g of water, 0.1g of sesame seeds, 0.1g of pepper powder
rcpNaTip: Gwamegi is cooked without oil on the pan because it has a lot of oil. Since gwamegi is eaten raw, it is grilled only slightly in the pan to the extent that it is coated with the sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. The gwamegi cuts off its tail.
2. Sprinkle minced ginger and garlic juice over trimmed gwamegi.
3. Make a marinade by mixing red pepper paste, minced garlic, minced green onions, plum juice, red pepper powder, and water.
4. Shred plum pickles.
5. Place the gwamegi in the pan and bake it lightly while applying red pepper paste seasoning.
6. Finish the pickles on the grilled gwamegi.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g glutinous rice, 20g purple sweet potato, 0.2g salt, 3g brown rice oil, 17g water, 7g brown sugar, 2g black sesame, 2g peanut, 2g walnut, 0.5g glutinous rice powder, 0.2g cinnamon powder,
rcpNaTip: If glutinous rice powder and sweet potato are less water, add water to the dough to adjust the concentration

manualSteps.content: 1. After soaking sticky rice for 3 to 5 hours, remove the water and grind it in a blender.
2. Peel the sweet potato, cut it into small pieces, put it in a steamer, steam it, and crush it.
3. Grind black sesame seeds in a blender, chop walnuts and peanuts into thick pieces, and mix brown sugar and glutinous rice powder together to make hotteokso.
4. Add glutinous rice powder to the crushed sweet potato and knead it.
5. Make the dough of 4 into a circle and add the hotteok sauce of 3 to make it round.
6. Put brown rice oil in a pan and bake back and forth, pressing hotteok.

rcpPartsDtls: Rice 180, cabbage kimchi(stem part) 30, onion 20, raw shiitake mushroom 40, cherry tomato 200, olive oil 12, soy sauce 4, pizza cheese(mozzarella) 30, minced shiitake 5
rcpNaTip: Kimchi is more suitable for fried rice because it can be chewed by using only the white stem. It goes well with sprinkling herbs such as minced parsley or basil instead of green onions.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop kimchi, onions, and mushrooms.
2. Cut cherry tomatoes into quarters.
3. Put olive oil in a pan and stir-fry kimchi, onion, mushroom, and tomato.
4. Stir-fry rice and season with soy sauce.
5. Put 3 and 4 in a bowl and put pizza cheese on top and cook until the cheese melts in the microwave.
6. Finish by sprinkling shrewd waves.

rcpPartsDtls: Oyster 50, nurungji 50, kelp soup (dry kelp 2, water 450), chives 10, soy sauce 3, sesame oil 2, green laver 0.5
rcpNaTip: Making kelp soup: Boil kelp in cold water for 10 minutes when it becomes soft and use only the soup.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shake oysters in salt water and chop them thickly.
2. Wash the chives and cut them into small pieces.
3. Put kelp soup in nurungji, soak it for 2 minutes, and boil it.
4. When the nurungji is almost spread, add oysters and boil slightly.
5. When the porridge spreads, add leek and boil it for a while.
6. Place in a bowl and crumble the roasted green laver on top.

rcpPartsDtls: Wanja: bean sauce 50, minced pork (non-greasy) 25, radish kimchi 5, salted shrimp 2.5, egg 5, potato starch 10, pepper 0.02, minced green onion 4, minced garlic 2 broth: anchovy kelp soup (300, dried anchovies 2.5, dried kyungchae 20, chopped green onion 5, minced garlic 1, soup 5
rcpNaTip: How to make anchovy kelp soup: When it's soft, add anchovies in cold water and boil them for 30 minutes to remove the ingredients and use only the soup. If you add leftover radish kimchi, you can reduce food waste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Drain the bean sprouts by sifting them with a sieve.
2. Chop the radish kimchi and salted shrimp into small pieces.
3. Put minced pork, kkakdugi, salted shrimp, egg, starch, pepper, green onion, and garlic in 1 and beat them.
4. Make a round shape of the chidan dough into bite-sized pieces.
5. Put anchovy kelp broth in a pot and when it boils, put in a wonk and boil it while rolling up the foam.
6. When the meatballs are cooked and float, add bok choy, green onion, and garlic, boil them slightly, season them with soy sauce, and lower them over the heat.

rcpNm: Grilled pork ribs and braised white kimchi wine
rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: 200 pork ribs (70 ribs), water 500, soybean paste 2, green onion 10, ginger 3, olive oil 4, pepper 0.02, salt 0.38 Braised kimchi: white kimchi 60, red wine 40, cooking wine 15, honey 3
rcpNaTip: Using cold white kimchi and leftover wine can reduce food waste. It is delicious to eat it by boiling kimchi and adding grilled ribs to the remaining sauce so that the taste of the sauce permeates the meat.

manualSteps.content: 1. Put water in a pot, release soybean paste, add green onion and ginger, and boil.
2. When the water boils, add pork ribs and boil them for 5 minutes.
3. Cut white kimchi into 5cm long pieces.
4. Put red wine in a pot, put it on a heat to blow away the alcohol, add kimchi, cooking wine, and honey, and boil it down to make it taste better.
5. Sprinkle the boiled back ribs with salt and olive oil and bake them in a pan.
6. Grilled ribs are served with braised white kimchi wine.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: squid 30, five-grain rice 30, blanched chwinamul 10, soy sauce 3, minced garlic 2.5, pepper 0.01, sesame oil 1 sauce: blanched chwinamul 5, cheongyang red pepper 2, soy sauce 1.5, sesame oil 1, sugar 1, minced garlic 1, soybean paste 0.75
rcpNaTip: If you have leftover chwinamul, you can chop it into small pieces and add it as an ingredient for sundae. It is delicious to add other vegetables such as dried radish greens instead of chwi vegetables. When filling the squid, you have to fill it with a certain amount of space to prevent the filling from bursting when it is steamed.

manualSteps.content: 1. Squid is removed from the legs to remove the intestines and eyes, and the blanched chwinamul is drained and minced.
2. Add chopped chwinamul, soy sauce, garlic, pepper, and sesame oil to the five-grain rice and mix evenly.
3. Add seasoned rice to the squid body and fix the end with a toothpick.
4. Put the squid in a steaming steamer and steam it for 3 minutes.
5. Mix the sauce ingredients to make the Chwinamul soy sauce.
6. Slice the steamed squid sundae, put it on a plate, and serve it with sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: Kodari 50, nurungji powder 7.5, soybean oil 4, minced red pepper 2, minced green onion 2 marinade: soy sauce 3, sugar 1.5, cooking wine 1.25, fine red pepper powder 1, ground onion 5, minced garlic 1
rcpNaTip: Prepare up to step 4, freeze it, defrost it when necessary, and just apply the sauce to bake it, making it a busy side dish. If you powder the crumbly nurungji and mix it into the batter, the savory taste is added.

manualSteps.content: 1. The nose bridge is divided into two halves in length to remove bones.
2. Cut the trimmed nose bridge in half and coat the inside with nurungi powder.
3. Mix a lot of ingredients to make the sauce.
4. Grease the pan and bake the bridge of the nose.
5. Put the sauce on the bridge of your nose and bake it slightly again.
6. Finish by sprinkling minced red pepper and shingles.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: cod flesh 60, salt 0.3, white pepper 0.02, sticky rice powder 12, pine mushroom 40, garlic 2, olive oil 6, baby vegetable 5 sauce: mayonnaise 4, wasabi ground 1, lemon juice 2, pepper 0.02
rcpNaTip: If you mix and use various mushrooms, you can enjoy various colors and scents.

manualSteps.content: 1. Season cod meat with salt and white pepper for seasoning, and lightly coat it with glutinous rice powder. (a)
2. Slice mushrooms and garlic into thin slices. (b)
3. Add oil to the pan, stir-fry garlic, scent it, and grill the mushrooms separately. (c)
4. Grease the pan and bake 1 back and forth. (d)
5. Mix a quantity of ingredients to make the sauce.
6. Place cod, mushrooms, and garlic on a plate, sprinkle with sauce, and serve with baby vegetables.

rcpPartsDtls: Peanuts 10, small anchovies 10, cooking wine 2.5, olive oil 2, dried red pepper 1, sesame oil 1, soybean oil 1, minced garlic 1, oyster sauce 0.3, soy sauce 1, starch syrup 6, sesame seeds 0.5
rcpNaTip: Anchovies should be stir-fried slowly over low heat to be soft and not hard. When peanuts are soaked in water, they are soaked in water, making the texture much softer.

manualSteps.content: 1. Stir-fry anchovies in a dry pan.
2. Add olive oil and cooking wine to lightly roasted anchovies and stir-fry until soft.
3. Soak the peanuts in cold water for 20 minutes and sift them out to drain.
4. Cut dried peppers into small pieces.
5. Mix olive oil, sesame oil, and soybean oil in a pan, add minced garlic to scent it, and stir-fry it with peanuts and peppers.
6. Add stir-fried anchovies, oyster sauce, bean sprouts, and starch syrup, mix evenly, and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

rcpPartsDtls: Crab meat 50g, mayonnaise 3g, cucumber 25g, rice 120g, cheese slice 20g, black sesame 2g, salt appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: You can transform cucumbers into red pepper paste sauce or soy sauce sauce sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Finely chop the crab meat and mix it with mayonnaise and salt.
2. Chop cucumbers, sprinkle salt, squeeze them on cotton cloth to remove moisture, and mix them with mayonnaise.
3. Mix rice with salt.
4. Place the wrap in a square plastic bin.
5. Put rice, cheese, rice, cucumbers, crab meat, and rice in the order of 4 and press it tightly.
6. Take out the entire wrap, cut it carefully with a knife, and decorate it with black sesame.

rcpPartsDtls: 12g minced pork, 15g oyster, 10g shiitake, 15g saesongi, 15g eggplant, 6g flour, 0.5g butter, 25g milk, 3g parmesan cheese, 7g mozzarella cheese, 20g tomato sauce, 2g basil, 0.5g oregano, 4g breadcrumbs
rcpNaTip: You can use chicken instead of pork for the lasagna.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add a vertical sheath to the eggplant and sprinkle with salt.
2. Shred shiitake mushrooms and oyster mushrooms and cut saesong mushrooms vertically.
3. Finely chop the pork and stir-fry it.
4. When butter is melted in a pan, stir-fry flour to make loo, and then add milk to make white sauce.
5. Place the white sauce in an oven container and place the eggplant on top of it, then add mushrooms, tomato sauce, white sauce, and mushrooms between the eggplants.
6. Place the remaining white sauce, cheese, and breadcrumbs in order, and bake in an oven preheated to 180℃ until the top is yellowish.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g of white fish, 20g bamboo shoots, 15g of green bell pepper, 15g of red bell pepper, 10g of dried pollack mushrooms, 5g of starch, 10g of cheese slice, 10g of sesame oil, appropriate amount of salt, appropriate amount of white pepper powder [sauce] pine nuts, 4g of water, 3g of sugar, 3g of lemon juice, 2g of soy sauce, appropriate amount of salt
rcpNaTip: When the fish is rolled, the skin should not go inside, so it looks good and does not unravel well.

manualSteps.content: 1. Place a thin layer of white fish, season it with salt and white pepper, and remove the moisture from the fish meat.

2. Chop bamboo shoots into 5cm long, blanch them in boiling water, season them with salt and sesame oil, and chop the green and red bell peppers into the same length and season them with salt while frying them in a pan.
3. Soak dried shiitake mushrooms, slice them thinly, stir-fry them with salt and sesame oil, and slice sliced cheese in the same length.
4. Put two pieces of fish flesh on top of each other, sprinkle starch on top of the prepared filling, roll it up, and steam it in a steamer for 8 minutes with starch on the outside.
5. Put pine nuts, water, sugar, salt, lemon juice and soy sauce in a blender and make sauce to make it juicy.
6. Add the sauce to the finished steaming.

rcpPartsDtls: 40g beef fillet, 10g carrots, 10g cucumber pickles, 15g onions, 10g perilla leaves, 50g rice, 6g starch, 2g sesame salt, 2g sesame oil, 2g salt [beef season] soy sauce, 2g rice wine, 1g sesame oil, and pepper powder
rcpNaTip: Be careful because overcooked beef is tough.

manualSteps.content: 1. The beef is sliced into palm-sized pieces with lean meat and marinated in seasoning.
2. Chop carrots and onions and season them with salt while frying them in a pan.
3. Remove the moisture from the cucumber pickles, slice them, and wash the perilla leaves thoroughly to drain them.
4. Cook and season the rice, add the prepared carrots, onions, and cucumber pickles, mix well, and lump them together into bite-sized pieces.
5. Spread the seasoned beef widely, sprinkle starch, and wrap it with perilla leaves and put the prepared rice on top.
6. Put cooking oil on the pan and roll the rolled ssambap until the beef is cooked.

rcpPartsDtls: 80g beef sirloin, 30g romaine, 2g watercress, 5g Radish, 10g cherry tomatoes, 8g red onion, 4g balsamic vinegar, 1g olive oil, appropriate amount of whole pepper
rcpNaTip: If there is no balsamic vinegar, it can be replaced with apple vinegar or brewed vinegar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Season beef sirloin with salt and pepper and bake in a pan according to preference. (The degree to which the steak is baked is adjusted according to preference.)
2. Slice the onion into a thin ring, tear the romaine into a suitable size, and slice the radishes thinly and soak them in cold water.
3. Add olive oil, salt and pepper to balsamic vinegar and make sauce. (You can add minced onions, etc. depending on your preference.)
4. Remove 2 and drain and season with salt and pepper.
5. Slice the steak and place it in front of a plate.
6. Add drasing to the prepared vegetables, mix them, and place them next to the steak.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g rice, 3g sesame seeds, 4g whole almonds, 4g peanuts, 4g pumpkin seeds, 90g water, appropriate amount of salt
rcpNaTip: When boiling porridge, you have to put the ground nuts later so that the porridge does not become watery.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the rice clean and soak it for about five hours.
2. Put the soaked rice in a mortar so that the grains of rice are half-broken.
3. Grind sesame seeds, almonds, peanuts, and pumpkin seeds in a blender.
4. Put rice and water in a pot and boil.
5. When the grains of rice are cooked, add 3 seed powder and boil it.
6. Season with salt and place in a prepared bowl.

rcpNm: oven-baked tortilla chips and avocado dip
rcpPartsDtls: 25g tortilla, 5g onion minced, 2g jalapeno minced, 3g garlic minced, 12g avocado, 3g lime juice, 30g tomato, appropriate amount of salt
rcpNaTip: You can use lemon juice or orange juice instead of lime juice.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut tortillas into six halves.
2. Chop the onion, jalapeno and garlic into small pieces.
3. Avocados are peeled and tomatoes are seeded and cut into 1-cm dice each.
4. Put tortillas in an oven preheated to 170℃ and bake crispy.
5. Put 2 in a bowl and mix well to make the paste, add avocado together, mash, add tomato, taste with lime juice and salt.
6. Put the avocado dip in a small bowl so that you can dip the grilled tortilla chips in it.

rcpPartsDtls: 25g beef, 60g rice, 5g lettuce, 5g canned tuna, 5g pepper, 10g egg white, 3g soy sauce, 2g sugar, 2g starch [tuna sauce] mayonnaise, 3g chopped onion, 2g chopped celery, 2g salt equivalent, sugar, pepper powder appropriate amount

4. Add oil to the pan, stir-fry minced garlic, and then stir-fry with seasoned beef.
5. Add sesame oil and shilpa to your liking in 4.
6. Place a spoonful of rice on the drained lettuce and place it in the order of stir-fried beef, tuna, mayonnaise, and sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g chicken breast, 30g beef sirloin, 3g soy sauce, 2g curry powder, 3g peanut butter, 0.5g sesame oil, 2g olive oil, 1.5g sugar, 1g ginger minced
rcpNaTip: Seafood is also available. In this case, add a little lemon juice to the sauce.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut chicken breast and beef tenderloin into bite-sized pieces.
2. Make the sauce by mixing soy sauce, curry powder, peanut burser, sesame oil, olive oil, sugar, and minced ginger.
3. Put 1 on the skewer alternately.
4. Apply 2 sauce to skewers with meat.
5. Preheat the oven to 176℃.
6. Grill skewers with sauce in preheated oven.

rcpNm: a chicken salad sandwich with curry flavor
rcpPartsDtls: 20g chicken breast, 0.5g olive oil, 2g mayonnaise, 40g bread, 3g almonds, 2g raisins, 0.5g curry powder, 2g lemon juice, some basil, just right amount, just right amount pepper

manualSteps.content: 1. Season chicken breast with salt and pepper.
2. Grease a pan and bake chicken breasts.

4. Add olive oil, curry powder, lemon juice, raisins, almonds and mayonnaise to 3 and mix.
5. Crisp bread in a pan.
6. Put chicken salad on the bread, cover it with the remaining bread, and cut everywhere.

rcpPartsDtls: Bread 40g, mayonnaise 2g, boiled egg 15g, lettuce 8g, chicken breast 13g, tomato 20g, cheese slice 4g, bacon 4g, salt equivalent, pepper equivalent

manualSteps.content: 1. Bake the bread crispy back and forth.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g potato, 20g sweet potato, 2g Orylb oil, 15g red bell pepper, 12g carrot, red equivalent, 12g red onion, 25g tomato, 12g pork pumpkin, 2g parmesan cheese, 5g breadcrumbs, some basil

rcpPartsDtls: Soaked seaweed (or watery seaweed) 7, spring onions (raw) 10, seaweed 1.3, onion 7, citron syrup 15, water 20, minced green onions 4, minced garlic 1, potato starch 10, egg 7, soybean oil 4

When there is no raw bamboo shoots, use a can of bamboo shoots lightly blanched in boiling water. If bean sprouts are laid at the bottom of the pot, it is easy to match the rice water. Since moisture comes out from bamboo shoots and bean sprouts, adjust the rice water to 2/3 of the usual amount.

6. If you put 1 in a pot of shabu-shabu and boil it, add the clamshell crown, vegetables, and mushrooms, cook them slightly, and dip them in the sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: Flounder 50, ramie shell 15, mugwort 20, water 200, soybean paste 9, green onion 4, perilla powder 6

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: beef sirloin 60, dalae 5, olive oil 5 marinade: soy sauce 4, sugar 3, minced onion 15, minced garlic 2, pepper 0.01

4. In an oiled pan, remove a lump of seasoned meat and shape it.
5. Cook the lumped meat evenly back and forth.
6. Put it in a bowl and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: duck meat 50g, gompi 20g, radish 10g, olive oil 4 sauce: omija extract 1g, red pepper paste 6g, sugar 2g, vinegar 2.5g, water 2.5g

2. Cut the rinsed gompi into 10 cm long pieces.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: flour 50, water 25, clam 100, onion 20, garlic 5, Cheongyang red pepper 5, shilpa 5, soybean oil 4, cooking wine 5, sesame oil 2 marinade: water 25, oyster sauce 1.5, soy sauce 1, plum extract 1.5, fish sauce 1
rcpNaTip: Make sujebi dough, wrap it in plastic wrap, and ripen for about 30 minutes It is more chewy when used. Making leftover sujebi dough reduces food waste and saves time.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add water to flour and make sujebi dough.
2. Remove the dough from the boiling water and cook it and support it in a sieve.
3. Chop the onion thickly, slice the garlic on one side, and slice the cheongyang red pepper diagonally.
4. Mix a lot of ingredients to make the sauce.
5. Add oil to the pan and stir-fry garlic, then stir-fry with clams and cooking wine.
6. Stir-fry onion and cheongyang red pepper, then stir-fry slightly with sauce, sujebi, and sesame oil.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: dandelion 15, onion 10 Seasoning: red pepper powder 1.25, sesame salt 1, salt 0.25, minced green onion 1.25, minced garlic 0.5, plum extract 4.5

3. Slice onions thinly.
4. Mix all the ingredients of the sauce to make the sauce.
5. Put onion and dandelion in a bowl and season lightly.
6. Put it in a bowl and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: Chalk 70g, soy sauce 1.5g, salt 0.5g, minced green onions 2.25g, minced garlic 1g, perilla oil 3g, perilla seed powder 6g
rcpNaTip: Young chwinamul is used as the stem, and old chwinamul is used only by removing the stem.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch the chwi greens slightly in boiling water.
2. Rinse the blanched chwinamul in cold water.
3. Squeeze the chwinamool lightly, remove the water, and cut it into 5cm lengths.
4. Mix all the rest of the ingredients and prepare the sauce.
5. Put the chwi namul in a bowl and add the sauce and mix it up.
6. Finish with the seasoned herbs in a bowl.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: tomato 70, nutritional chives 5, red onion 8 Seasoning: fish sauce 2.5, red pepper powder 0.6, salt 0.5, sesame seeds 1, sugar 2
rcpNaTip: It is better to eat within a day because the salinity is low. Tomatoes should not be too soft, but a little firm.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the material thoroughly.
2. Cut tomatoes into six pieces so that they don't fall off.
3. Cut the nutritious chives into 1cm long pieces.
4. Chop red onion finely.
5. Add seasoning to the nutritious chives and red onion to make a cow.
6. Put the filling in the tomato and leave it in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes before eating.

rcpPartsDtls: Main ingredients: green garlic 20, water 200, dried squid 5 seasoning: flour 1.25, water 20, salt 0.25, red pepper powder 0.6, salted shrimp 0.75, anchovy sauce 0.2g, sugar 1, sesame 0.5, ginger juice 0.25
rcpNaTip: If you add flour to the sour green garlic kimchi and pancake, it becomes a delicious pancake without adding other ingredients.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the green garlic clean and cut it into 5cm long pieces.

3. Cut squid into 1cm x 5cm pieces.
4. Combine flour and water and cool down the grass over low heat.
5. Mix the rest of the marinade ingredients in the grass.

rcpPartsDtls: Sections 35, guppy green beans 12.5, water 200, minced walnuts 2, azalea flower 2.5, sugar 2, salt 0.2
rcpNaTip: If you put a little sesame oil on the slice and push it, it won't stick and pushes well.

2. Put water in the washed green beans and boil them.

4. Put green bean paste in a dry pan, stir-fry it slightly, remove moisture, and season with sugar and salt.
5. Cut slices into 5 cm long pieces and slide thinly with a roll.

rcpPartsDtls: 70g eggplant, 0.5g ginger, 2g red pepper paste, 2g starch syrup, 0.5g sesame seeds, 2g perilla oil

2. Cut eggplant into 1x1x4cm pieces.
3. Finely chop the ginger.

5. Add perilla oil to pan and stir-fry eggplants over high heat.
6. When the eggplant is all fried, add the sauce and stir-fry only until mixed.

rcpPartsDtls: Mackerel 35g, starch 5g, peanut 1g, frying oil 5g [Seasoning under mackerel] 1g of ginger extract, 2g of Cheongju, salt equivalent, pepper powder appropriate amount [jorimjang] soy sauce 1g, red pepper paste 3g, tomato ketchup 3g, sugar 1g, starch syrup 3g, water 5g
rcpNaTip: Various blue-backed fish such as saury and mackerel can be used.

manualSteps.content: 1. After cutting the hair, remove the intestines and wash them well to remove moisture.
2. Scoop 1 flesh cloth, cut it into bite-sized pieces, and season with rice wine, ginger juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Put the starch front and back and fry it crispy twice in 170℃ frying oil.
4. Peel the peanuts, put them in a plastic bag, pound them with a roller, and chop them into thick pieces.
5. Put soy sauce, red pepper paste, sugar, and starch syrup in a pot and boil them to make a marinated sauce.
6. When the marinade boils down in half, add fried mackerel and peanuts and mix gently.

rcpPartsDtls: Blue crab 70g, Cheongju 2g, starch 3g, Shilpa 5g, sesame oil 2g, dried red pepper 3g, garlic minced 3g, ginger minced 2g, salt equivalent, pepper equivalent [seasoning] soy sauce 2g, Cheongju 2g, sugar 3g, water 3g

manualSteps.content: 1. Use a brush to wash the crab thoroughly, drain it, remove the shell, cut it into edible sizes, and season it with salt, pepper powder, and rice wine.
2. Put starch on it and steam it in a steamer.
3. Slice garlic and ginger into thin slices, slice thread green onions into 3cm lengths, and slice dried peppers diagonally.

5. If there is a spicy scent, add the sauce and stir-fry it slightly while adding steamed crab to make it taste better.
6. At the end, add the shilpa and scent it with sesame oil.

rcpPartsDtls: 25g kelp, 7g honey, 4g sesame seeds, 4g oatmeal

manualSteps.content: 1. Wipe the kelp clean with a wet dishcloth.
2. Cut kelp into 4x5cm pieces.
3. Place the cut kelp on a pie pan.
4. Bake kelp in preheated oven.
5. Baked kelp is covered with honey.
6. Coat with sesame seeds or oatmeal.

rcpPartsDtls: Broccoli 70g, beef tenderloin 30g, water starch 6g, carrots 10g, garlic minced 3g, soy sauce 3g, ginger 3g, sugar 3g, vegetable oil 2g, salt equivalent

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak broccoli in salt water and wash it.
2. Cut broccoli into small bunches, blanch them in water with oil and salt, and rinse them in cold water.
3. Slice ginger, carrot, garlic and beef into thin slices.
4. Season the beef, marinate it for about 10 minutes, add oil and cook it slightly.
5. Add garlic, ginger, carrot, and cooked beef in a pan and stir-fry broccoli.
6. Use water starch to adjust the concentration of the sauce.

rcpNm: Tofu soup (minestrone) filled with shrimp meat
rcpPartsDtls: Shrimp 35g, tofu 50g, carrot 10g, pork pumpkin 10g, sesame oil 1g, ginger 1g, onion 10g, garlic minced 1g, chicken broth 70g, oyster sauce 3g, soy sauce 2g, salt equivalent [shrimp marination] egg white 5g, starch 2g, salt appropriate amount
rcpNaTip: Instead of shrimp meat, you can use chicken breast minced.

6. Fry a croquet in oil at 180℃.

rcpNm: buy fish cake instead of bread
rcpPartsDtls:
Fish cake (150g), onion (100g), carrot (10g),
Cabbage (20g), purun (15g), almond (10g),
yogurt (30g), mayonnaise (35g), eggs (1/2),
bread flour (50g), flour (50g), cooking oil (8g),
Water (180g)
rcpNaTip: If you stir-fry onions and make onion sugar, you can use it instead of sugar.

3. Put yogurt, mayonnaise, almond and purun in number 2 and grind with a mixer.
4. Add shredded cabbage and carrot No. 3 and mix.

6. Put number 4 between fish cakes.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g soybean, 60g shiregi, 2g green pepper, 2g red pepper, 13g shrimp flesh, 6g flour, 2g acorn powder, 6.5g egg, 1g cooking oil
rcpNaTip: Since cheonggukjang sold on the market has a high salinity, it is used to make cheonggukjang without salt at home.

2. Chop the low-sodium cheonggukjang thickly.
3. Chop the flesh of blue, red pepper, and shrimp into thick pieces.

rcpPartsDtls: 67g tofu, 17g zucchini, 33g yangsongi, 17g eggplants, 17g paprika, 50g apple, 33g potato, 10g curry powder, 2g cooking oil, 5g starch powder, 5g water
rcpNaTip: Instant curry powder is too high in sodium to be used for low sodium, and the curry powder in this menu is not instant.

2. Cut the prepared vegetables into small cubes and stir-fry them lightly in a pan.
3. Bring water and curry powder to a boil, then add potatoes to the boil, and when the potatoes are almost cooked, add the rest of the vegetables to the boil.
4. Mix water and starch powder to adjust the concentration of curry sauce of 3.
5. Place tofu in a heated pan until golden brown.
6. Sprinkle the prepared sauce on the tofu steak.

rcpPartsDtls: Green tea powder 6g, pangellatin 5.3g, sugar 32g, water 15g, whipped cream 30g, milk 55.7g, vanilla essence 0.1g, canned sweet red bean decoration, mint decoration

manualSteps.content: 1. Put water in a bowl, put pan gelatin, soak it for about 3 minutes, and remove it.
2. Add green tea powder and a small amount of water to a pot and mix thoroughly.
3. Add milk, cream, sugar, and vanilla essence to 2 and boil over low heat to melt sugar.
4. Add the soaked gelatin to 3 and heat it until the gelatin dissolves.
5. Pour green tea panakota into a container and cool at room temperature.
6. Cool once more in the refrigerator to complete.

rcpNm: Purple sweet potato glutinous rice pudding
rcpPartsDtls:
Purple sweet potato (40g), milk (120g),
Sticky rice powder (4g), salt (0.1g)
rcpNaTip: If you add a little salt, the sweetness comes out more.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash purple sweet potatoes cleanly with a brush.
2. Peel and steam.
3. Grate steamed purple sweet potatoes, milk and salt finely in a blender.
4. Sift number 3 through a fine sieve to remove the lump.
5. Put No. 4 in a bowl and add glutinous rice powder and stir to loosen well.
6. Boil number 5 and start to tangle, place in a bowl and cool.

rcpPartsDtls:
Non-glutinous rice flour (112g), jujube (5 grains),
White vinegar powder (3.5g), sweet pumpkin powder (3.5g),
Spinach powder (3.5g), sugar (3g), white gold (25g),
Milk (2g), pumpkin seeds (3g)
rcpNaTip: Mixing the flesh of dried jujube with the powder can reduce the use of sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix various colored powders with non-glutinous rice flour, and add 15g of water to mix.
2. Sift number 1 again, add 3g of sugar, and mix.
3. Mix the jujube flesh that is soaked in number 2.
4. When the steam rises in the steamer, lay a cotton cloth and put in a shape frame, then add number 3.
5. Arrange the top evenly and steam for 20 minutes.
6. Decorate with pumpkin seeds and jujube.

rcpPartsDtls:
Rice flour (25g), glutinous rice flour (13g),
Cranberries (8g), raisins (8g), nuts (8g)
rcpNaTip: Dry fruits and nuts can give you a natural sweetness and savory taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix rice flour, glutinous rice flour with cranberries, raisins, and nuts and grind them in a mixer.
2. Add water to the powder and mix evenly.
3. Put number 2 down on a sieve.
4. The large powder filtered through a sieve is separately used as a cow to be placed on the rice cake.
5. Place three powders in a circular frame and place four cows on top.
6. Steam in a steaming steamer for 25 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls:
Omija (30g), apple (80g), orange (100g),
Strawberries (80g), grapes (80g), pears (80g)
rcpNaTip: With the variety of flavors of omija and the sweetness of the fruit, you can make delicious drinks without sugar.

2. Wash apples, oranges, strawberries, grapes, and pears.
3. Slice washed fruit into small, thin slices.
4. Put number 3 into number 1 and ripen it.
5. When you eat warm, add cinnamon and boil it.
6. Put it in a cup.

rcpPartsDtls:
dried omija (5g), pear (50g), honey (5g), pine nuts (3 grains),
Mineral water (150g), ice cubes (3 pieces)
rcpNaTip: If you use pear juice and honey without using the sugar-rich omija syrup, you can have a healthy sweet taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. After washing dried omija cleanly, pour 150g of bottled water and boil it for about a day.

3. Grate the pear finely in a grater, wrap it in cotton cloth, and squeeze the pear juice.
4. We mix the omija and pear juice, then add honey and mix evenly.
5. Grate ice in a blender and add a spoonful.
6. Decorate with pine nuts.

rcpPartsDtls:
apple (60g), beet (2g), lemon juice (0.5g),
Carbonated water (100g)
rcpNaTip: The sourness of lemon juice can maximize the sweetness, reducing the use of added sugar.

3. Put number 1 in the mixer and grind it.
4. Put drained #2 and lemon juice in a pot and boil down.
5. Put 3 times in a pot and boil down.
6. Put 4 or 5 times in a glass cup and pour carbonated water to complete it.

rcpPartsDtls:
Chestnut (200g), milk (180g), soy milk (20g),
Almond (3g)
rcpNaTip: Because of the sweetness of chestnuts, milk, and the savory taste of soy milk, you can enjoy it without sugar.

2. Boiled chestnuts are cut in half and dug out the inside.
3. Put chestnut, milk, and soy milk in a blender.

5. Chop almonds into small pieces.
6. Place number 4 in a cup and sprinkle with minced almonds.

rcpPartsDtls: Plum (200g), milk (250g), honey (10g), water (15g)
rcpNaTip: Using seasonal fruits can make delicious juices with healthy sweetness.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the plum clean and freeze it.
2. Put the frozen plum, honey and water in a blender.
3. Put some of the ground plum in a blender and freeze it.
4. Put the ground plum in a cup in a blender.
5. Put number 3 in a cup.
6. Pour in milk.

rcpPartsDtls:
Pear (1/2), apple (1/2), red wine (200g),
cinnamon (5g), whole pepper (6 pieces)
rcpNaTip: Cinnamon and whole pepper can be used to make a delicious drink even if it is less sweet.

manualSteps.content: 1. Pear and apple are rounded with a scooper.
2. Put wine in a pot and boil over low heat with cinnamon and whole pepper.
3. When the wine starts to boil, add the pear and apple and boil down until the amount is half.
4. Let it cool down.
5. Place number 4 in a container.
6. Place boiled pears and apples in fruit skewers and serve.

rcpNm: fall into a state of 愛
rcpPartsDtls:
citron (200g), chestnut (25g), jujube (15g), pear (50g),
Pomegranate (20g), honey (10g), salt (0.5g), water (300g)

rcpPartsDtls:
milk (65g), pear (60g), sweet potato (35g),
Yogurt (3g), rice flour (5g), fermented soybean (5g)

rcpPartsDtls:
Plum (100g), orange (170g), carbonated water (100g),

Bit (15g), non-additive soy milk (200g),

lentils (red, 70g), milk (150g),

1. Wrap sweet potatoes in a cooking foil and put them in a fire pot over low heat
Bake for 30 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls:

•Pickle water: sugar (15g), vinegar (15g), pickling spice (5g), water (15g)

rcpPartsDtls: Tofu 50g, squid 14g, cocktail shrimp 14g, potato starch 15g, pancake powder 10g, egg 20g, honey 5g, shrimp powder 5g, garlic 2g, onion 10g, low salt soy sauce 5g

rcpNaTip: You can reduce sodium intake instead of salt by making powder with triceps.

rcpPartsDtls: 18g cabbage kimchi, 15g cabbage, 10g onion, 1g green onion, 0.2g soy sauce, 0.1g barley shrimp, 0.5g garlic, 0.1g black sesame, 2g perilla oil
rcpNaTip: Instead of salt, I ground barley shrimp to season it.

rcpPartsDtls: 26g tteokbokki rice cake, 14.5g sweet pumpkin, 1.6g broccoli, 4ml milk, 2.6g whipped cream, 0.01g black sesame
rcpNaTip: Instead of red pepper paste and soy sauce, it was flavored only with sweet pumpkin and dairy products.

rcpPartsDtls:

rcpNaTip: It replaces salt with crab meat.
