4. Blanch sweet potato shoots.
5. Chop the onion finely.
6. Add sliced onions, seasoning, and black sesame to sweet potato sundae and season them.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: cabbage (50g), radish (20g), chives (10g), onion (5g), minced garlic (5g), minced ginger (5g), sesame (1g)
•Seasoning: Low salt (5g), red pepper powder (10g), sugar (5g), salted fish (3g)
rcpNaTip:
•Fresh kimchi, which takes less time to salt cabbage, contains less sodium than regular kimchi.
•Low salt was used to reduce sodium content.

manualSteps.content: 1. After cutting the cabbage vertically, sprinkle it with low-salt salt and wash it 10 minutes later.
2. Clean and wash the radishes, then slice them thinly, slice the chives into 4cm lengths, and slice the onions.
3. Mix radish, chives, onions, minced garlic, minced ginger and low salt in a bowl to make the seasoning.
4. Mix the cabbage, which has been washed in low salt salt, evenly with the kimchi seasoning.
5. Sprinkle sesame seeds to finish.

rcpPartsDtls: 200g of auk, 15g of soybean paste, 10g of garlic, 5g of low-salt soy sauce, 2g of sesame oil, 1g of sesame seeds, 2g of salt
rcpNaTip: You can reduce sodium with soybean paste instead of calcium and dietary fiber-rich auk and salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the end of the auk stem and trim it.
2. Put the trimmed auk in water with a little salt and knead it as if hitting it.
3. Boil the auk in boiling water, rinse it in cold water, and squeeze the water.
4. Cut the auk into bite-sized pieces.
5. Finely chop the garlic.
6. Add soybean paste, minced garlic, sesame oil, low-salt soy sauce, and sesame seeds to the auk and mix.

rcpPartsDtls: 2.7g of black beans (Seoritae), 5.3g of flour, 5.3g of pancake powder, 0.25g of red pepper, 0.25g of green pepper, 1.2g of carrot, 5.9g of chives, 3.7g of kanyangpa, 5.3g of zucchini, 1.0g of egg, 2.0g of soybean oil, 0.4g of soy sauce
rcpNaTip: I seasoned it with soy sauce with boiled bean water and low sodium content.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the chives thoroughly and cut them into 4-5cm long pieces.
2. Slice zucchini, carrot, and onion into thin slices.
3. Slice red and green peppers diagonally.
4. Boil the black beans and grind them roughly, and store the boiled water.
5. Mix all ingredients and adjust the dough concentration with boiled water.
6. Each serving is cooked to a golden age.

rcpNm: Gosari pajeon and sweet potato pancakes
rcpPartsDtls: 30g of bracken, 7g of chives, 6g of red pepper, 20g of eggs (0.3), 20g of flour, 13g of sweet persimmons, 30ml of water, 15g of glutinous rice flour, 50g of potato starch, 0.1g of jujube
rcpNaTip: We reduced the use of sodium by utilizing the chewy texture and unique scent of bracken.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the bracken and chives in half, and cut the red pepper into long pieces.
2. Place ① on an oiled pan and pour out the flour and egg batter.
3. Cut the sweet persimmons into 0.4cm circles and cut them into flower-shaped molds.
4. Add potato starch to glutinous rice powder and knead it.
5. Round the dough in an oiled pan and pour over the persimmon and jujube flowers.
6. Put sweet persimmon pancake and sweet-sized bracken green onion pancake into a bowl to complete.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g seaweed fulvescens, 10g clamshells, 5g pancake powder, 5g frying powder, 1g red pepper, 12g soybean oil
rcpNaTip: Clams and seaweed fulvescens are rich in potassium, which helps in the release of sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Seaweed and clams are rinsed in water several times to remove saltiness.
2. Add water to the frying powder and pancake powder and make the dough.
3. Finely chop the seaweed and mix it into the dough.
4. Place seaweed fulvescens dough on a pan, add clams, and bake until golden.
5. Add red pepper garnish before baking.
6. Put it in a bowl and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: 10g chickpeas, 10g black beans, 10g peas, 25g tofu, 5g red paprika, 10g glutinous rice flour, 5g flour, 0.3g salt, 2ml water, 10g cooking oil
rcpNaTip: You can use soy products rich in potassium to reduce sodium absorption in your body.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut paprika into bean-sized cubes.
2. After soaking the prepared beans in water, boil each in boiling water and drain.
3. Crush tofu and boiled chickpeas.
4. Add flour, sticky rice powder, salt, and water to ③ and knead.
5. Mix beans and paprika in dough.
6. Put cooking oil on the pan and send it in a good size to see the beans in the dough.

rcpPartsDtls: 7g eggplant, 5g glass noodles, 75g eggs (1.5), chives 5g, onions 10g, cooking oil 3g, tomato hole 30g, laurel leaves 1g, parsley 1g, garlic 3g, green vinegar salt 0.5g, pepper 0.5g
rcpNaTip: Instead of ketchup, I made the sauce with tomatoes with high potassium content.

manualSteps.content: 1. The glass noodles are soaked in water, and the soaked glass noodles, eggplant, leek, and onion are minced.
2. Keep the eggs well.
3. Add eggs, pretreated vegetables, and pepper and mix evenly.
4. Place the dough on an oiled pan in an oval shape of 10cm in diameter, and fold it when it is half-cooked to form a flat dumpling shape.
5. Boil tomato holes, bay leaves, and seaweed salt to make the sauce.
6. Pour the sauce on the finished egg dumplings and garnish with parsley.

rcpPartsDtls: 80g whole bellflower root, 5g pear, 3g minced garlic, 15g hot spring onion, 3g sesame seeds, 10g red pepper paste, 7.5g soy sauce, 15g sesame oil, 5g salt (for removing bitterness)
rcpNaTip: I changed the pear to reduce the salty taste of the gochujang seasoning.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the shell of whole bellflower after washing.
2. Soak whole bellflower root in salt water to make bitter taste and drain it.
3. Cut the bellflower in half and beat it with a bat to make it thin and wide.
4. Make a marinade using ground pear, minced garlic, red pepper paste, soy sauce, and sesame oil.
5. Grill the bellflower in a pan and cook it, then apply the sauce and bake it again over a low heat.
6. Sprinkle it with corrugated green onion and sesame seeds to complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: 60g egg, 20g spinach, 10g beet, 20g milk, 1g apple mint, 3g kelp, 0.5g salt
rcpNaTip: We reduced salt by adding water to the taste of kelp.

manualSteps.content: 1. Wash the kelp in water and boil it in cold water.
2. Add kelp water to spinach and beet and grind each.
3. Mix egg and milk to make egg water.
4. Divide the egg water into three halves.
5. Mix spinach and beets in the separated egg water.
6. Steamed the three eggs in order and garnish with apple mint.

rcpNm: Sweet potato sprouts perilla seed sprouts
rcpPartsDtls: Sweet potato pure 60g, perilla seed powder 20g, kelp 2g, salt 1g, sesame oil 2g
rcpNaTip: Sweet potato shoots, which are high in potassium, help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil sweet potato shoots in boiling water and wash them.
2. Boil water and kelp over low heat for about 10 minutes and add water again.
3. Transfer the sweet potato shoots to a pan and boil them again with water.
4. When the water is reduced by half again, add salt and perilla powder.
5. Stir-fry it so that it doesn't get wet, then add sesame oil.
6. Put it on a plate and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: Spinach 80g, cherry tomato 30g, sesame oil 2g, sesame seeds 1g, garlic 1g, seaweed powder 1g
rcpNaTip: Instead of salt, I used seaweed powder to reduce sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch spinach lightly in boiling water.
2. Rinse the blanched spinach in cold water and squeeze out the water.
3. Blanch cherry tomatoes slightly in boiling water to remove the skin.
4. Cut the peeled cherry tomatoes in half.
5. Add tomatoes, seaweed powder, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and garlic to blanched spinach.
6. Put it on a plate and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls: 15g of grain powder, 50g of banana, 100ml of milk
rcpNaTip: Bananas are rich in potassium and help release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the banana.
2. Cut bananas into appropriate sizes and prepare them.
3. Measure milk and grain powder in the right amount.
4. Put ③ and banana in a blender.
5. It goes to the point where there are no ingredients.
6. Put it in a cup and complete it.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) 500g strong flour, 5g instant yeast, 7g salt, 50g egg(1), 250g milk, 50g grape seed oil
(Ingredients) 1 pear, 24g starch water
(Topping material) 1 pear
rcpNaTip: I made pear syrup using only pear and starch without adding sugar to reduce sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Remove the skin of the pear, grind it in a blender, and sift it to make pear juice. Put pear juice in a pot and boil it over medium heat for 20 minutes with starch to make pear syrup.
2. (Topping) Cut one pear into small pieces and dry it to make 10g of pear crunch.
3. Mix strong flour, salt, and yeast well, then knead by adding eggs, warmed milk, and grape seed oil little by little.
4. After first fermenting the finished dough at room temperature for 1-2 hours, divide it into three chunks and perform the second fermentation for about 15 minutes.

5. After the second fermentation, three chunks of dough are put side by side in a bread frame coated with grape seed oil and baked in an oven preheated to 180 degrees for about 30 minutes.
★If the dough doesn't come out when you poke it with a skewer, it's all cooked."
6. Sprinkle the baked bread with the dried pear crunch on top of it.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Dish ingredients) Strong ingredients 250g, salt 5g, dry yeast 6g, butter 25g, egg 22g, milk 175g 
(Ingredients) 500g (2p), nuts 15g
rcpNaTip: It was flavored using sugar in the apple without adding sugar.

manualSteps.content:
1. 1 apple and nuts are diced and 1 apple is grated and boiled in a pot.
★ If you boil an apple, the sweet taste will be concentrated and browning will be prevented.
2. Add strong flour, salt, yeast, milk, and water and knead to form a certain amount of gluten, then add butter to knead.
3. First ferment the dough for about 60 minutes, then divide it and round it to medium ferment.
4. After the intermediate fermentation, roll the dough with boiled apples and nuts and ferment it for a second time for 30 minutes.
5. Spread egg water on the second fermented dough and place it in an oven at 160°C on the bottom and 180°C on the top and bake for 30 minutes.

6. When there are about 5 minutes left, take it out and add egg water once more, bake it at 170℃ on the bottom and 180℃ on the top to give color to the top.
★ If you turn the frame in the middle of baking, it will be baked evenly.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Dish ingredients) Strong flour 500g, salt 8g, cocoa 30g, butter 38g, raw yeast 8g, dry yeast 4g, pat peremente 95g, milk 114ml, water 236g 

(Ingredients) Cacao nips 94 g, walnut 94 g, raisin 150 g
rcpNaTip: I made healthy bread using pat peremente, which was made baguette dough and fermented at low temperatures for a day.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add all ingredients except butter and knead, then add butter and mix until the end. Add the ingredients to the mixed dough and mix evenly.

2. Punch 30 minutes after the first fermentation and ferment for 35 minutes.
★punch refers to the process of removing gas.
3. Divide 200g and do 20 minutes of intermediate fermentation.
4. The medium-fermented dough is formed into a round shape.
5. After spraying, apply powder and ferment for a second time for 50 minutes.

6. Give an X-shaped sheath and bake it at 195℃ for 12 minutes steam for 5 seconds.
★It is good to use a razor with a thin blade for cutting.

rcpPartsDtls: (Made in dough) 200g whole wheat flour, 150g strong flour, 8g instant dry yeast, 30ml apple species, 220ml water, 6g salt, 20g canola oil, 1 lemon zest, 88g dried persimmon
rcpNaTip:
The fresh scent of lemon and dried persimmon make it delicious even if it contains less sugar. 
Replace the apple species with apple juice and add 5g more of the measuring agent.

manualSteps.content: 1. Make a zest from the outer shell of the lemon, and cut the dried persimmon into small dices.
2. Mix the lemon zest, salt, yeast, apple, and canola oil made in water, then knead with whole wheat flour and strong flour until the surface is smooth and elastic.

3. Cover the dough with vinyl and ferment it at 40 to 50°C until it is doubled, and after fermentation, remove air bubbles, divide it into 75g, round it, cover it with vinyl, and ferment it again for 15 minutes.

4. For the dough, take out the gas slightly, push it in an oval shape, place the dried persimmon on it, fold it in three sections, pinch the joints, attach both sides to form a circular shape, and ferment it for a second time for 30 minutes.
5. Blanch and pan the fermented dough in boiling water for 10 seconds.
6. Bake for 17 minutes in an oven preheated to 200 degrees.

rcpNm: Broccoli bagel with sweet pumpkin cream
rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) 225g strong ingredients, 40ml water, 550g blueberry fermented seed, 3g salt, 15g olive oil, 100g broccoli 
(Ingredients) Sweet pumpkin 600g, whipped cream 250g
rcpNaTip:
It was fermented without yeast using natural fermentations, and sweetened with sweet pumpkin cream.
Blueberry fermentation seedlings can be substituted with 10g of metrology.

manualSteps.content:
1. Mix cooked sweet pumpkin and whipped cream to make sweet pumpkin cream.
★ It's good to steam sweet pumpkin.

2. Add the dough ingredients excluding broccoli, mix until the final stage, boil, add minced broccoli and mix. The primary fermentation is fermented at 27°C for 1 h with a high temperature fermentation.
3. Divide into 130g pieces, round, and medium fermentation for 20 min.
4. Stretch the dough about 30cm to 35cm, mold it into a ring shape, pan it, and second ferment it for 60 minutes at 35℃ and 85% humidity environment, and blanch both sides in boiling water.
5. Bake at 210℃ for 15 minutes and cool in a cooling net.

6. Sik splits the bread and sands the sweet pumpkin cream.
★After the bread cools down, you have to put the cream on to prevent it from melting."

rcpPartsDtls: Pork (70g), fish cake (100g), crunchy peppers (30g), red paprika (25g), yellow paprika (25g), bean sprouts (150g), salt (0.3g), pepper powder (0.3g), oyster sauce (5g), sesame oil (1g)
rcpNaTip: Instead of salt, I used oyster sauce to season it.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred pork, fish cake, crunchy peppers, and paprika.
2. Rinse bean sprouts in cold water and sieve them.
3. Season the shredded pork.
4. Put seasoned pork in a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
5. Add shredded ingredients and fish cake and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
6. Add oyster sauce and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes, cover with sesame oil and mix evenly.

rcpPartsDtls: Onion (20g), basil (10g), boiled egg (1), rice noodles (100g), tomato (200g), red pepper paste (½ Ts), red pepper powder (½ Ts), honey (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
I made bibim sauce with tomatoes and reduced the use of red pepper paste.
You can enjoy it as fresh as a salad with onions and basil

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred onion and basil, and cut boiled egg in half.
2. Dip the shredded onion in cold water and sieve it to remove moisture.
3. Put the ingredients of the bibim sauce in the mixer and grind them to make the bibim sauce.
4. Boil rice noodles in boiling water (8 cups) for 2 minutes, rinse them in cold water, and sieve them.
5. Put rice noodles → bibim sauce → onion, basil → egg in order and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: Abalone (2), zucchini (20g), shiitake mushrooms (15g), carrot (20g), egg garnish (one sheet each white, one sheet each), boiled rice noodles (80g), cooking oil (5ml), anchovies (5g), dried pollack (2g), kelp (3g), green onion (100g), whole pepper (2g), red pepper powder (3g), low-salt soy sauce (5g), vinegar (2g), minced green onion (1g), minced garlic (1g), sesame oil (1g)
rcpNaTip:
We reduced the use of salt by using anchovy sauce.
Stir-fried anchovies and dried pollack over low heat improves the flavor.

manualSteps.content: 1. Stir-fry anchovies and dried pollack for 5 minutes on low heat, add the rest of the broth and water (1L) and boil for 30 minutes, then sift through a sieve.
2. Chop the dried anchovies into small pieces, remove the skin and intestines of abalone, add the sheath, and shred the zucchini, shiitake mushrooms, carrots, and egg garnish.
3. Make an anchovy sauce by adding anchovy sauce ingredients to finely chopped anchovies.
4. Pour the stock into a pot and cook for 5 minutes by adding the trimmed abalone over low heat.
5. Put cooking oil (5ml) on a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry the trimmed vegetables.
6. Put the boiled noodles in a bowl → stir-fried ingredients → cooked abalone in order and pour the broth.

rcpPartsDtls: 20g apple, 5g fried tofu, 15g cabbage, 10g carrot, 3g sugar, 15g vinegar, 15g cucumber, 5g kelp
rcpNaTip: You can blanch fried tofu in water to reduce oiliness and sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch fried tofu and kelp.
2. Squeeze out the blanched fried tofu and slice it.
3. shred the blanched kelp.
4. Chop cabbage, carrots, apples, and cucumbers.
5. Mix sugar, vinegar, and pepper to make sauce.
6. Mix the shredded ingredients and sauce.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g tomatoes, 30g tofu, 15g onions, 15g shiitake mushrooms, 5g anchovies, 8g peppers, 3g green onions, 2g kelp, 30g misojang
rcpNaTip: Potassium in tomatoes, kelp, and onions helps release sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil anchovies and kelp to make broth.
2. Chop tofu, onion, shiitake mushrooms, peppers, and green onions into bite-sized pieces.
3. Boil water in a pot and cook tomatoes for about 5 minutes.
4. Remove the tomato skin and cut into appropriate sizes to remove the seeds.
5. Beat miso soybean paste in broth and add onion and shiitake mushrooms.
6. Add tomatoes and green onions.

rcpPartsDtls:
•Must-have ingredients: dried seaweed (2g), bonito fish cloth (0.3g)
•Seasoning: Miso soy sauce (3g), flavorful (0.3g), water (350g)
rcpNaTip: •The broth brewed with dried bonito is seasoned even without salt.

manualSteps.content: 1. Dried seaweed is soaked in water.
2. Chop the soaked seaweed into small pieces.
3. Put water (350g) and bonito in a pot to make broth.
4. Beat the miso paste in the broth.
5. Add seaweed to the soup and boil it.
6. Finish by adding the flavor of rice.

rcpPartsDtls:
• Essential ingredients: Tofu (100g), oyster mushroom (45g), onion (45g), crab meat (15g), green bell pepper (15g), red bell pepper (15g), green onion (10g), ginger (3g), cooking oil (3g)
•Seasoning: Minced garlic (10g), sugar (15g), and soybean oil (3g)
rcpNaTip: •The capillary part was blanched in water to reduce sodium content.

manualSteps.content: 1. Shred the tofu, onion, bell pepper, green onion, and ginger into thin slices.
2. Cut the oyster mushroom and crab meat into thin pieces.
3. Boil water in a pot and blanch the podu in advance and sift it to drain.
4. Add cooking oil to the pan and stir-fry green onions, minced garlic, and ginger.
5. Stir-fry the trimmed vegetables, oyster mushrooms, and crab meat.
6. When the vegetables are cooked, add the blanched podu and stir-fry it, season it with nodu oil and sugar to finish it.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Banji ingredient) Strong rice flour 240g, steamed rice 100g, water 150ml, yeast 4g, salt 4g, coconut oil 12g 
(Ingredients) Sweet pumpkin 700g, corn 100g
rcpNaTip: It was flavored with sweet pumpkin and rice without using sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix the cooked sweet pumpkin and corn grains.
2. Add rice flour, salt, soaked rice, and water, knead into a lump, then add coconut oil and knead until soft.

3. "Peace the dough until it doubles in size. 
★If there are marks left when you press the dough with your hand, it fermented well."
4. Roll the dough into a thin rectangle (about 35cm x 28cm in size, about 0.5cm in thickness) and roll the filling on top.
5. Cut the dried dough into about 4 cm pieces and put it in a muffin mold to ferment until it is full in the mold.
6. Apply milk on the top and bake in an oven preheated at 180°C on the top and 160°C on the bottom for 20-25 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: melon (110g), almond (5g), salt (1g), sugar (2g), lemon juice (15g), olive oil (2g), citron syrup (5g), ricotta cheese (15g)
rcpNaTip: We seasoned it with the umami taste of pickled melon and the original taste of ricotta cheese and reduced the use of sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the melon and dig out the inside in half, and wrap it in cotton cloth to squeeze the juice.
2. Slice the pulp thinly with filler and squeeze the juice with your hands.
3. Add boiling water (50ml) and seasoning to melon juice and mix evenly.
4. Put the sliced melon flesh in the seasoned melon juice and pickle it in the refrigerator for 20 minutes.
5. Make the sauce.
6. Rinse the pickled melon flesh in cold water, squeeze the water, put it in a bowl, and serve with sauce and almonds.

rcpPartsDtls: cherry tomatoes (50g), bananas (80g), green grapes (50g), gelatin (7.5g), agar powder (0.25g), pickling spice (5g), apple vinegar (10g), sugar (3g), oligosaccharide (5g), salt (1g)
rcpNaTip: We used various fruits to make the ingredients sweet and reduce the use of sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the fruit into bite-sized pieces.
2. Gelatin is soaked in cold water.
3. Boil water (100ml) and seasoning in a pot and sift through pickling spice.
4. Add soaked gelatin and agar powder to ③, melt it, and cool it down.
5. Put the trimmed fruit in a glass container and pour the cooled ④ gelatin water.
6. Finish by solidifying in the refrigerator for 1 hour and 30 minutes.

rcpPartsDtls: White kidney beans (30g), tofu (140g), milk (40g), oligosaccharides (50g), bananas (1), mugwort powder (1g), almonds (2g)
rcpNaTip: I made a healthy dessert using the fragrant scent of mugwort and high-sugar bananas.

manualSteps.content: 1. Soak the white kidney beans in water, soak them for 8 hours, dry them, and boil them in boiling water for 20 minutes.
2. Blanch tofu slightly in boiling water.
3. Grate finely with blanched tofu, boiled white kidney beans, milk, oligosaccharides, and bananas (½ content) in a mixer.
4. Grate finely with blanched tofu, boiled white kidney beans, milk, oligosaccharides, and bananas (½ content) in a mixer.
5. Slice the rest of the bananas into bite-sized pieces and top with almonds on top of the pudding.

rcpNm: Vegetable rolled omelet and grilled sweet potato
rcpPartsDtls: Eggplants (½ + 20g), cabbage (70g), red paprika (20g), carrot (20g), bok choy (1-tier), egg garnish (3 pieces), roasted seaweed (1 sheet), steamed rice paper (2 sheets), sesame leaves (2 sheets), steamed sweet potatoes (200g), milk (15g), unsalted butter (20g), minced garlic (5g), unsalted cheese (15g), whipped cream (75g), pepper powder (0.5g), edible flowers (2 yellow), parsley powder (2g), cooking oil (35ml)
rcpNaTip:
Potassium-rich vegetables help release sodium.
It uses sweet potatoes with high sugar content to make it taste sweet and supplement the boring taste with the crunchy texture of vegetables.

manualSteps.content: 1. Dig the eggplant(½) in half, shred the rest of the eggplant(20g), cabbage(50g), red paprika, carrot, cut cabbage(20g) and bokchoy into bite-sized pieces, and shred the eggplant.

2. Steamed sweet potatoes are peeled, crushed milk, whipped cream, and unsalted butter, mixed evenly, and filled in the eggplant, and then minced garlic and unsalted cheese are put on top and baked in an oven preheated to 180℃ for 5 minutes.
3. Put cooking oil (20ml) on a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry the shredded eggplants, cabbage, paprika, and carrots for 2 minutes to take out.
4. Put cooking oil (15ml) on the same pan and stir-fry cabbage, bokchoy, and pepper (0.5g) into bite-sized pieces for 3 minutes to take out.
5. Rice paper soaked in roasted seaweed → egg garnish → perilla leaf → stir-fried vegetables in order, roll them up, and cut them into bite-sized pieces.
6. Put the roasted eggplant → roasted cabbage and bokchoy → gimbap in order and finish by sprinkling petals and parsley powder (2g).

rcpPartsDtls: Chicken breast (40g), yellow paprika (20g), onion (15g), cucumber (15g), carrot (15g), konjac noodles (80g), children's leaf vegetable (10g), mustard powder (10g), vinegar (20g), oligosaccharide (10g), perilla seed powder (10g), salt (0.3g), low-salt soy sauce (0.5g)
rcpNaTip:
I used konjac to stimulate my appetite by using the texture.
It replaced the salty taste by using perilla sauce with strong aroma and taste, such as vinegar and mustard.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boil the chicken breast in boiling water for 7 minutes, remove it, and tear it into a grain and prepare it.
2. Shred the yellow paprika, onion, cucumber and carrot.
3. Blanch konjac noodles slightly in boiling water, wash them in cold water, and sieve them to remove moisture.
4. Make perilla seed sauce.
5. Mix konjac noodles with boiled chicken breast, shredded vegetables, and perilla seed sauce.
6. Place in a bowl and place children's leaf vegetables on top.

rcpPartsDtls: Sweet pumpkin (100g), potato (5g), shiitake mushroom (5g), soaked kondre greens (10g), soaked rice (30g), raisins (5g), dried figs (5g), roasted walnuts (5g), roasted almond slices (5g), raspberries (5g), yogurt (20g)
rcpNaTip:
We used sweet pumpkin, dried fruit, and unsweetened yogurt to reduce the use of added sugar.
I used nurungji and nuts to make the texture good.

manualSteps.content: 1. Peel the sweet pumpkin, put it in a steamer, steam it for 5 minutes, and crush it.
2. Shred the potatoes and shiitake mushrooms, and finely chop the soaked gondre greens.
3. Put the soaked rice, shredded potatoes, shiitake mushrooms, soaked kondre greens, and water (20ml) in a pot and boil them over high heat for 5 minutes and 30 seconds.
4. Spread the potato gondre rice thinly in an oven pan and bake it in an oven preheated to 180℃ to make nurungji.
5. Add dried fruits, roasted walnuts, and roasted almond slices to the crushed sweet pumpkin and mix evenly.
6. Put sweet pumpkin mixed with dried fruits and nuts in a bowl and place gondre nurungji, raspberry, and yogurt on top.

rcpNm: Tiger Shrimp Brown Rice Fried Rice
rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Broccoli (¼), onion (¼), paprika (red, yellow ¼), chives (2 generations), black tiger shrimp (8), brown rice (2 bowls), cheongyang red pepper (2), lemon (½), minced garlic (3 Ts), butter (3 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•Low-salt butter can reduce sodium intake.
•I used brown rice, which is more potassium-rich than white rice.

manualSteps.content: 1. Chop broccoli by separating only the upper part, chop onion, paprika, and cheongyang red pepper, chop chives, and halve lemon.
2. Wash the black tiger shrimp cleanly and remove the head.
3. Put cooking oil on a pan heated over a low heat, stir-fry it like frying with minced garlic, and then stir-fry it with onions.
4. Add the trimmed black tiger shrimp and butter and stir-fry the shrimp until the color changes, then add the minced paprika, cheongyang red pepper, and broccoli and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
5. Put brown rice in a bowl and sprinkle the stir-fried black tiger shrimp and soup evenly.
6. Finish with chopped chives and lemon.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Cauliflower (200g), mushroom (2), onion (½), garlic (3 pages), unsweetened soy milk (2 cups), tofu noodles (1 pack = 100g), basil (3 sheets), olive oil (1ts), minced garlic (1ts), turmeric powder (2ts), vinegar (1ts), parsley powder (1ts)
rcpNaTip: •We used soy milk and onions to supplement the sweetness and reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the cauliflower into small pieces, shred the mushroom and onion into 3mm thick pieces, and flatly slice the garlic (side 2).
2. Finely grind the chopped cauliflower, unsweetened soy milk, water (1 cup), and garlic (1 side) in a mixer to make the cauliflower cream.
3. Put olive oil on a pan heated over a medium heat, stir-fry minced garlic, and add flattened garlic, onions, and mushrooms until the onion dies.
4. Add cauliflower cream and when it boils, add turmeric powder and tofu noodles and mix evenly.
5. Add basil and mix evenly, turn off the heat, add vinegar and mix evenly.
6. Place curry cream tofu noodle pasta in a bowl and finish with parsley powder.

rcpPartsDtls: 50g mussels, 50g cabbages, 30g radishes, 2g garlic, 3g green onions, 1g red pepper, 0.3g salt
rcpNaTip: You can create the natural taste of the ingredients by making cool water with the umami and vegetables of mussels.

manualSteps.content: 1. Add sliced radish into a bite-sized piece of boiling water.
2. When the radish becomes transparent, add cabbage and boil it.
3. Add mussels.
4. When a mussel opens its mouth, it condiments with minced garlic.
5. Add salt.
6. Garnish with sliced spring onions and red pepper.

rcpPartsDtls: Bean sprouts 50g, pollack head 40g, red pepper paste 10g, flour 100g, red pepper powder 5g, salt 2g
rcpNaTip: If you grill the pollack head and use it, you can make a broth that is at least delicious with sodium.

manualSteps.content: 1. Mix the flour with salt, knead it, and ripen it.
2. After roasting the pollack head, boil it in cold water to make broth and filter it with gauze.
3. Pour 2 broth into a pot, add 1/2 bean sprouts, and when it boils, add red pepper paste and red pepper powder and boil.
4. Push the aged sujebi dough and boil it in boiling water separately.
5. Add 4 sujebi to 3 and boil it a little.
6. Add the rest of the bean sprouts to complete it.

rcpNm: Sweet pumpkin fish soup and kiwi sauce
rcpPartsDtls: 120g pollack, 10g sweet pumpkin, 15g carrot, 15g cucumber, 15g onion, 30g starch, 110g egg, 10g fried powder, 3g wood ear mushrooms, 15g vinegar, 20g kiwi sauce
rcpNaTip: You can eat delicious sweet and sour pork without salt by using kiwis to add the sweetness of the fruit.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the wood ear mushrooms, pollack, carrots, cucumbers, and onions in warm water into bite-sized pieces.
2. Season pollack meat with salt and white pepper, and mix starch and egg whites to make fried clothes.
3. Coat pollack meat with fried clothes and fry it in oil.
4. Mix water, eggs, and frying powder to make fried clothes and fry sweet pumpkin.
5. Grease a frying pan and stir-fry carrots, onions, and wood ear mushrooms.
6. Add kiwi sauce and vinegar to 5 and add starch water to adjust the concentration, then mix fried ingredients and cucumbers.

rcpPartsDtls: 30g octopus, 12g eggplant, 7g cucumber, 24g shiitake mushrooms, 10g carrot, 12g water parsley, 0.1g red pepper, 15g sugar, 25g vinegar, 30m water, 10g apple, 10g soy sauce, 1g red pepper powder, 1g sesame seeds
rcpNaTip: The sweet and sour vinegar has replaced the salty taste with the seasoning.

manualSteps.content: 1. Blanch the octopus slightly and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
2. Cut cucumbers, carrots, shiitake, and eggplant into thin, round shapes and bake the eggplant and shiitake slightly.
3. Make a pickled seasoning with sugar, vinegar, and water and pickle cucumbers, carrots, roasted eggplants, and shiitake.
4. Place the octopus on the ingredient in ③ and wrap it with blanched water parsley.
5. Prepare apples by chopping them into small pieces.
6. Make a sauce with apples, soy sauce, red pepper powder, sugar, vinegar, and sesame and serve it with chorol.

rcpPartsDtls:
(Banquet Ingredients) 200g rice flour, 80g milk, 15ml water, 160g Levin fermented species, 50g eggs (1), 3g salt, 25g olive oil, 30g onion, 30g carrot, 30g ink powder 
(Ingredients) Tomato 250g, onion 150g, bell pepper 60g, garlic 20g, chicken breast 300g, oregano 5g, basil powder 5g, bay leaf 5g, pepper 5g, salt 5g, red pepper 5g, mozzarella cheese 50g
rcpNaTip:
The bread dough was sweetened with onions and carrots.
LeBin fermented species can be replaced with 10g of yeast.

manualSteps.content: 1. (Ingredients) After mincing onion, garlic, tomato, paprika, and chicken breast, stir-fry them in a pan coated with olive oil, add bay leaves and boil down. Add red pepper, oregano, basil powder, red pepper powder, salt, and pepper and season.
2. Add all the batter ingredients and mix them in the first stage, add olive oil, and when mixing until just before the final stage, add minced onions and carrots and mix until the final stage.
3. After the first fermentation (30 to 40 minutes), the dough is divided into three pieces, 70g each, and then rounded, and then covered with a wrap for intermediate fermentation (10 minutes).

4. Place the dough on your hand and press it flat, add 40g of ingredients and 10g of mozzarella cheese, seal it, and make it into a triangle shape.
★If the tooth breaks open, the dough will burst as you bake it, so stick it carefully.
5. After panning, perform the second fermentation (30 minutes).
6. Bake for 15 minutes at 160°C on the top and 180°C on the bottom.

rcpPartsDtls: Soaked chickpea (100g), banana (1 ½), unsweetened cocoa powder (3g), dark chocolate (30g), almond flour (50g), egg yolk (1), milk (130g), cooking oil (10ml), almond slice (1g), chickpea boiled water (50ml), unsweetened whipped cream (50g), oligosaccharide (15g), banana (½)
rcpNaTip:
I used chickpeas with high potassium content.
I used natural sugar from bananas to reduce the use of sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Boiled chickpeas are boiled in boiling water (3 cups) for 30 to 40 minutes, and boiled chickpeas (50ml) are cooled down and placed in the refrigerator.
2. Boiled chickpeas, bananas (½), unsweetened cocoa powder, dark chocolate, almond powder, egg yolk, and milk are ground in a mixer to make a dough.
3. Put cooking oil (10ml) on a pan heated over a medium heat and place the dough according to the size of the cup and bake it back and forth until golden.
4. Take out the chickpea water from the refrigerator, whip it, put oligosaccharides in unsweetened whipped cream, whip it, crush the bananas (½) and mix them evenly.
5. Mix both the chickpea water and the banana-free sugar cream in ④, and slice the banana (1) into thin slices.
6. Cup-baked sheet → Slice banana → cream repeatedly stack and top with almond slices.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Garlic (4 pages), tomato (2), onion (1), bay leaf (2), anchovy for broth (½ cup), kelp (5×5 cm, 2 sheets)
rcpNaTip:
•Tomatoes high in potassium help release sodium.
•It was seasoned with anchovy stock to reduce the use of sodium and give it a tantalizing taste.

manualSteps.content: 1. When the broth ingredients and garlic (page 2) are added to the water (8 cups) and boiled, remove the kelp and boil it for another 30 minutes over low heat to make the broth.
2. Remove the top of the tomato, cut it with a crosshair, blanch it in boiling water for 30 seconds, and soak it in cold water.
3. Peel the blanched tomatoes, remove the seeds, and cut them into 1×1cm pieces.
4. Shred the onion into 3mm thick pieces, and shred the garlic (side 2) into 1mm thick pieces.
5. In a dry pot heated over a medium heat, add the shredded onion and water (1 Ts) and stir-fry until dark brown.
6. Stir-fry tomatoes for 5 minutes, adding stock (6 cups), bay leaves, and shredded garlic for 10 minutes and finish.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Golden enoki mushroom (400g), onion(dog), lettuce(2 sheets), perilla leaf(2 sheets), cucumber(½), cheondo peach(½), shrimp flesh(½ cup), crab meat(½ cup), red pepper powder(3Ts), water(3Ts), brown rice vinegar(1.5Ts), low-salt soy sauce(1.5Ts), minced garlic(0.5Ts), sesame oil(0.3Ts)
rcpNaTip: •Cheondo Peach, which is high in potassium, helps release sodium and reduces the use of added sugar due to the sweetness of cheondo Peach.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the base of the golden enoki mushroom and cut it into pieces, shred onions, lettuce, perilla leaves, cucumbers, and cut the cheondo peach into wedges.
2. Boil the golden enoki mushrooms in boiling water for 5 minutes, rinse them in cold water, and drain them.
3. Blanch shrimp meat and crab meat in the same water for 30 seconds, rinse them in cold water, and drain them.
4. Make the marinade.
5. Place the trimmed ingredients in a bowl and finish with the marinade.

rcpPartsDtls: [4 servings] Seaweed stalks (1 pack = 300g), onions (1 ½), crab meat (135g), dried shrimp (1 cup), pancake powder (1 cup), fried ½ powder (1 cup), carbonated water (1 cup), avocado oil (1 Ts)
rcpNaTip:
•The seaweed stem was dipped in water and the crab meat was blanched to reduce the sodium content.
•We used onions to sweeten and reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Rinse seaweed stalks several times in running water and soak them in cold water for about an hour.
2. Cut seaweed stalks into bite-sized pieces, shred onions thinly, and cut crab meat into pieces.
3. Blanch the crab meat slightly in boiling water and remove the water.
4. Mix the dough ingredients evenly, then add the trimmed ingredients and mix roughly.
5. Put avocado oil on a pan heated over a medium heat, remove the dough to an appropriate size, and top with dried shrimp.
6. When the dough becomes opaque, turn it over and bake it back and forth until golden.

rcpNm: Seafood salad and water parsley sauce
rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Shrimp mushroom (1), cherry tomato (200g), squid (1), cocktail shrimp (200g), pepper powder (slightly), minced garlic (1Ts), olive oil (1Ts), lemon juice (1Ts), pepper powder (slightly), water parsley (50g), perilla leaves (2), garlic (3.5Ts), cheddar cheese (2.5Ts), almond (5p)
rcpNaTip:
•Tomatoes high in potassium help release sodium.
•The natural taste and flavor of the ingredients were enhanced by using the minari.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the pine mushroom thick in shape, remove the top of the cherry tomato, form a hot cross shape, make a diagonal cut on the body of the squid, and sprinkle pepper.
2. Mix the cocktail shrimp with the seasoning and marinate for 20 minutes.
3. Put pine mushrooms and cherry tomatoes in a dry pan heated over a medium heat and bake them until golden and take them out.
4. Put shrimp and squid in the same pan and bake until the color of the outside changes.
5. Finely grind the pesto ingredients in a blender.
6. Place the water parsley pesto in a bowl and finish with the trimmed ingredients on top.

rcpPartsDtls: [2 servings] Tomatoes (2), onions (¼), potatoes (¼), yellow paprika (¼), broccoli (¼), shrimp (4), red pepper oil (1 Ts), pepper powder (0.3 Ts), minced garlic (0.3 Ts), plain yogurt (½ cup), red pepper paste (0.3 Ts)
rcpNaTip: •We used plain yogurt to reduce the use of added sugar.

manualSteps.content: 1. Cut the top of the tomato slightly and dig out the inside.
2. Chop onion, potato, yellow paprika, broccoli and shrimp into 1 x 1 cm pieces.
3. Add red pepper oil to a pan heated over a medium heat and stir-fry the trimmed vegetables until the onion becomes transparent.
4. Add shrimp and pepper powder and stir-fry evenly.
5. Make red pepper paste yogurt dressing.
6. Put 4 fried ingredients in tomatoes and finish with red pepper paste yogurt dressing.
